Nzaambi yiyo ya yirika nsi na byobinso biri mu nsi , nde ngo Mfumu yulu na butoto , nde ka koodzakala mu manzo-nzaambi matuungu mu myooko mya baatu ko .
Nde wahele se na nzala kuri ti myooko mya baatu mimusalisa , kari na nzala kitotolo ti kimosi se ko , nde koohaanaa kuri bobanso kidziingu na muwuumunu na byobinso .
Mu muutu mosi , nde wayirika bitsuumbu byobinso bya baatu , na wabasuusa ha butoto bwabutsiina , nde wasa mandilu mu mantaangu , mandilu ma mansi ma kwedzakala baatu ,
mpisi bemusaka , ti ha yuka ba kwebumbula mu nzala kumudzuukila , koomosoko nde wahele la na mpisi muutu mu beetu .
Mukwongo , mu nde beetuneenu turi bamwooyo , na turi mu kwedyaata , na turi na kidziingu . Bunu bwa leele babamosi mu baatu bangaa-lungwensu ti : " Beetu se turi mu kitsuumbu kya nde . "
Ngo bu turi kitsuumbu kimosi na Nzaambi , lo yaa tutsima ko ti nde wafwanikina na woolo , na palata , na tari bunu pe kiteki kyahala mu bunkete na mu bitsimi bya baatu .
Nzaambi wahele kubweese kutsima mantaangu ma bunzimbu bwa baatu , mu lumalu nde wuloombo kuri baatu ba mansi momanso ti bayiinga madyeele .
Bukuri nde wasoolo kiluumbu ki katsuundisa nsi mu nsungumunu , mu muutu wunde wu kari kasoolo , na nde wasoongo kimbaangi kuri bobanso mu kumufulukisa mu bafwa . "
Bu bayuka mfulukulu ya bafwa , babamosi bamusiila munsiku , bakaka baleele ti : " beetu ngo bari tumi bee tukuywiila mu mamo kiluumbu kikimi . "
Haho , Pawulo kayisika ha kakati dya bo .
Mukwongo , baatu babamosi bakaangamini mu nde , basiila kanyi , mu bo kwaba Deni mosi waba mu mfuunda bakuutu , na mukyeetu wuri nkuumbu Damari na bakaka se .
Ha mambisa haho , Pawulo wasiisa Atena na wayende ku Korinto .
Nde wabwaana Muyudayo mosi , wuri nkuumbu Akila , wabutuka ku nkoonsi ya Pontiko . Kidzika kyantele kaba kamwaasa , wafumuni ku Italya , bo na Piriska , mukasi waandi , mu ntoono Kolodyo waheeri lutumu ti Bayudayo bapala mu Loma . Nde wakokosolo na bo ,
na bukuri waba kisalu kimosi na bo , nde wadzakala kuri bo na wasala kintwaari na bo . Bo baba batuungi ba misaampu .
Nde waba dzoonsaana mu nzo-nkutukunu , mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu , na waba yukusaana misamu ku Bayudayo na Bahelene .
Sila bo na Timoteho bu baba tubuka kuri ba mwaanangukina ku Makedonya , lo Pawulo wuri mu kwelutusa ntaangu , mu maampu ma Nzaambi , mu kweta kimbaangi ha busu bwa Bayudayo ti Yesu ngo Kiristo .
Mukwongo , Bayudayo bu baba kwemunyaafuna na kwemutuka , nde wakubula binkuta byaandi na wabaleele ti : " Makila ma beenu mabwa ha yulu mitu myeenu , me nyahele na kibila mu mo ; mu lumalu , me ntalisiri kuri bangooyi . "
Nde wayisika haho , na wayende kukoto mu nzo muutu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Tityo Yusto munsaambiri Nzaambi , wuri nzo yaba ha teke nzo-nkutukunu .
Kirispo mfumu nzo-nkutukunu , wasii kanyi mu Mfumu , nde na nzo yaandi , na baatu balaka ba ku Korinto bayukiri , basii kanyi na bababotukiri .
Butsuku bu mosi , Mfumu waleele mu mamono-miisu kuri Pawulo ti : " Yaa ba na boomo ko , kasi dzoonso , na yaa wura ko ,
bukuri me nyiri na ye , na kuri muutu ti mosi ko , wukwiisa mu kusa ye bubi , bukuri me nyiri na baatu balaka mu bvula dimadi .
Nde wadzakala na bo mu mubvu mosi na mangoondo masaamunu mu kweyikisa maampu ma Nzaambi .
Ngalyono waba kimonikisi kya nsi ya Loma ku Akaya ; Bayudayo bayukusina batelemise kitaatu mu Pawulo , na bamunata ku nzo ya miyalu ,
mu kuleele ti : " Muutu wumawu wuri mu kwesinda baatu mu kusaambila Nzaambi , mu kiteese kya kuhele kubvumina mangisi .
Pawulo bu kabaandika kudzibula munwa , Ngalyono leeriri kuri Bayudayo ti : " Mbuti habeeri lumvuki bunu pe musamu wamubi , nkani me ntaamburi nyayulu yeenu ;
mbuti nkalikisi mu ntoono maampu , mankuumbu na mu mangisi meenu , lo monee beenu-meene ; me ntiiri kuba mularimi mimyo ko .
Na nde wabapalisa mu nzo miyalu .
Bobanso bakwaata Sosetene , mfumu nzo-nkutukunu , bamulata ha mbasi nzo miyalu ; kasi myominso mimyo myaba myahele kutala Ngalyono .
Pawulo wabweese kulutisa biluumbu byalaka . Tumi wasiisa bampaangi na wakoto mu bwaatu , mu kweende ku Sirya , ha kimosi na Piriska na Akila . Nde watebe mfu ku Nkengerya , mu lusiilulu lukasiiri .
Bo batubukaa ku Efeso , wubasiisiri kukwo . Bu kakota mu nzo-nkutukunu , nde wadzoonso na Bayudayo .
Bo bamuloombo mu kulutisa mwaa-ntaangu yalaka na bo , kasi nde wabisa .
Ngo nde wabasisa , waleele ti : " Me sa bweese kwiisa kuri beenu , mbuti Nzaambi tiri . Na wakoto bwaatu ku Efeso .
Nde wakulumuka ku Kayisareya , bu kanaaka ku Yerusalemi mu kuha dibuundu mboto , tumi ha kakulumuka ku Antyoke .
Nde bu kalutisa mwaa-mantaangu , ha kataba mankoonsi malandisina Ngalatya , Firingya , mu kwesyaamisa bayiki bobanso .
Muyudayo mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Apolo , wabutuka ku Alekanderi muutu wuri na bunzoonsi , wayisa ku Efeso , waba na nyaabulu mu matinu .
Nde waba na nyaabulu mu nzila Mfumu , na ntiiti mu kisalu , waba kwedzoonso na kweyikisa mu bunkete misamu mitariri Yesu , ngo yini mbotokulu ya Yowane kaba kayaari ;
Nde wabaandika kuyikisa mu kibakala mu nzo-nkutukunu ; Piriska na Akila bu bamuywiila , bamuholo mu kuba na bo , na bamuyikisa nzila [ Nzaambi ] .
Nde bu kaba katya kweende ku Akaya , bampaangi bamusyaamisa na batinina kuri bantumu mu kuri ti bamutaambula , nde bu katubuka wamonoko mufunu walaka kuri babo basii kanyi mu bweese .
Mukwongo , nde waba tungukilaa Bayudayo mu makwa , ha busu bwa baatu , na waba soongaa mu matinu ti Yesu ngo Kiristo .
Ntaangu yaba Apolo ku Korinto , Pawulo wataba mankoonsi ma ku yulu milaandu , mu kweende ku Efeso . Bu kabwaana bayiki bamosi ,
wabaleele ti : " Buri beenu lwataambiri Mpeeve Yangisi ha lwasii kanyi ? " Bo babvutula ti : " Beetu twahele kuyuka ti , kuri badzoonsolo ti , Mpeeve Yangisi yiri . "
Pawulo wabafuula ti : " Nkya mbotokulu beenu luri lwataambula ? " Bo babvutula ti : " Mbotokulu ya Yowane . "
Pawulo waleele ti : " Yowane wasalila mbotokulu ya nyiingula madyeele , waleele kuri baatu , mpisi heki baatu basa kanyi , mu wunde wukwiisa ha mambisa ma nde , mbangukulu Yesu . "
Bamanaa kuyuka mamo , bataambula mbotokulu mu nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu .
Pawulo bu kabatetekele myooko , Mpeeve Yangisi yayisa ha yulu bo , bo badzoonso mandiinga na babikula .
Baatu baba kampe kuumi na boolo .
Bu kakoto mu nzo-nkutukunu , nde wayikisa mu bunsaalisi , mu mangoondo matatu , nde waba dzoonsaana na waba yukusaana mu mitariri Kimfumu kya Nzaambi .
Bukuri bamosi baba kubisaa mitima na baba bisaa kusa kanyi , bo badzoonsolo bwabubi mu nzila , ha busu bwa mpuumbu , nde wabasiisa , Ngo mpisi kiluumbu nde waba holaana bayiki kintwaari na nde , wabayoloso mu nzo nyikulu ya muutu mosi wuri nkuumbu Tirano .
Mimyo myayirima , mu mibvu myoolo , kuri bobanso badzakalaana ku Asya , Bayudayo na Bahelene , bayuka maampu ma Mfumu .
Nzaambi waba yirika bimaangu bya nkimukunu mu myooko mya Pawulo ,
kuri lo babumusa mu babeeru , mansaanda bunu pe biteendi bi babumusinyee mu nyutu nde , mabeeru matsiinika na mampeeve mamabi mapala .
Bayudayo babamosi bakookwepalisaa mampeeve baba kweyendaa mu mabula , bo se batsiitsa mu kusalila nkuumbu Yesu ha yulu baatu baba na mampeeve mamabi , baleele ti : " Me nyiloombo kuri beenu , mu nkuumbu ya Yesu wuri Pawulo wuri mu kweyikisa ! "
Bo baba baala nsaamu ba Keva , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , Muyudayo , baba kwesalila bubwo .
Mpeeve yayibi yaha mvutu , yabaleele ti : " Me nyaari Yesu , na me nyaari se Pawulo , heki beenu ba na luri ? "
Bu kabasungumina , muutu waba na mpeeve yayibi wababwiisikila kikiindu , wabvula kwa na bo , mu kiteesu kiri , bu baba pala mu nzo yiyo , mu ntiinu , mpene na balemene .
Mimyo mya yabakana kuri Bayudayo bobanso na Bahelene , badzakalaana ku Efeso na boomo bwabwiila ha yulu bobanso , na badzaangisa nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu .
Balaka mu babo basii kanyi , batambukila na bayaabisa nsalulu yaaku .
Balaka mu baba salilaa mu mpiitunu , bakutukisa mikaanda , bayoko myo ha busu bwa baatu , bu batangumisa ntalu , kampe mafuunda mataanu ma mboongo .
Bunubwo , bunu buri makwa ma Mfumu , maampu maba kweyalamika na mamonoko na makwa .
Mamo bu mayirima , Pawulo wabaka kitsimi mu kutaba Makedonya na Akaya mu kweende ku Yerusalemi . Nde waleele : " Bu nyiyisika kukwo , bwayelemene ti me mono Loma . "
Nde waheeke ku Makedonya boolo mu bisari byaandi , Timoteho na Erasto , mu ntaangu yi kabakiingila ku Asya .
Mu ntaangu yiniyo , kwayirimini kisaangila kya makwa mu ntoono nzila .
Muyiriki miluungu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Demeteryo , waba yirikaana biteki bya woolo mu kifwaani kya manzo-nzaambi ma Artemi , na wabahaanaa ndaandu yalaka kuri baba salila byo .
Nde wakutukisa ba bari kisalu kimosi kintwaari na nde , waleele ti : " Banduku baami , beenu luyaari ti kisalu ki ngo busina bwa beetuneenu ,
lutala na luyuka ti ka kunu ku Efeso ko , ngo kampe mu Asya dyodinso , Pawulo , wayukusa baatu , na mpuumbu yalaka yahoomboko kuri nde , wukweleele ti , banzaambi bayiriku mu myooko mya baatu , bari banzaambi ko .
Kari kini kisalu kya beetu kinyaafuka ko , ngo se nzo-nzaambi ya Aretemi , nzaambi yayinene , yiba yabwoongolo , nzaambi yi bari mu kwesaambila mu nkoonsi yoyinso ya Asya na mu nsi yansiina ! "
Bu bayuka bubwo , bo baluula mu nkesi , bafula misaakulu , baleele ti : " Wadzaangama , Aretemi wa bari Efeso ! "
Bvula dyodinso dyaluula mu kisaangila , bakwaata Ngayo na Aristarako wa ku Makedonya , bambaasi ba Pawulo , babanata mu kitsimi kimosi ku nzo bimpa .
Pawulo waba tiiri kukoto kunsa mpuumbu yiyo , kasi bayiki bamudika .
Bamosi mu bambaasi baandi ba ku Asya se , bamuyingukila mu kuhele kweende nde-meene ku nzo bimpa .
Kisaangila kyakinene kyakoto kunsa buundu , babamosi babikisa mi , bakaka kubikisa mikimi ; na balaka mu bo baba bahele kuyaaba mu nki ntoono baba bari bakutukina .
Munsa mpuumbu baatu bayaabisa kuri Alekandere , wuri Bayudayo basuusa ha mankula . Alekandere bu kanaanguna koko watya kukalila nyutu ha busu bwa baatu .
Bu bayaaba ti nde Muyudayo , bobanso bafula mu mbeembu mosi kampe mu bilookolo byoolo : " Wadzaangama , Aretemi wa bari Efeso ! "
Mutini wa bvula wadzuunisa mpuumbu waleele ti : " Baatu ba ku Efeso , nani mu baatu dziimbiri ti bvula dya Efeso ngo mukebi nzo nzaambi ya wadzaangama Aretemi na kiteki kwafumini ku yulu ?
Mimyo myahele na bwa kutununa , beenu luyelemini kuba badzuuna , yaa lubingukila kusa kitotolo ti kimosi ko .
Beenu lutweesi baatu bamaba hamaha . Bo bari bangaa-kwiibi ko , bunu pe basaani ba Nzaambi yeetu ko .
Hango , mbuti Demeteryo na bisari bya miluungu biri kintwaari na nde , bari na kooti mu muutu , lo kuri biluumbu bya miyalu na banzoonsi se na bo , lo be bafundusuna bo na bo .
Na mbuti luri na kitotolo kikimi ha yulu , lo buundu dikootala misamu sa dyaha mvutu .
Bukuri bee batuhoriri bunu bangaa-ntungu mu mya lolo . Bukuri kwahele ntoono ti yimosi yisoongo bunu buyirimini buundu dya bangaa-tungu dimadi . Kaleelaa mimyo nde tsyaamini buundu .
Misamu mya tungu mimyo milutaana , Pawulo watumisa bayiki , bu kabasyaamisa , nde wabaha mboto na wayende ku Makedonya .
Bu kaba kwetaba mankoonsi mamo , nde wabasyaamisa mu maampu malaka , watubuka ku nsi ya Bahelene ,
nde walutisa mangoondo matatu kukwo . Nde bu kasaka kuholo bwaatu mu kweende ku Sirya , nde wayuka kele dya Bayudayo mu nde , na wataambula kubvutukila mu nzila ya Makedonya .
Bayende na nde mu nzila ngo : Sopatero mwaana Piro wa ku Bere , Aristarako na Sekundo ba ku Tesalonika , Ngayo wa ku Derbe , Timoteho , Tikiko na Torofimo ba ku ha Asya .
Bamaba bateekilaana , batukiingila ku Torowasi .
Beetu twakoto bwaatu ku Filipo , ha mambisa ma biluumbu bya mampa mahele lufunusu . Beetu tababakala ku Torowasi ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitaanu , na twalutisa lumiingu kukwo .
Kiluumbu kyatete kya lumiingu , bu twabvuutuna mu kubukunu mpa , Pawulo waba dzoonsaana na babo , bukuri waba kweende mu kiluumbu kyaba nama , nde wanonono luyolo natee mu kakati dya butsuku .
Miinda myaba myalaka , mu kihekiri kya ku yulu mu twaba twakutukina .
Mwaa munkuula mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Etiko , waba wadzakala ha mweelu nzo wantele , wuri tolo twa mpoondo . Pawulo wanamitina mu kudzoonso mu ntaangu yalaka . Ngo munkuula wunde , tolo bu twabvulila , wasonoko kuholosono mu mve yamatatu ya nzo natee ha nsi , na wafwa .
Pawulo bu kasunduka , wabwa ha yulu nde , wamuholo mu munsa myooko myaandi waleele ti : " Yaa lunyoongo ko , kiluunsi kyaandi kyakiri mu nde .
Bu katoomboko , wabukuna mpa na wadya , walutisa ntaangu yalaka na wadzoonso natee ku nkyeelele bwiisi , na wayende .
Bo banata mwaana wamwooyo na bataambula mboondulu yalaka .
Beetu bu twatekele mu bwaatu , twatalisa ku Asoso , ku twaketi kuholo Pawulo . Bukuri nde watiiri kuholo nzila ya mu nsi .
Bu katubakala ku Asoso , beetu twabweese kumuholo , na twayende ku Mitilene .
Tuyisikaa haho , beetu twaholo nzila ya mu mubu . Mu kiluumbu kyanama , twatubuka ha simi dya Kyo , mu kiluumbu kyabweese kunama beetu twataba Samo , na mu kiluumbu kyakaka twatubuka ku Mileto .
Mukwongo , Pawulo waba tiiri kulutila la na Efeso , mu kuhele kulutisa ntaangu ku Asya , nde waba kwebingukila , bukuri waba tiiri ti , mbuti bwakuka lo nde kaba ku Yerusalemi , mu kiluumbu kya Pantekote .
Kuholosono ku Mileto , Pawulo waheeke mukeensu ku Efeso mu kutumisa bakuutu ba dibuundu .
Bu bayisa kutubuka hari nde , nde wabaleele ti : " beenu luyaari ti kuholosono kiluumbu kyatete kinyasuusiri me kitaambi kunsa Asya , bunu bu nyabee na beenu mantaangu momanso ,
nyasalila Mfumu mu nkulukulu yoyinso ; kunsa bidilu na kunsa nsindukulu dzantumbukila mu makele ma Bayudayo .
Me nyahele kusweeke kitotolo ti kimosi , mu byaba mufunu kuri beenu , mu ntaangu ya kuyaabisa na kuyikisa , ha busu bwa baatu na mu manzo .
Me nyaloombo kuri Bayudayo na kuri Bahelene mu nyiingulu madyeele mu Nzaambi na kusiila kanyi mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
Mu lumalu me Mpeeve wankaanga , na me nyeensi ku Yerusalemi kwahele kuyaaba misamu mi nyibwaanikina na myo ku mankula .
Mpeeve Yangisi yiri mu kunswiikisila ti , mu bvula ngo bvula bikonyi na mpasi biri mu kunkiingila .
Kasi ha miisu mya me , kidziingu kyaami kyahele mufunu , kasi miri mufunu kuri meenu kusukisa nzila yaami na kisalu ki nyataamburi kuri Mfumu Yesu , kya kweta kimbaangi mu Musamu Wamubwete mu bweese bwa Nzaambi .
Mu lumalu me nyaari ti beenu lubweese kumono busu bwa me ko , beenu-banso kunsa baatu ba nyabee kweluta mu kuyikisa maampu ma Kimfumu kya mayulu .
Mu ntoono bubwo me nyilutswiikisa mu kiluumbu kya lolo ti , mu makila ma beenu-banso me nyiri na kibila ko .
Mu ngwanwa , me nyahele kulusweekele kitotolo ti kimosi , mu kuluyikisa kutya kwa Nzaambi .
Seenee madyeele mu beenu-meene , na mu mpuumbu bimeeme yoyinso yiri Mpeeve Yangisi wulutelemisi mu kuba bakebi . Buunguleenu dibuundu dya Nzaambi di kari kabaka mu makila ma nde-meene .
Me nyaari ti ha mambisa ma nyendukulu me , kunsa beenu bambulu bari na kibakala sa bakoto , na babvuukisa mpuumbu bimeeme ko ,
na munsa beenu se sa kwateleme baatu ba kwesa biwobiri , mu kunata bayiki ha mambisa ma bo .
Mu ntoono bubwo , beene naana na baambukeenu mwooyo ti , mu lutaangu lwa mibvu mitatu , butsuku na mwiini , me nyahele kudzimbikina kulubula mpisi nde mu beenu , mu mansangasi .
Mu lumalu , me nyiluyekele beenu-banso kuri Nzaambi na kuri maampu ma bweese bwaandi , nde wuri na mpinu dza kutuunga nzo na dza kuha saala kuri bobanso basakumunu .
Me nya sii saka mboongo , bunu pe woolo , bunu pe binkuta bya muutu ko .
Beenu-meene luyaari ti myooko mimami , myabakisiryee me-meene na banduku baami mu manzala .
Mu myominso , me nyasoongiri kuri beenu ti , mu kusala , beenu luyelemini kubakisa bari na buyonsi , na kubaambuka mwooyo mu maampu ma Mfumu Yesu , bukuri nde-meene waleeriri ti : " Kiminu kibvuriri mu kuha ti na mu kutaambula . "
Bu kamana kuleele mimyo , nde watsuka maboongo ha nsi , na wasaambila na bobanso .
Bobanso bakoto kunsa bidilu byalaka , babeke kwemudumukuna mu nkiingu na kwemunyumutina .
Bo bamono ngebe mu ntoono yi kaleeriri ti , bo babweese kumono busu bwaandi ko . Bo bayende kumufila natee ku bwaatu .
Tumanaa kuhaambuka na bo , beetu twayende mu bwaatu , na twasuunguma mu mawasu , na twatubuka ku bula buri nkuumbu Kosi . Tumi mu kiluumbu kyanama twatubuka ku Lodo , na tuyisikaa haho tweensi ku Patara .
Bu twabaka bwaatu haho , dyaba kweende ku Foyiniki , tukotiri na twayende mu mubu .
Bu twatubuka bebele na Kiporo , tusisiri bula bubwo ku mpele yalumoso , na twayende mu bwaatu ku Sirya na twasunduka ha Tiro , bukuri bwaatu bwaba na bitotolo bya kusundula haho .
Bu twabaka bayiki haho , twalutisa biluumbu nsaamu kintwaari na bo . Mpeeve ya batwaalisa mu kuleele kuri Pawulo , ti yaa keende ku Yerusalemi ko .
Biluumbu bya kulitisa haho bu byawa , beetu twayende . Bo batufila mu kintwaari na bakasi na baala , natee ku mbisa bvula , na bu twatsukuma ha simu dya mubu ha twasaambila .
Tumi bu twahelesene mamboto ma kuhambusina , ha twanwaata mu bwaatu , na bo babvutuka kunsa bvula .
Beetu twasukisa nyeendulu ya mu bwaatu mu kuyisika ku tiro na kwesunduka ku Petolemayi . Bu twahelesene mamboto na bampaangi , ha twalutisa kiluumbu kyakitsiina na bo .
Kiluumbu kyanama beetu twayende na twatubuka ku Kayisareya , na twakoto mu nzo dinginsi diri kuumbu Filipo , nde waba mosi mu bo nsaamu ; tumi ha twadzakala ha nzo nde .
Nde waba na baala babakyeetu banswaasa bana baba bikulaana .
Bu twaba tweki haho mwaa-biluumbu byalaka , mubikiri mosi nkuumbu Angabo , wanangukini ku Yudaya , wakulumuka ,
na wayisa kuri beetu . Bu kaholo musweele Pawulo , wakaanga miilu na myooko mya nde-meene , na waleele ti : Mpeeve wuleele bumabu ti : muutu ngaa-musweele wu , Bayudayo sa bamukaanga bikonyi bumabu ku Yerusalemi , na kumuyekele mu myooko mya bangooyi .
Tumanaa kuyuka bubwo , beetu na baatu baba ha kibeendu kikyo , twayingukila Pawulo , ti yaa katoomboko ku Yerusalemi ko .
Haho , Pawulo wabvutula ti : " Nki luri mu kusa mu kudiila na mu kutabula me mutima ? Me nyayirima , kari mu kunu kuri ti bankaanga bikonyi ko , ngo na mu kufwa ku Yerusalemi mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu . "
Ngo bukuri nde waba wahele kutaambula mamo , beetu twawuriri kweetu , na twaleele ti : " Hemese kutya kwa Mfumu kuyirima ! "
Tumanaa kulutisa biluumbu bibyo haho , ha twatoomboko ku Yerusalemi .
Bayiki ba ku Kayisareya bayende se kintwaari na beetu , na batunata ku nzo muutu waba tutaambula , muutu wunde nkuumbu Naasoni , wa ku Kiporo , waba wayeki muyiki na kidzika .
Tumanaa kutubuka ku Yerusalemi , bampaangi batutaambula mu kiminu .
Mu kiluumbu kyanama , Pawulo na beetu , twakoto mu nzo Yakobo , kwaba se bakulu ba babakala bobanso .
Bu kabaha mamboto , wabeke kubayaabisa musamu mosi-mosi , mu myayirikiri Nzaambi , mu kisalu kya nde , ha kakati dya bangooyi .
Bo bamana kuyuka mamo , bakeembese Nzaambi , na bamuleele ti : " Mpaangi , moneeti , mburi mafuunda ma ba mwaasa kanyi ha kakati dya Bayudayo , na bakaangama kunsa mangisi .
Ngo bo bari mu kweyuka mu ntoono ya ye ti : ye wukweyikisa kuri Bayudayo bari ha kakati dya makaanda ti yaa bateende baala bubakala ko , na yaa benama bifu bya Bayudayo ko .
Ngo kusiila buri ? Bo bee bayukiri ti ye mwaakwiisa .
Yirika ma tukuleele beetu . Beetu turi na baatu bana hamaha ba mwaasa nsiilulu mu bo-meene .
Baholo na sa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo , na baha mboongo mpisi batebe makungulu mu mitu , na baatu bobanso sa bayaaba ti myominso mi bayukiri mu ntoono ye myabuunu , ngo kasi ye-meene wukwedyaatila kunsa mangisi .
Ngo kuri bangooyi babo bamwaasa kanyi , beetu twatinini kuri bo ma twakaangiri ti : bo yaa beedya toongo twa bibulu byadzusu mu kikabu kuri biteki ko , makila se kudya pe , toongo twa bibulu byadzusa mu nsukusulu muwuumunu se kudya pe , kimpala se kuta pe .
Haho , mu kiluumbu kyanama , Pawulo waholo babakala babo , wabaandika kusa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo , tumi wakoto mu Nzo-nzaambi mu kuyaabisa nsukulu biluumbu bya nsyemusunu , natee kiluumbu ki baha kikabu mu mosi-mosi mu bo .
Biluumbu byo nsaamu bibaanaa byeki suka , Bayudayo ba ku Asya , bamono Pawulo mu Nzo-nzaambi , na bakotoso kisaangila mu mpuumbu yoyinso , na bamukaanga .
Bo babeke kubikisa ti : " Babakala ba Isaheli , wasee lutubakisa ! Muutu wumawu wukweha nyikusulu kuri bobanso na mwomunso , dzahele bubwe mu kaanda , mu mangisi na mu kibeendu ki ; ha yulu haho se nde mwaakotoso Bahelene mu Nzo-nzaambi , na mwaasumuna kibeendu kyangisi ki .
Bo baba bamwaatekesele kumono Torofimo wa ku Efeso , kunsa bvula , kintwaari na nde , na bo baba kutsima ti Pawulo mwaamukotoso mu Nzo-nzaambi .
Kisaangila kyabwa mu bvula dyodinso , na baatu bobanso bakutukuna . Bu bakaanga Pawulo , bamukooko ku mbasi Nzo-nzaambi , na hanaho , bo bakaanga myeelu .
Bu baba beki saka kumudzusa , musamu watubuka kuri mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , ti kisaangila kimwaakoto mu Yerusalemi dyodinso .
Mu mawasu-mawasu , nde waholo bayongolo , na bakuutu ba mikaangu mya nkama bayongolo , na badzumuna kwaba baatu babo . Bo bu bamono mukuutu mukaangu wa fuunda , na bayongolo , ha bahoto kulata Pawulo .
Haho , mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , bu kakokosolo wakaanga Pawulo , na watuma ti bamukaanga mu masyeene moolo . Tumi nde wasaka kuyaaba , muutu wu na kari , na nki kayirikirye .
Ngo kunsa mpuumbu , bamaba kuleele mi , bakaka kuleele mikimi ; na nde kasii yirika kuyaaba lumvuki ko , mu ntoono kisaangila . Nde watuma bamunata ku lumpaangu lwa dzakala bayongolo .
Pawulo kabaanaa weki ha kikaari , bayongolo bamunata bukuri mpuumbu yaba na kabala dyalaka .
Baatu ba bu fundu-fundu baba kwenamaana na bakwebikisa ti : " Mudzusa ! "
Babaanaa beki baandika kukoto ku lumpaangu lu dzakala bayongolo , Pawulo waleele kuri mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo ti : " Buri me nyiri na miswa mu kuleele ntoono kuri ye ? Nde wamuleele ti : " Ye yaari kihelene ?
Buri ye wuri muutu wa ku Ngipiti , wabee kotoso kisaangila , mu biluumbu bi , na kunata mafuunda mana ma bangaa-tungu ku nsi yankatu ko ? "
Pawulo waleele ti : " Me Muyudayo nyabutuka ku Taraso , mu nkoonsi ya Kilikya , nyiri muutu wa bula buri bwayabakana kwalaka . Me nyikuyingukiri , ti ha me miswa me nzoonso kuri baatu ba . "
Bu bamuha miswa , Pawulo wateleme ha yulu kikaari , na wanaanguna kooko mu kusa kidiimbu mpisi baatu bawura . Baatu bobanso bu bawura na pwooro , nde wabadzoonsolo mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho .
" Bampaangi na bataata , yukee ma nyileele me mu kukalila nyutu yaami . "
Bo bu bayuka wuri mu kubadzoonsolo mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho , bahaamisa na kuwura . Nde waleele ti :
" Me Muyudayo , nyabutuka ku Taraso , mu nkoonsi ya Kilikya . Me nyabuukula ha bvula dimadi , nyayika ha miilu mya Ngamalyele , bunu buyelemini mu kubvumina mangisi ma bakuutu . Me nyaba na kuheme mu Nzaambi , bunu bu luri beenu lolo dimadi .
Me nyakwaamisa natee mu kiteesu kya kudzusa , babo bakwenama nzila yimayi , na nyasoko bakyeetu na babakala mu boroko .
Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , na kikuutu kyokinso , kya bakulu ba babakala lo bateeri kimbaangi . Me kuri bo nyataamburi mikaanda mu ntoono bampaangi bari ku Damasiko , na me nyayende kukwo , mu kwebakaanga na kubatwaala ku Yerusalemi mpisi baba seembe .
« Bu nyaba mu nzila , na nyeki kokosolo na Damasiko mu nkati-mwiini , bu nyeki monaa na sisuu , buungi bwansisi bwandyengekele mpele na mpele .
Me nyabwa ha nsi , na nyayuka mbeembu yaleele kuri me ti : " Sawuli , Sawuli , buri wuri mu kwekwaamisa me ? "
Me nyafuula ti : " Ye na , Mfumu ? " Nde waleele ti : " Me ngo Yesu wa ku Nadzareti wu wuri mu kwekwaamisa . "
Baba kintwaari na me bamwiini buungi , ngo kasi basii yuka mbeembu yaba dzoonso kuri me ko .
Me nyafuula ti : " Nki me nyelemini kusa Mfumu ? " Mfumu wandeele ti : " Teleme yende ku Damasiko , tumi bakuleele myominso mi bakutumini kusa . "
Ngo bukuri nyaba nyahele kumono mu ntoono buungi bwaba semaana , babo baba kintwaari na me bampolo mu kooko , na banata ku Damasiko .
Kwaba muutu mosi , nkuumbu Ananya , wuri na kinzaambi bunu buri mangisi , wuri na kimbaangi kyakibwete , ha kakati dya Bayudayo bobanso badzakalaa haho .
Nde wayisa , wamono me , na wandeele ti : " Sawuli , mpaangi yaami , miisu myaaku mibweese kumono ! " Na ha nsi na nsi , me nyabweese kumono , na nyatala kuri nde .
Nde waleele ti : " Nzaambi ya bataayi beetu , wakusoolo mu kuyaaba kutya kwaandi , mu kumono wunde wasuunguma , na mu kuyuka mbeembu ya munwa waandi ,
bukuri ye sa ba mbaangi yaandi , ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , mu misamu myominso mi mwiini na mi yukiri .
Ngo mu lumalu , nki wubweese kukiinga ? Teleme , taambula mbotokulu , na mpemusunu ya masumu maaku , mu nteelulu nkuumbu yaandi . " »
« Me bu nyabvutuka ku Yerusalemi , na bu nyaba saambilaa mu Nzo-nzaambi , Mpeeve ya mbaka ,
na me nyamono Mfumu , na waleele kuri me ti : " Wasula , na pala mu mawasu mu Yerusalemi , bukuri bo bataambula kimbaangi kya ye mu me ko . "
Me nyaleele ti : " Mfumu , bo bayaari ti me nyabee kweyendaana mu manzo mankutukunu , mu kwekotoso mu boroko , na kweseembe mu makwa bobanso basiila kanyi mu ye .
Na mu ntaangu yi baba tsaamuna makila ma Estefano mbaangi yaaku , me nyaba hanaho me-meene , nyataamburi mimyo na nyaba nyakwaata binkuta bya babo baba mudzusa . "
Nde wandeele ti : " Yende , bukuri me sa nyakuheeke kuri makaanda mari ku la ! " »
Baatu baba yukaana Pawulo natee mu ntoono yiyo , tumi bo bafula misaakulu baleele ti : " Yisilee muutu wa bumabu ha butoto , nde wahele kuyelemene kuba wamwooyo . "
Bo bafula misaakulu , balooso binkuta bya bo , na banaanguna fuunda ku yulu .
Mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo watuma ti bamukotoso kunsa lumpaangu , na bamufuulila mu nkwaasulu , mpisi kaleele mu nkya ntoono baatu bari mu kufula misaakulu mu nde .
Ngo babaanaa beki mukaanga misiinga mu kumulata , Pawulo wafuula kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo waba haho ti : " Buri beenu luri na miswa mya kulata muutu bari Loma , kuri bahele kumukesele mukanu ? "
Mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu kayuka bubwo , wakokosolo kuri mukuutu fuunda , wamuyaabisa wamuleele ti : " Nki ye keti kusa ? Muutu bari Loma nde kari .
Mukuutu fuunda bu kakokosolo , wamufuula ti : " Leele me , buri ye muutu bari Loma wuri ? " Pawulo waleele ti : " Heehe . "
Mukuutu fuunda waleele ti : " Me nyaheeri mboongo dzalaka mu kuba muutu bari Loma . " Ngo Pawulo waleele ti : " Me ngo wuri mu mbutukulu . "
Hanaho , babo baketi kumulata nkwaasulu basasika na nde , na mukuutu fuunda wabaka boomo , bu kayaaba ti muutu bari Loma nde kari , na nde bee mwaakumukaanga bikonyi .
Mu kiluumbu kyanama , mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , bu kaba na nzala kuyaaba mu nkya ntoono Bayudayo baba mufuundila , nde waleele bamunyanguna , na watuma ti bakutikisa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi , na kikuutu kyokinso . Tumi nde bu kasundulaa Pawulo , wamusuusa ha busu bwa bo .
Pawulo katala kikuutu kya Bayudayo kisooso waleele ti : « Bampaangi baami , mu nsimunu yaami yoyinso , me nyadyeeti ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu kifwaani kyakibwe natee kiluumbu ki . »
Mukuutu ngaanga-nzaambi , Ananya , watuma kuri baba haho , mu kumulata mu munwa .
Ngo Pawulo waleele kuri nde ti : « Ngo Nzaambi ye-meene kalata , kibaki kyakila mpeembe ! Ye wadzakala haho mu kutsuundisa bunu buri mangisi , na mu nsaanunu mangisi ye wutuma balata me ! »
Baba haho baleele ti : « Ye tukiri mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi ! »
Pawulo waleele ti : « Bampaangi baami , me mbee nyahele kuyaaba ti nde mukuutu ngaanga-nzaambi . Mukwongo , matinu maleele ti : " Yaa dzoonsolo bwabubi mu mfumu kaanda ko ! " »
Pawulo bu kaba kayaari ti kunsa kikuutu babamosi baba Basaduki , na bakaka Bafarisi , nde wabikisa ha busu bwa bo ti : « Bampaangi baami , me nyiri mu Mufarisi , mwaana Mufarisi , [ me ] bari mu kutsuundisa , mu ntoono nsiitu na mu ntoono mfulukulu ya bafwa . »
Nde bu kamana kuleele bubwo , yumu dyabwa ha kakati dya Bafarisi na Basaduki ; mpuumbu yakabuka .
Mukwongo , Basaduki bakooleelaa ti , mfulukulu , na bambasi , na mampeeve biri ko ; ngo kasi Bafarisi babitaambulaa .
Misaakulu myaminene myayukukuna , batina bamosi bari mu kibari kya Bafarisi , bateleme , basa nkalikisi baleele ti : " Beetu twahele kumono dyadibi mu muutu wu ; kampe mbasi bunu pe mpeeve yidzoonsiri kuri nde ! "
Yumu dyamonoko dya makwa , mukuutu wabaka boomo ti Pawulo bee bamusebiri . Nde watuma bayongolo basunduka , beende bamupalisa ha kakati dya bari mu kuyumuna , na bamunata ku lumpaangu lu dzakalaa bayongolo .
Mu butsuku bwaba nama , Mfumu wamonoko kuri nde waleele ti : « Ba na kibakala , bukuri , bunu bu teerye kimbaangi mu mitariri me ku Yerusalemi , bunubwo se ye yelimini , kweeta kimbaangi ku Loma . »
Bwiisi bu bwakya , Bayudayo basa mfuundu , balaba maalu bo-meene baleele ti , natee bakiri kudzusa Pawulo tumi bo badya na banwa .
Badiiri kikaandu kikyo baba baluta makuumi mana ma baatu .
Bo bakokosolo kuri bangaanga-nzaambi na kuri bakulu ba babakala baleele kuri bo ti : « Beetu tumwaalaba-maalu beetu-meene ti , beetu mu kusa kitotolo mu munwa , natee beetu twakiri kudzusa Pawulo .
Hango mu lumalu , yukusunee beenu na mukuutu bayongolo kintwaari na kikuutu kya Bayudayo , batwaala Pawulo kuri beenu , luyirika kufyongokono mya nde , na beetu , tekesele katubuka hamaha , twayirima mu kumudzusa . »
Ngo mwaana kibusi kya Pawulo wayuka kele didyo ; wayende ku lumpaangu lu dzakalaa bayongolo , wayaabisa momanso kuri Pawulo .
Pawulo kateelaana mosi mu bakuutu ba nkama bayongolo waleele ti : « Nata munkuula wu kuri mukuutu fuunda , bukuri nde wuri na ma kuyaabisa kuri nde . »
Wunde kamuholaana , wumuneti kuri mukuutu fuunda na waleele ti : " Pawulo wuri mu boroko , teeriryee me , na ndoombiri , me nyikutwalikila munkuula wu , wuri na dya kuleele kuri ye . "
Mukuutu fuunda , wamukwaata mu kooko , wayende na nde ha lumperi , wasaka kuyaaba : " Nkya mo wuri na mo ma kuleele kuri me ? "
Nde waleele ti : " Bayudayo bamwaakaanga kitsimi kya kuloombo kuri ye , mpisi heki bweepari , ye nata Pawulo kuri kikuutu , bunu ti ye tiiri kuyaaba na tswitswikii mya mu nde . "
Ye ngo wuri , yaa tambukila mya bo ko ; baatu baluta lutaangu lwa makuumi mana bamwaamulebekele mweete . Bo balaburyee maalu mu bo-meene ti , natee badzusiri Pawulo tumi badiiri na banwiini . Mu lumalu bo bayirima , bakiingika lusiilulu lwa ye .
Hango , mukuutu fuunda wabvutula munkuula wunde , na wamudika ti yaa kuyaabisa ma kamuyaabisiri mamo , kuri muutu ti mosi .
Mukuutu fuunda , bu kateele bakuutu boolo ba nkama , waleele ti : " Holee nkama dzoolo dza bayongolo , makuumi tsaamu ma banati ba makavaalu na nkama dzoolo dza bakebi , bayirima mu kwende ku Kayisareya , mu kilookolo kya bitatu kya butsuku .
Yirikeenu se makavaalu ma lunatina Pawulo mpee-mpolo kuri ngoforo Felikisi . "
Nde watina mukaanda , na mi katinini mimami :
" Kolodyo Lisya , kuri ngoforo ya lukiinsu Felikisi , mboto !
Muutu wu , Bayudayo bamukaangiri , na bamono dyo ti bayelemene kumudzusa . Me bu nyayukiri ti muutu bari Loma , ha nyayensi na mpuumbu bayongolo mu kumukuula .
Bu nyasakiri kuyaaba bubi bu bari mu kumfuundila , me nyamuneti ha busu bwa kikuutu kya bo .
Me mwiinyee ti mi bari mu kumufuundila , mitariri mi bakwesa nkalikisi mu mangisi ma bo . Kuri musamu ti mosi ko , mu mi bari mu kumufuundila , wu bayelemini mu kumudzusa bunu pe mu kumusoko mu boroko .
Bu ba nyaabisiri kele dya mu nde , mawasu-mawasu , me nyikuheekiri nde , na me ndoombiri kuri bari mu kumufuunda , biisa baleele ha busu bwa ye , myamibi mi kari kayirika . "
Hango , bayongolo , bunu buri lutumu lu bari bataambula , baholo Pawulo , bamunata mu butsuku ku bvula dya Antipatiri .
Bukyaanaa , baha miswa kuri banati ba makavaalu mu kweemuholo na kumunata ; tumi bayongolo babvutuka ku badzakalaa .
Bu bakoto mu Kayisareya , bayakisa mukaanda kuri ngoforo na basoongo Pawulo kuri nde .
Bu kataanga mukaanda , wafuula bula bwa fumuni Pawulo , na bamuyaabisa ti ku Kilikya .
Nde waleele ti : " Me kukuywiila mu ntaangu yiri bafuundi ba ye batelemini ha busu bwa me . " Nde waha miswa mu kumukebele mu nzo miyalu ya Erode .
Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitaanu , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi Ananya wayisa kintwaari na bakulu ba babakala babamosi , na nzoonsi mosi ya nkariri , nkuumbu yaandi Teretilo , babo bafuundiri Pawulo kuri ngoforo .
Bu bamuteele , Teretilo wabaandika mu kumufuunda , waleele ti : " Walukiinsu , beetu twataambula kiyeengi kyakinene , na mbweeyulu ya nsi yimayi yiri mu kumonokono mu ntoono bweese bwa ye ,
Walukiinsu Felikisi , beetu tutoondo kwalaka bu tutaambulaa mamo , mu mpisi ntaangu , na mu bibeendu byobinso .
Me ntiiri kudya ntaangu ye yalaka ko , me nyikuloombo mu kuba na mpemisi mu kuywiila beetu , mu mwaa-myamikufi .
Beetu tubakuryee ti muutu wu kiyoolo kiri , mukuutu kisaangila kuri Bayudayo bobanso , munu mu bari bayende kwetuunga ; tumi ha yulu haho se , nde mukuutu kabu dya minsaambiri myahaambuka mya ku Nadzareti .
Nde watsiitsiri kusumuna Nzo-nzaambi , mu didyo , beetu twamukaangiri . [
Mbuti ye wumufuuriri , lo ye sa mono ti , mi turi mu kumufuundila miri myangwanwa . "
Bayudayo basika ti mimyo bunubwo miri .
Ngoforo bu kamuha miswa mu kunzoonso , Pawulo wabvutula waleele ti : " Kuholosono mibvu myalaka , me nyaari ti ye wuri nzoonsi mu kaanda dimadi . Hango nkuumbu , me nyikalila nyutu yaami mu nsiitu .
Ye wayelemene kuyaaba ti , me nyakiri kukukisa pe biluumbu kuumi na byoolo , kuholosono ku nyatoombikiri me ku Yerusalemi , mu kusaambila .
Muutu ti mosi wahele kumono me ti mu nzo-nzaambi , kuri nyikalikisa na muutu , bunu pe nyisinda mpuumbu mu kusa kisaangila , ti mu manzo ma nkutukunu , ti kunsa bvula .
Bo ka babangusina kusoongo kitotolo ti kimosi ko kuri ye , mu mi bari mu kufuundila me .
Me ntaambiri musamu wunde wu bari mu kuleele me , mu nzila ya kabu . Mukwongo me nyiri mu kwesaambila Nzaambi yiyo ya bataayi beetu bobanso . Me nyasa kanyi mu matinu mu Mangisi na Babikiri .
Nsiitu dzi nyasa mu Nzaambi , dzinidzo se bo bari na dzo , sa kwaba mfulukulu baatu basuunguma na bangaa-bubayi .
Me-meene nyisalila kwa mu kumonoko kwahele maseembu mu nsimunu yaami , ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na ha busu bwa baatu mu mantaangu momanso .
« Ha mambisa mya mibvu myalaka , me nyiisiri kubvutuka ku Yerusalemi , mu kutwaala lubakusu kuri kaanda dyaami , na kuha bikabu .
Mu ntaangu ya bikabu yiyo , bo bamwiini me nyatsyeemeke mu Nzo-nzaambi , kari na mpuumbu ko , kari se mu kisaangila ko .
Ngo kasi Bayudayo babamosi ba ku Asya , babeeri haho , bo baketyee kufuunda me kuri ye , mbuti bamwii dyadibi mu me .
Bunu pe , bamaba baleele , bubi bu bamwiini mu me , ha nyabee nyateleme ha busu bwa kikuutu kya Bayudayo .
Bunu pe mu mbeembu yomosi yi nyabikisiri me , ha kakati dya bo , " mu ntoono mfulukulu ya bafwa , me bari mu kutsuundisa , lolo di ha busu bwa beenu ! " »
Felikisi wayiinga kiluumbu , bu kaba yaari myominso mi tariri Nzila , na waleele ti : " Tumi ha sunduka Lisya , mukuutu fuunda , me mfyongokono misamu mi tariri beenu . "
Nde watuma mukuutu nkama mu kumukebe mu boroko , kuri wuri na mwaa-bunsaalisi , na se kuri banduku baandi bamubakisa .
Ha mambisa ma mwaa-biluumbu , Felikisi bo na mukasi waandi wa Muyudayo , Durusila , bayisa . Batumisa Pawulo na bamuyuka wudzoonsolo mu kanyi dya Kiristo Yesu .
Bo bayolo na nde mu mi tariri nsungumunu , mu nkebulu nyutu na mu mutsuundu wukwiisa . Felikisi wabwiila kinkuuku , waleele ti : " Mu ntaangu yi , yende ; me mbaka mpwaani sa nyikuteele lukimi . "
Nde waba nsiitu ti , Pawulo sa kamuha mboongo ; mu didyo nde kaba Muteelaana kinsosi-kinsosi mu kuyolaa na nde .
Mibvu myoolo bu myalabuka , Felikisi wataambula muyiingisi , nkuumbu yaandi , Porokyo Festo . Wunde se bu katya kubweeye ha busu bwa Bayudayo , wahemese Pawulo mu boroko .
Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitatu bi katubukiri , Festo wayisika ku Kayisareya , mu kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi .
Bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi na Bayudayo ba lukiinsu , bafuunda Pawulo , na bayingukila Festo .
Bo baloombo bweese kuri nde , mpisi kaba bvutukila Pawulo ku Yerusalemi , na kukwo , bamulebekele mweete mu nzila mu kumudzusa .
Ngo kasi nde wabvutula ti : Pawulo wuri mu boroko dya ku Kayisareya , na me-meene Festo nyiri mu kubvutuka mu mawasu .
Nde wabweese kuleele ti : " Hango babo bamono ti bakuka ngo bari basunduka ha kimosi na me ; mbuti bari na kibila mu muutu wunde , lo bamufuunda ! "
Bu kalutisa biluumbu mpoomo bunu pe kuumi , nde wasunduka ku Kayisareya . Kiluumbu kyanama , bu kaba kadzakala mu nzo ya mutsuundu , waloombo ti bamutwaalikila Pawulo .
Bu kayisa , Bayudayo bafumini ku Yerusalemi bamudyengekele , bamufuunda mu myalaka , miri bahele kubangisina kusoongo .
Pawulo wakalila nyutu yaandi waleele ti : " Me nyahele kuyirika sumu ti dimosi , ti ha busu bwa Mangisi ma Bayudayo , ti mu mya mu Nzo-nzaambi , ti mu mi tariri Kayisari . "
Festo bu katya kubweeye ha busu bwa Bayudayo , mu mpeelu mvutu kuri Pawulo , waleele kuri nde ti : " Buri ye tiiri kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi , mu mimami , mpisi bakutsuundisa , kuri me nyiri ha nsi ? "
Pawulo waleele ti : " Me nyateleme ha busu bwa mutsuundu wa Kayisari , kukwo me ntiiri ti bansuundisa . Me nyahele kuyirika dyadibi kuri Bayudayo , bunu bu yirikiri ye kuyaaba .
Mbuti me nyasa lumvuki , na nyayirika ntoono , yiri nyayelemene kufwa , lo me nyahele kubisa kufwa . Ngo mbuti kwahele ntoono yangwanwa mu mi bari mu kumfuundila , lo kuri muutu wuri na miswa mu kuyekele me mu myooko mya bo ko . Ngo me ndoombiri bansuundisa ha busu bwa Kayisari "
Haho Festo , bu kayende ku mfuundu na ba nde , wabvutula ti : " Ku Kayisari ye loombiri mu kweende , kunukwo ye wukweende . "
Mwa biluumbu bu byaluta , mbyaasi Angiripa na Berenike batubuka ku Kayisareya , baha Festo mboto .
Bo badzakala kukwo biluumbu byalaka ; Festo wayala mampolo kuri mbyaasi , mu mi tariri Pawulo , waleele ti : " Boroko dimosi Felikisi kasiisiri .
Me bu nyayeensi ku Yerusalemi , bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi , na bakulu ba babakala ba Bayudayo banyaabisiri misamu mya mu nde , na baloombiri ti me nyimukesele mukanu .
Me nyabvutiri kuri bo ti , bari Loma bahele na kifu kya kuyekele mu myooko mya baatu , muutu wu bafuundiri , tekesele kabaka mpwaani ha busu bwa bamufuundiri mu kukalila nyutu , mu mi bamufuundiri .
Hango [ bo ] bobanso bayisiri ha , kwahele kumpa laki . Bu bukyeeri , me nzakiri mu nzo muyalu , na ntumisini bantwalikila muutu wunde .
Bu twadzakala , bafuundi bateleme , ngo kuri ti dimosi ko , mu mi bamufuundiri myabwanikina na mi nyabee tsima me myamibi .
Ngo dzini mwaa-nkalikisi mu mi tariri nsaambukulu yaaku ; mi bari bamubelele mitariri muutu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Yesu , wuri wafwa , ngo kasi Pawulo wuri mu kuleele ti wuri mwooyo .
Ngo bukuri me nyahele kuyaaba mi nyisa , me nyafuuriri Pawulo , mbuti tiiri kweende ku Yerusalemi , na kukwo bamutsuundisa mu mimyo .
Kasi Pawulo waloombo ti musamu nde kaba wakebu , natee Oguste lalimini nde . Mu bubwo , me nyatuma ti bamukebe natee ku nyimuheeke me kuri Kayisari .
Angiripa waleele kuri Festo ti : " Me se bee ntiiri kuywiila muutu wunde . " Festo wabvutula ti : " Bweepari sa wumuywiila . "
Hango , bu bwakya , Angiripa bo na Berenike bayisa mu lukiinsu na mpuumbu baatu , na bakoto mu nzo mutsuundu kintwaari na bakuutu ba mikaangu mya fuunda , na baatu bari bunu buri lukiinsu lwaaku mu bvula . Festo bu kaha lutumu , batwaala Pawulo .
Festo waleele ti : " Mbyaasi Angiripa na beenu bobanso luri hamaha , monee muutu wuri mu ntoono nde , mpuumbu Bayudayo yoyinso yayisiri kuri me , ku Yerusalemi , na hamaha se , mu kuloombo mu misaakulu ti yaa kabweese kuba wamwooyo ko .
Mu bitsimi bya me , me nyahele kumono di kari kasa mu kubwiilila mukanu wa lufwa . Mu bukuri nde waloombo ti musamu waandi , Oguste wuyelemini kudzoonso nde , me nyakaangiri kitsimi mu kumuheeke .
Me nyahele na dya butswiswikii dya kutinina mukuutu , mu didyo me nyikutweesikiri nde hamaha , mpisi heki ha lumbisa lwa bifuuri bya beenu , me mbaka mya kutina .
Me madyeele mawa , mu kuheeke ku Loma boroko kwahele kusoongo bubi , bu bari mu kumufuundila .
Angiripa waleele kuri Pawulo ti : " Wuri na miswa mu kukalila nyutu yaaku . " Haho Pawulo kalaambula kooko wadzoonso mu kukalila nyutu yaandi :
" Mu myominso mya fuundiri me Bayudayo , mbyaasi Angiripa , me nyiri na kiminu kyalaka mu kukalila nyutu yaami ha busu bwa ye , lolo dimadi ,
bukuri ye wuri na nyaabulu ya myominso , mitariri bifu bya Bayudayo na mi bakwesiila bo nkalikisi . Ha ngo nkuumbu , me nyikuyingukila mu nkindusulu-mutima mu kunywiila .
" Hango kidziingu kyaami , kuholosono kunu mbandukulu butuuti bwaami , me nyikiyookisiirye hansa kaanda dyaami ; Bayudayo bobanso badzakala mu Yerusalemi bayaari .
Kuholosono na kidzika banyaari ; lo bateeriri me kimbaangi . Me netyee kidziingu kyaami bunu Mufarisi , bunu buri nsambukulu yeetu .
Na mu lumalu mu nsiitu dza lusiilulu dzasa Nzaambi kuri bataayi beetu , me ntelimini ku mutsuundu .
Kintwaari kya makaanda mo kuumi na moolo meetu , makwesalila mu kifiki , butsuku na mwiini , mari na nsiitu mu kumono nsiilulu dzidzo . Mu ntoono nsiitu dzidzo , mbyaasi , Bayudayo bafuundiri me .
Bukuri ki luri mu kutsima , ti Nzaambi kari mfulukisa bafwa ko ?
" Me ngo wuri , nyaba na kitsimi kya kunwaanisa , mu manzila momanso , nkuumbu Yesu , wa ku Nadzareti .
Mamo se , me nyasiiri ku Yerusalemi . Nyasoko bangisi balaka mu boroko , bu nyataamburi lutumu lwa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi . Me nyataamburi kuri ti babadzusa , habaanaa babakesiri mukanu wa lufwa .
Me nyayende mu manzo ma nkutukunu mu kwebaseembe . Nyabakwiikisa mu kuri basaana nkuumbu Yesu , na mu nkesi dzalutila kiteesu , nyabanama natee mu mabvula manzeense .
Mu ntoono misamu mimyo , me nyayende ku Damasiko , na lutumu na kisalu kya mpeeri bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi .
Mu nkati-mwiini , ha kakati dya nzila , buungi bubvuriri na ntaangu , bwafumuna ku yulu , bwadyengekele me , ha kimosi na baba kwemfila .
Beetu bobanso twabwa ha nsi , me nyayuka mbeembu yaba leele me mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho ti : " Sawuli , Sawuli ! Mu nki wuri mu kwekwaamisa me ? Diri mpasi kuri ye , mu kunwaanisa kutya kwa Nzaambi .
Me nyafuula ti : " Mfumu ye na ? Mfumu waleele ti : " Me ngo Yesu , wu wuri mu kwekwaamisa .
Kasi , siimbika na teleme mu miilu myaaku ; me nyikumonokini mu kusa ye kisari kyaami na mbaangi [ me ] mu ma mwiini , na ma wubweese kumono , ha nyikumonokono me .
Mu kukuula ye mu kaanda , na kweende ku nyikuheeke me kuri bangooyi .
Me nyikuheekiri mu kudzibula miisu mya bo , mpisi bapala mu mampimbisi biisa ku buungi , bapala na mu lutumu lwa Satana , mu kuba mu lwa Nzaambi , mu kutaambula mpemusunu ya masumu , na bataambula kikuuku ha kakati dya bangisi mu kanyi dibasa mu me . "
Mu bubwo , mbyaasi Angiripa , me nyasii tungukila mamono-miisu ma ku yulu mamo ko .
Kubaandukila kuri bari ku Damasiko , tumi bari ku Yerusalemi , nkoonsi yoyinso ya Yudaya , na kuri bangooyi , nyayikisa ti bayiinga madyeele , na babvutuka kuri Nzaambi , na basalila biyiriki byayelemene na nyiingulu madyeele .
Mu ntoono yiyo , [ bu nyaba ] mu Nzo-nzaambi , Bayudayo bankaanga na basaka bwa kunzusila .
Me Nzaambi wa bakisa me , natee mu kiluumbu ki . Me nyiri hamaha , mu kuta kimbaangi kuri bilesi na bakuutu . Babikiri na Moose bayaabisiri miyelemini kwiisa , minimyo se me nyiri mu kwetswiikisa .
Mbuti Kiristo wamwiini mpasi , na nde ngo watete mu kufuluka mu bafwa , nde yelemini kuyaabisa buungi kuri kaanda na kuri bangooyi . "
Pawulo bu kari mu kukalila nyutu mu mamo , Festo mu mbeembu yadzaangama waleele ti : " Ye walawuka , Pawulo ! Nyaabulu yi wuri na ye , kukunata ku kulawuka ! "
Kasi Pawulo wabvutula ti : " Me nyahele kulawuka , Walukiinsu Festo , ngo ma ndeeriri me ma ngwanwa na ma madyeele .
Mukwongo mbyaasi yaari myominso mimyo , na me lo nzoonsiri mu nsiitu ha busu bwa nde . Me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti nde kadziimburi ti dimosi mu mamo ko , bukuri mamo mahele kuyirima mu nsweeki .
Buri ye wusa kanyi mu babikiri , mbyaasi Angiripa ? Me nyaari ti ye wusa kanyi ! "
Angiripa waleele kuri Pawulo ti : " Hasiiri , hantele ye tiiri kukitula me mukiristo . "
Pawulo waleele kuri nde ti : " Ntaangu yiba yantele , bunu pe yalaka , me nyisaambila Nzaambi , kari mu wunu ye ko , ngo mu beenu-banso luri mu kuyuka me lolo di , mpisi luba bunu me , ngo kwahele bikonyi bi ! "
Mbyaasi , ngoforo , Berenike na bobanso baba na bo , bateleme ,
na bu bayende ku mfuundu , badzoonso bo na bo , baleele ti : " Muutu wu wahele kuyirika ntoono ti mosi wu bayelemini kumudzusa bunu pe kumusa mu bikonyi . "
Angiripa waleele kuri Festo ti : " Muutu wu beeri wayelemene kumupatula , mbuti bee wahele kuloombo kuri ti Kayisari kalalama . "
Bu baholo nzeengulu dza kunata beetu ku Italya , baha Pawulo na maboroko makimi kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo , nkuumbu yaandi Yulyo , mu mukaangu bayongolo wa Oguste .
Beetu twanwaata mu bwaatu , bwa Adaramitino , bwaba kweende mu mabula ma Asya , mari mu teke mubu . Baba na beetu ngo Aristarako wa ku Makedonya wudzakalaa ku Tesalonika .
Kiluumbu kyanama , beetu twatuula ku Sidoni . Yulyo waba hololo Pawulo mu bumuutu , wamuha miswa mu kwemono banduku baandi , mu kutaambula lubakusu lukaba na nzala lwo .
Bu twayisika haho , twayende mu teteke dya simu dya Kiporo , mu ntoono kiteembu kyaba tubwaana ,
na beetu twataba mubu , bebele dya Kilikya na Pamfilya , na twasunduka ku Mira mya ku Likya .
Haho , mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu kamono bwaatu bwa ku Alekanderi bwaba kweende ku Italya , nde wutunwaatisa mu bwo .
Mu biluumbu byalaka , beetu twaba kweyende buke-buke mu maampa ; na mu mpasi dzalaka beetu twatubuka ku teke bvula dya Kinido , ngo twasii bangusina kusunduka haho ko , mu ntoono kiteembu kyaba tukakisila . Beetu twayendekele mu teteke dya simu , twabwa ha kakati dya maampa dya Salemone , mu kutubuka ku Kerete .
Mu mpasi , beetu twatubuka ku kibeendu ki bateela ti Masabu Mamabwete , bebele na bvula dya Lasaya .
Ntaangu yalaka yaba yimwaaluta , na bwaba bweki bwabubi mu kweyendekele mu maampa , mu bukuri ntaangu ya loomi yaba yimwaaluta . Pawulo walubula ,
waleele kuri bo ti : " Banduku baami , me nyimono ti budyeengi bu , buri na nsisi , kari munu mu bitotolo ko , ngo se na mu kidziingu kya muutu-muutu mu beetu . "
Kasi mukuutu nkama waba bvuriri kusiila nsiitu mu munati na mu ngaa-bwaatu , ti na mu maba leele Pawulo .
Ngo bukuri sabu dyaba bwa kulutisila pe ntaangu ya kyoosi , balaka baha kitsimi kya kuyisika haho , mu kuri ti kampe tutubukiri ku Foyiniki , sabu dya Kerete , ku teke sude bebele na weste na ku node bebele na weste .
Kiteembu kyadzuuna kyafumuna ku sude kyabeke kupeepe . Bo batsima ti lo beensi kwaaku ; ngo bayende mu nzila ya Kerete .
Mwaa-kidzika kyantele kiteembu kya makwa , ki bateelaana Erakilo , kyasangumuka .
Kiteembu kyanata bwaatu , na bu twaba bwakusiila pe , twayendekele bunubwo .
Bu twaba mu kuluta ku nsuku kibuma ki bateelaa Kawuda , mu mpasi dzalaka beetu twabangisini kaholo mwaa-bwaatu bwantele bwa lubakusu .
Bakolokoso bwaatu bubwo mu misiinga mya lubakusu . Mu kubata kuri ti bakwiisa kutukoko natee ku Siriti , bo basundula bitsuri bya miti bikoobaanaa byakolokoso mu bwaatu , na bahemese bee yendekele mu kiteembu bunubwo .
Kiluumbu kyaba nama , kiteembu bunu kyaba kyakiri mu kutuningisa . Baatu babeke kulooso bitotolo mu kuleengese bwaatu .
Na mu kiluumbu kyabitatu , bo basundula makuunsi ma bwaatu mu myooko mya bo-meene .
Mu biluumbu byalaka , ntaangu na bambwetete byasii pala ko ; kiteembu kyasii kuluka ti mwaa-kwantele ko , na nsiitu ya kubvuuka yaba yeki yo pe .
Byandya byaba bimwaawa na kidzika . Pawulo , bu kateleme ha kakati dya bo , waleele ti : " Ho ! Banduku , bwaba bwayelemini ti beenu lunwiila ; twaketyee kuyisika Kerete ko , mu kuhele kusuumbuka na kuhele kuhoomboso byobinso bi .
Mu lumalu me nyiluloombo ti lwaatee kibakala . Kuri muutu mu beenu wufwa ko , ngo bunu bwaatu bubvukuna .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi yi bakiri me , na yi nkoosalila me , mbasi yaandi yiisiryee kumonokono me , mu butsuku
na yileeriryee kuri me ti : " Pawulo ya baa na boomo ko , ye yelemini kuteleme ha busu bwa Kayisari ; na mono , Nzaambi wukusiiriri bweese na bobanso ba luri mu budyeengi .
Hango nkuumbu , banduku beenee na kibakala , me nyiri na nsiitu mu Nzaambi ; mamo ma kaleeriryee kuri me , sa mayirima .
Buri bwabubwete ti tutelemee ha yulu kibuma .
Butsuku bubwo bwaba bweki bwa kuumi na bina , na twaba tumwaawumuka wa Adirya . Mu kakati dya butsuku , bisari bya mu bwaatu , babaka kitsimi ti kampe tukokisiri bebele na butoto .
Bo badiimba musundu , na babaka mankwaanga makuumi moolo ; bu bayende ha mankula , babweese kudiimba , na babaka mankwaanga kuumi na mataanu .
Bo bamono boomo , ti bwee tukakiri mu matari , basundula binko bina ku mambisa ma bwaatu , na basuka mutima ti nkani bwiisi buwasula mu kukya .
Bisari bya bwaatu baba na nzala kuyitika ; bu basundula mwaa-bwaatu bwa lubakusu , ku mutu bwaatu , bo kuleele ti binko bakwee yirika .
Pawulo waleele kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo na bayongolo ti : " Mbuti baatu ba bahele kuba munsa bwaatu , lo beenu lubangusina kubvuuka ko . "
Haho bayongolo batabula misiinga myaba myakolokoso mwaa-bwaatu bwa lubakusu na badipatula dyayende mu maampa .
Tekesele bwiisi bukya , Pawulo wasyaamisa bobanso ti nkani badya , waleele ti : " Kiluumbu ki kyakuumi na bina , luri mu kukiinga na lwahele kudya .
Hango nkuumbu me nyilusyaamisa mu kuholo byandya , bukuri mvuukulu yeenu yiri mu byo , na kuri ti lufu lumosi lwa mitu myeenu ludziimbila ko . "
Nde kaleelaa mimyo , waholo mpa , wabvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , ha busu bwa bobanso , na bu kabukuna , wabaandika kudya .
Bobanso babaka makwa , na bo se baholo byandya mu kudya .
Munsa bwaatu , twaba nkama dzoolo na makuumi nsaamu na baatu basaamunu .
Bu bayukuta , bo balooso masaangu mu mubu mu kuleengese bwaatu .
Bwiisi bu bwakya , basii bweese kuyaaba butoto ko , ngo batalila mwaa-waanga diri na kibeendu kyapalila munyeenge . Bo bakaanga kitsimi kya kweende ku simu , mbuti babangusini kusindukila bwaatu .
Bu bapatula binko , bayende ha yulu mubu , mu ntaangu yomosi , banyanguna misiinga mya kisuunguki , bataanda nsaanda ya ku mankula ma bwaatu , mpisi heki kiteembu kibasindukila ku simu .
Bo babwa ha kikuma kya munyeenge , kiri ha kakati dya mubu ; bo basaka bwakweendekile ku simu , ngo mutu wakakimina kunsa munyeenge , bwaatu bwaba bwa kutembekele pe . Kitsuri kya mambisa kyatsyaamuka mu ntoono makwa ma [ mipaku ] .
Kutya kwa bayongolo kwaba ti badzusa maboroko , mpisi heki ti dimosi dihele kubwa mu mubu na kubvuuka ha mambisa ma kutsaya .
Mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu katiiri kuyitikisa Pawulo , wabakabikisa kitsimi kikyo . Nde watuma kuri babo babangusina kutsaya , mu kubwa batete mu maampa na beende ku simu .
Heki mu babo basiiri , babamosi basalila mabaya , bakaka basalila mabaya ma bayisila mu bwaatu . Bubwo bobanso batubuka ku simu , mpee-mpolo .
Bu babvuuka mpee-mpolo , bo bayuka ti kibuma kya butoto ki batubukiri kikyo nkuumbu Melite .
Bangaa-bula bubwo batubwaana mu ntiilu yayinene . Bu banamuka mbaawu , batuteele ku kuyoto , mu ntoono mbvula yaba yimwaanoko , na mu ntoono kyoosi .
Pawulo bu katolo bitsootso byalaka , wabituba ku mbaawu , mpiri yapala , mu ntoono nyangala , na yamutatika mu kooko .
Bangaa-bula bu bamono nyoko yiri mu kutsinga mu kooko kwa Pawulo , bo na bo baleele ti : " Ngwanwa muutu wu mudzusi kari . Nde pariryee mpee-mpolo mu mubu , ngo nsundusulu dza Nzaambi dzimuha miswa ko mu kuba mwooyo .
Hango nde kakubulaa kooko , nyoko yabwa ku mbaawu ; nde wahele kumono mpasi ti dzimosi .
Baatu baba kiingilaa ti kooko bee kumutuundiri , bunu pe bee fwiiri na sisuu . Bo bakiingila kidzika kyalaka , na bahele kumono dya mpasi dimutubukila . Bo bayiinga nzoonsulu , beki leele ti muutu wu nzaambi kari .
Bebele na kibeendu kikyo , kwaba bula bwa muutu mosi , mukuutu kibuma , nkuumbu yaandi Popilyo , watutaambiri , mu kimbaasi ku nzo yaandi , mu biluumbu bitatu .
Ngo taayi dya Popilyo wabeele baawu , na mwooyo wa makila , waneŋene . Pawulo wayende kuri nde , wasaambila , wamutetekele myooko , na wamutsinikisa .
Mamo bu mamonoko , baatu bakimi ku kibuma , baba na babeeru bakokosolo , na batsiinika .
Bo batuhololo mu lukiinsu lwolunso ; bu twaba tweki mu kweende , batuha bi twaba na nzala byo mu budyeengi .
Ha lumbisa lwa mangoondo matatu , beetu twaholo bwaatu bwa ku Alekanderi , bwalutisiri ntaangu ya kyoosi ku kibuma . Bisoni byatina mu bwaatu byaba « Dyoskuro . »
Bu twatubuka ku Sirakusayi , beetu twalutisa biluumbu bitatu haho .
Bu twayisika haho , twatubuka ku Lengyoni . Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kimosi , kiteembu kya sude kyatubuka , na bukyaanaa twatubuka ku Potyolo ,
kukwo , twabaka bampaangi , batuteele mu kudzakala kuri bo , mu biluumbu nsaamu ; bubwo twatubukila ku Loma .
Bampaangi ba ku Loma , bu bayuka mi twabwanikini na myo , bayisa tubwaana natee ku dzaandu dya Apyo , na ku Manzo Matatu . Pawulo bu kabamona wabvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , na walwaata kibakala .
Mu ntaangu yi twakoto mu Loma , baha miswa kuri Pawulo mu kuba kwa nde-kaka na muyongolo waba kemukebaana .
Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitatu , Pawulo wateele bakuutu batete ba Bayudayo ba ku Loma , ku nzo yi kaba . Bu bakutukuna , nde waleele kuri bo ti : " Bampaangi baami , me nyahele kuyirika lumvuki ti lumosi kuri kaanda , bunu pe kuri bifu bya bataayi beetu . Bu nyabee mu boroko ku Yerusalemi , me banyekele mu myooko mya bari Loma .
Bo bamfuulaana , baba batiiri kumpatula , mu ntoono yiri bahele kumono kibila ki badzusila me .
Ngo kasi , Bayudayo basii tya ko , na me nya kati kuloombo ti Kayisari kansuundisa , kuri nyahele na kitsimi kya kufuunda kaanda dyaami .
Mu ntoono yiyo me ndoombiryee mu kulumono , na mu kuyolo na beenu . Mu ntoono nsiitu ya Isaheli , me nyiri mu bikonyi bi nyiri na byo bi .
Bo bamuleele ti : « Mu mitariri ye , beetu twahele kutaambula mukaanda ti mosi , wafumuni ku Yudaya ; kwahele se ti mosi mu bampaangi bayisiri kumaku , watuyaabisa bunu pe wadzoonso mamabi mu ye .
Ngo beetu tutiiryee kuyuka ye-meene , ma wutsima ye , mu mitariri kabu dya minsaambiri myahaambuka , bukuri dyayabakana ku turi beetu , na mwomunso bari mu kudinwaanisa . »
Bu bakaanga laki na Pawulo , bo bayisa mu lutaangu lwalaka ku nzo yaandi . Kuri bo kayaabisa mu nteelulu kimbaangi kya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi , mu kubayukusa mu mitariri Yesu , kabandukila mu Mangisi ma Moose , natee mu babikiri , baholosonaa kipari natee nsinsika .
Babamosi basiila kanyi mu ma kaba leelaana , bakaka babisa kusa kanyi .
Bu baba kuyukusuna pe bo na bo , batsamukina . Pawulo waleele dyaambu dimosi ti : « Bwabubwete , Mpeeve Yangisi yadzoonsiri mu Esaya kuri bataayi beenu ,
yaleele ti : " Yende leele kuri kaanda didyo : Beenu sa lwayuka , ngo ka lubakula ko ; beenu sa lwakyeese , ngo ka lumono ko .
Bukuri mutima kaanda di weki wakuba ; bari na mpasi mu kuyuka mu makutu , bakaangiryee miisu myaaku , mpisi bahele kumono mu miisu , na bahele kuyuka mu makutu , na bahele kubakula mu mutima , na bahele kuyiinga madyeele , kuri me nyibatsinikisa . "
Ngo diba dyayabakana kuri beenu ti , mvuukulu ya Nzaambi yi , yeki yaheeku , kuri bangooyi ; bo se sa bayuka ! » [
Pawulo wadzakala mibvu myoolo mu nzo ya kufutila . Nde waba taambulaana bobanso baba kweemumonaa .
Nde wayaabisa Kimfumu kya Nzaambi , na wayikisa mitariri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , mu nsiitu dzodzinso , kwahele bikakusulu .
Pawulo , nkutu Yesu Kiristo , wataambula mbila mu kuba ntumu na wu bari basoolo mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi .
Nzaambi watekisiri kusa nsiilulu kuri babikiri baandi mu Matinu Mangisi ,
mu mitariri Mwaana waandi , wabutukila mu kaanda dya Davidi mu muswinyi ,
wu kari kasa Mwaana Nzaambi , mu mpinu , bunu buri Mpeeve ya bungisi , mu mfulukulu ya bafwa , ngo Yesu Kiristo Mfumu yeetu .
Mu nde turi twataambula bweese na buntumu , mu kuri ti makaanda momanso matumuma mu kanyi , mu nkuumbu yaandi ,
munsa mo beenu se luri baatu , bataambula mbila Yesu Kiristo .
Kuri banduku ba Nzaambi bobanso ba mutima , bari ku Loma , bataambula mbila mu kuba bangisi : bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
Hatete , me nyibvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi yaami mu Yesu Kiristo , mu ntoono beenu bobanso , bukuri kanyi dyeenu bakwedzoonsolo mu dyo , mu nsi yansiina .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , nde wu nyisalilaa me mu mpeeve yaami , mu nyabusulu Musamu Wamubwete wa Mwaana waandi : me nyibambukilaa beenu mwooyo kwahele kuhoto ,
mu nsaambulu dzaami , mu mantaangu momanso . Me nyiri mu kuloombaana mpisi mbaka , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , mpwaani ya kwiisa kuri beenu .
Bukuri nyiri na musoongo walaka wa kulumono , mpisi heki nyilutubukila kikabu kyakimpeeve , mpisi luba bakumusu .
Mimyo mu kuri ti tubeenee basyaamusu ha kimosi , ha nyiba kuri beenu , mu kanyi dyantwaari kuri beenu na kuri me .
Bampaangi , me ntii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu . Mantaangu malaka me nkootsimaa kwiisa , mu kutolo bimbutu kuri beenu na kuri makaanda makaka , ngo natee mu lumalu me bankabikisa .
Me nyiri na ma nyelemini kuyirika kuri Bahelene na kuri banzeense , kuri bangaa-madyeele na kuri madzeeke se .
Mu didyo , me nyiri na musoongo wa kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete kuri beenu se bari Loma .
Mukwongo , me nyahele na nsoni mu Musamu Wamubwete , bukuri nde ngo mpinu dza Nzaambi , mu mvuukulu ya mpisi wunde wusiila kanyi , ha tete kuri Bayudayo tumi kuri Bahelene .
Bukuri nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yayabakana mu nde , mu kanyi na mu ntoono kanyi bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Ngaa-kusuunguma sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi . »
Mukwongo , kunu kinsongi-yulu , nkesi dza Nzaambi dzimonokinaa mu baatu bahele na kinzaambi , na bari na bubayi , basweekaa ngwanwa kunsa bubayi ,
ngo mari lo bayaaburi mu Nzaambi , mari mamonokono kuri bo , bukuri Nzaambi wabasoongo mo .
Mukwongo , bitotolo bya nde byahele kumonokono , mpinu dzahele manunu na bunzaambi , kuholosono nyirikulu nsi , biri byamonokono mbuti babimwiinini mu biyiriki byaandi . Ngo bo ka babaka mpemisi ko ,
bukuri bu bayaaba Nzaambi , ka basii kumukeembese bunu Nzaambi ko , bunu pe kubvutula matoondo kuri nde ko . Kasi bayeki bamikangala mu nsimunu yaaku , na mitima mya bo mya buwulu miri kunsa mampimbisi .
Bo batsima kuba bangaa-madyeele , ngo bilawuku bari ,
na bayeki baha nkeembu Nzaambi yiri yafwaa ko , kuri biteki biri mu kifwaani kya muutu wufwaanaa , kya banoni , kya bibulu na kya banyoko .
Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kabayekele mu nsumukunu mu nzila ya nyiimunu dza mitima myaaku , mu kuhele kukiinsa manyutu ma bo-meene .
Bo bakituri ngwanwa ya Nzaambi yeki mpya , badumusini na basaambiri kiyiriki ha kibeendu kya Muyiriki , nde wuri wasakumunu kwahele manunu . Amene .
Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kabayekele mu mantiilu mansoni . Mukwongo , bakyeetu ba bo bahotiri kwepala na babakala , mu kwesakisina na bambaasi bakyeetu .
Bwobumosi se babakala , bahotiri kwepala na bakyeetu , basangumiki mu mampwiisu ma bo na bo , mu kweyirika myansoni babakala na babakala , na kutaambula mufutu wayelemene na nzimbukulu ya bo-meene .
Ngo bukuri bahele na musoongo wa kuyaaba Nzaambi mu ngwanwa , Nzaambi wabayekele kunsa madyeele maaku mamabi , mu kweyirika mahele kuyelemene .
Bayeki baluula mu momanso ma bubayi , mu mutima-bubi , mu ntiki-mboongo , mu nyirikulu mamabi ; baluula mu musoki , nzusulu baatu , mu mayumu , mu mawunu , mu ndyaatulu dzadzibi . Bo bangaa-saana ,
bangaa-makele , bataatu ba Nzaambi , bangaa-kinwa , bangaa-masiiku , bangaa-nzala-kubila , bari na madyeele mu nyirikulu myamibi , bari na tungu kuri bataayi na banguri .
Bo bahele na madyeele , bahele na ngwanwa , bahele na musoongo mu bambaasi , bahele na mutima wangebe .
Bo bayaari mukesu wa Nzaambi , ti bayirikaa ma bubwo lo bayelemeni kubadzusa ; ngo kasi kari kunu kuyirika bari mu kumiyirika ko , ngo bari mu kwesyaamisa se baatu bakwemiyirika .
Hango-nkuumbu , ye muutu , wuri mutsuundisi , wuri mbakila mpemisi ko bwooso ye beele ; bukuri ye wubaanaa wutsuundisa mbaasi , lo nyutu ye-meene wuri mu kubwiisa , bukuri ma wutsuundisila mbaasi , ye-meene se manamo wuri mu kuyirika .
Tuyaari ti nsundusulu ya Nzaambi yilutilaa bunu buri ngwanwa , kuri babo bayirikaa mya bubwo .
Ye muutu , wuri mutsuundisi bakweyirika mya bubwo , na ye-meene se wukwemiyirika ; buri ye butsimini ti ye ngo wuri sa bvuuka mu nsundusulu ya Nzaambi ?
Hoti busina bwa mbweeyulu-mutima waandi , nkuundulu na nkindusulu-mutima waandi , ye wuri mu kunyaafuna , mu kuhele kuyaaba ti mbweeyulu-mutima ya Nzaambi , yinataa ye ku nyiingulu madyeele ?
Ngo mu bunkuri bwaaku na nkubusulu mutima waaku , ye wukwekutukisa nkesi dzibwa mu ye , mu kiluumbu kya nkesi , na kya nyabusulu nsundusulu yasuunguma ya Nzaambi ,
nde mbasi-tsuku wubvutula kuri mpisi muutu bunu buri biyiriki byaandi .
Sa kaha kidziingu kyahele manunu kuri babamosi , bakwesaka mu kifiki kunsa kisalu kyaandi , nkeembu , lukiinsu na kiteesu kyahele mbolulu .
Sa kasoongo nkesi na kabala kuri bakaka , mu ntoono tungu na bukuri bahele kutumuma kuri ngwanwa , kasi batumuma mu mya bubayi .
Manyoongi na kinkuukulu kuri mpisi muutu wukweyirika mamabi , dyatete kuri Muyudayo tumi kuri Muhelene .
Ngo kasi nkeembu , lukiinsu na kiyeengi kuri bakweyirika mamabwe , dyatete kuri Muyudayo tumi kuri Muhelene ;
bukuri Nzaambi wahele na bubayi .
Mukwongo , bobanso bayirikiri masumu kwahele mangisi , sa bafuuka se kwahele mangisi ; na bobanso bayirikiri masumu kunsa mangisi , sa baba batsuundusu mu mangisi .
Bukuri kari bayukaa mangisi basuunguma ha busu bwa Nzaambi ko , ngo kasi basalilaa mangisi sa baba balulukusu .
Mukwongo , mbuti bangooyi bahele na mangisi , bakwesalila mangisi bunubwo , bo bu bahele na mangisi , bo-meene ngo mangisi .
Bo basoongaa kuri ti , biyiriki bya mangisi byatinima mu mitima mya bo , nsimunu bo yita kimbaangi , mu bo na bo bitsimi bikwebafuunda bunu pe bikwebakalila .
Bubwo buba , mu kiluumbu ki tsuundisa Nzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu , mansweeki ma baatu , bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete .
Ye wuri na nkuumbu ya Muyudayo , wasa nsiitu mu mangisi , na wuri na kimweese mu Nzaambi yaaku .
Ye yaari kutya kwaandi , wusaanaa nsobokoso mu mari mufunu , wayikusu mu mangisi .
Ye yirikiri kuyaaba ti ye wuri munati bafwa miisu , buungi bwa bari ku mampimbisi ,
muyikisi baatu bahele na nyaabulu , muyikisi mwaa-baala , wunde wuri na dyeele dya kuba na nyaabulu , na dya kuba na ngwanwa mu mangisi .
Ngo habaanaa ye ngo wukweyikisa bambaasi , dyaburi wuri ye-meene kuyikisa pe ? Ye wukweyikisa ti kuyiba pe , buri ye-meene wukweyiba ?
Ye wukweleele ti kimpala kusa pe , buri ye-meene wukwesa kimpala ? Ye wumonaa kinkeni mu biteki , buri wuri mu kweyiba mu manzo ma Nzaambi ?
Ye wukwesa kimweese mu mangisi , buri wuri mu kwesaana Nzaambi mu kwesinina mangisi ?
Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : « Mu ntoono beenu , makaanda makwesaana nkuumbu Nzaambi . »
Mukwongo , nteendulu bubakala yiri ndaandu mbuti ye wusalilaa mangisi ; ngo mbuti ye wuri musinini mangisi , lo nteendulu bubakala bwa ye yampya .
Ngo mbuti muutu wahele kuteende bubakala , wubvuminaa mangisi , buri lo mpelulu nteendulu bubakala bwa nde , yahele kumonokono bunu nteendulu bubakala ?
Muutu wahele kuteende bubakala mu muswinyi , ngo wusalilaa mangisi , sa katsuundisa ye wuri na mukaanda mangisi , na wateende bubakala , ngo wuri musinini mangisi .
Mukwongo , Muyudayo kari wunde wubamonaa mu miisu ko , na nteendulu bubakala kari yibamonaa mu muswinyi ko ,
ngo Muyudayo , wa mansweeki ; na nteendulu bubakala , ya mutima mu Mpeeve , nkani ka ya mu mukaanda ko . Wa bubwo wutaambula ndumusu ya Nzaambi nkani ka ya baatu ko .
Hango mufunu wa kuba Muyudayo wuri hari , bunu pe ndaandu ya nteendulu bubakala yiri hari ?
Yiri yayinene mu monso . Bukuri kuri Bayudayo batekisiri kuha maampu ma Nzaambi .
Heki mu nki ? Mbuti babamosi basii ba bakwiikama ko , buri kuhele kukwiikama kwa bo , lo kuyaariri nkwikumunu ya Nzaambi ?
Ti bele na dyo pe ! Nzaambi ngaa-ngwanwa , ngo kasi mpisi muutu wuri na mpya , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Ye yelemini kuba wasuunguma mu nzoonsulu yaaku , mpisi ye luuluka ha bakutsuundisa . »
Ngo mbuti kunsa bubayi bwa beetu nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yimonokono , lo nki tuleele ? Buri Nzaambi kabaka nkesi , lo weki ngaa-bubayi ? Me mu kimuutu nyiri mu kudzoonsolo .
Ti bele na dyo pe ! Lo dyaburi Nzaambi mbasi-tsuku katsuundisila nsi ?
Ngo mbuti mu mpya dza me , ngwanwa ya Nzaambi yimonokono na kensekelee mu ntoono nkeembu yaandi , lo mu nki babweese kutsuundisa me bunu ngaa-masumu ?
Hango , mamabi tuyirikee kweetu mpisi mamabwe miisa , kindeele babo bakwetufutukila , ti beetu turi mu kweeleele bubwo ? Mutsuundu wu bataambula bo , wayelemene mu bo .
Ngo nki ? Buri beetu tubvuriri bweese ti na bambaasi ? Pele ! Mukwongo , beetu twatswiikisiri ti : na Bayudayo , na Bahelene bobanso bari kunsa lutumu lwa masumu ;
bu diri dyatinu : « Kuri muutu wasuunguma ko , kuri ti mosi ko ,
kuri ti mosi ko wuri na madyeele , kuri ti mosi ko wukwesaka Nzaambi .
Bobanso badziimbisa nzila , mu kintwaari bobanso basaala mufunu ko ; Kuri ti mosi ko wuyirikaa mamabwe , nkati kwahele ti mosi .
Miwiri mya bo , mampeembe mamwaasi , bakwesalila ndima dza bo mu kwewuna , mu bibori bya bo muri misya mya mpiri ;
minwa mya bo myaluula mu mampopi na mu misamu myankari ;
miilu mya bo myaleenge mu kwetsaamuna makila ,
mfukusulu na manyoongi biri mu manzila ma bo ,
bahele kuyaaba nzila ya kiyeengi .
Kibvumi kya Nzaambi kyo pe ha miisu mya bo . »
Tuyaari ti myominso mi leele mangisi , mitariri bari kunsa mangisi , mpisi bobanso bakaanga minwa , na nsi yansiina yitaambula kibila ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
Hango-nkuumbu , kuri muutu ko wuba walulukusu mu biyiriki bya mangisi , bukuri mangisi yini nyaabulu masumu makoohaanaa .
Mu lumalu , Nzaambi mwaasoongo buri nde kaluulukisa kwahele mangisi , didyo dyatswiikusu mu mangisi na babikiri :
Nzaambi wuluulukisa bobanso , mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo . Mukwongo , kwahele nsobokoso ,
bukuri bobanso bayirika masumu na bahelele nkeembu Nzaambi ,
ngo nde wabalulukisa kwa mungengi mu bweese , mu nzila ya nkuululu yiyo yiri mu Kiristo Yesu .
Nde , Nzaambi kari kayakisa bunu kikori mu makila maandi mu nzila ya kanyi , mu kusoongo nsungumunu yaandi bu kahemisini masumu matekisiri ,
mu ntaangu ya nkindusulu-mutima waandi . Nde wuri mu kusoongo nsungumunu yaandi , mu ntaangu ya lumalu , mpisi kaba wasuunguma nde-meene na kaluulukisa wunde wuri na kanyi mu Yesu .
Ngo masiiku mari hari ? Mari ko . Mu nkya ngisi ? Ya biyiriki ? Pele , ngo mu ngisi ya kanyi .
Mukwongo , beetu tutsimini ti , muutu wuri walulukusu mu kanyi , kwahele biyiriki bya mangisi .
Buri Nzaambi ya bani Bayudayo yiri ? Buri kari ya makaanda se ko ? Bunubwo ! Ya makaanda se yiri .
Ngo bukuri Nzaambi mosi kitsu , yiluulukisa mu kanyi , bateende bubakala na bahele kuteende bubakala .
Ngo tuyisilee kwaandi mangisi mu ntoono kanyi ? Pele ! Yaa buba bubwo ko , ngo kasi beetu tutswiikisa mangisi .
Hango nki tuleele mu Abalaami mwaa-nkaaka yeetu ? Nki kari kataambula mu muswinyi ?
Mbuti Abalaami mu biyiriki kari walulukusu , lo wuri na miswa mu kuba na masiiku ; ngo ka ha busu bwa Nzaambi ko .
Mukwongo , nki Matinu mari mu kuleele ? « Abalaami kasaana kanyi mu Nzaambi , mu didyo kari walulukusu . »
Ngo kuri wunde wuri mu kusalaa , mufutu lo wahele kumonoko bunu bweese , ngo bunu kitotolo ki kari na miswa .
Kasi kuri wunde wahele mu kusala , ngo wasa kanyi mu wunde wululukisaana wa mungooyi , lo kanyi dyaandi dimonokini mu nsungumunu .
Mu didyo se , Davidi kari mu kudzoonsolo mu lwambwe , lwa muutu wuri Nzaambi wamululukisa kwahele biyiriki :
« Kiminu kuri babo bataambula mpemisi mu lumvuki lwaaku , na bari masumu maaku mahemusunu !
Kiminu kuri muutu wunde wuri Mfumu wahele kumutaangila masumu ! »
Buri muutu wuri mu kiminu kikyo , wuni wateende bubakala , hoti wunde se wahele kuteende bubakala ? Mukwongo , beetu bu tuleele ti : « Kanyi dya Abalaami dyamonokini bunu nsungumunu » .
Mu nkya ntaangu kanyi didyo dyamonokini bubwo ? Mu ntaangu yiri weki wateende bubakala , hoti mu ntaangu yiri wakiri bubakala kuteende pe ? Pele ! Kari kuri mwaateende bubakala ko , ngo kuri wakiri bubakala kuteende pe .
Nde wataamburi kidiimbu kya nteendulu bubakala , bunu kinyemu kya ndulukulu yi kataamburi mu kanyi , ha kaba wakiri wahele kuteende bubakala , mpisi heki kaba taayi dya bobanso basaa kanyi , bakiri bubakala kuteende pe , kuri heki bo se , babamono bunu basuunguma .
Na nde kaba taayi dya bateende bubakala , kari dya bani bateende bubakala ko , ngo se bakwenama bitaambi bya kanyi dya taayi dyeetu , Abalaami bu kaba wakiri bubakala kuteende pe .
Mukwongo , kari mu nzila ya mangisi ko , ngo mu nzila ya ndulukulu mu kanyi , bari basa lusiilulu kuri Abalaami , bunu pe kuri bapalila mu nde , mu kuba mukondiri saala dya nsi .
Mukwongo , mbuti bakoondiri ba saala , kubakula dyo mu mangisi , lo kanyi dyeki dyamukangala , na lusiilulu lusii ko .
Mukwongo , mangisi mabutaa nkesi ; haho hahele mangisi , lo halele se kusinina kwa mo .
Hango-nkuumbu , saala kubakila mu nzila ya kanyi , mpisi heki mu bweese lusiilulu luba lwatswiikama kuri bobanso bapalila mu Abalaami , kari bani bapalila mu mangisi ko , ngo bapalila se mu kanyi dyaandi . Nde wuri taayi dya beetu-banso ,
bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Me nyasa ye taayi dya makaanda malaka . » Nde wuri ha busu bwa Nzaambi , yi kari kasiila kanyi , Nzaambi yibvutulaa bafwa mu bumwooyo , na yiyirika bitotolo biri bibeeri byo pe .
Nde wasii kanyi , bu kasiiriri nsiitu mu mimyo myahele na bwa kusiila nsiitu , mpisi kaba « taayi dya makaanda malaka » , bunu bu diri dyaleelu ti : « Bapalila mu ye sa baba balaka . »
Nde kasii yekele kanyi dyaandi ko , ti bukuri waba weki na mpaangi-pe nkama mibvu , miilu myeki mu bulu , na Sara mwooyo wafwa .
Nde kasii yekele kanyi na kusa mpaka ko , mu nsiilulu dza Nzaambi , ngo kasi wabaka makwa mu kanyi , na waha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi .
Nde waba nkati na nsiitu dzakuka , ti Nzaambi wakuka mu kuyirika mamo , ma kari kasa nsiilulu .
Hango-nkuumbu , « mu didyo bari bamwiinina ti wasuunguma » .
Mamo mahele kuba matinu mu wunu nde kitsu ti : « Mu didyo , bari bamwiinina ti wasuunguma . »
Ngo kasi , mu beetu se , bari bayelemini kumono bubwo , basiilaa kanyi mu wunde wafulukisi Yesu , Mfumu yeetu , mu bafwa .
Nde bamuyekele mu ntoono masumu meetu , na Nzaambi wamufulukisi mpisi tuba basuunguma .
Ngo twayeki twaluulukusu mu kanyi , turi kiyeengi na Nzaambi , mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo ;
mu nde se turi twabaka miswa , mya kutaambula mu kanyi mu bweese bubwo , bu turi twatelemene , na turi twasiila kimweese kyeetu , mu nsiitu ya nkeembu Nzaambi .
Kari bunubwo kitsu ko , ngo beetu tusiila kimweese kyeetu mu mpasi , bu tuyaari ti mpasi dzibutaa kifiki .
Kifiki kibuta ndulukulu mu nsindukulu , na ndulukulu mu nsindukulu yibuta nsiitu .
Nsiitu dzadzusaa muutu nsoni ko , bukuri kuri Mpeeve Yangisi yibari batuha , yatsaamuna ntiilu ya Nzaambi mu mitima myeetu .
Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri makwa pe , Kiristo wafwiilila mu bangaa-masumu mu ntaangu yayelemene .
Mukwongo , diri dya mpasi ti muutu kataambula kufwa mu ntoono wasuunguma ; kampe mu wamubwete se , lo muutu tamburi kufwa .
Nzaambi wasoongo ntiilu yaandi mu beetu , bukuri , bu twaba twakiri bangaa-masumu , Kiristo watufwiila .
Hango mu lumalu , bu tweki twalulukusu mu makila maandi , lo dibvuriri bubwete diri nde sa katubvuukisa mu nkesi dza Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , mbuti ha twaba bataatu , Nzaambi wasuusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya nde na beetu , mu lufwa lwa Mwaana waandi , lo dyaburi tuhele kubvula kuba babvuukusu mu bumwooyo bwaandi , ha tumwaayukusuna na nde ?
Kari mu mini mimyo kitsu ko , ngo beetu twasa kimweese kyeetu mu Nzaambi , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu nde turi twataambula nyukusunu lumalu .
Hango nkuumbu , bunu bwakotolo masumu mu nsi mu muutu mosi , na lufwa se mu ntoono masumu , bunubwo se lufwa lwakotolo mu baatu bobanso , bukuri bobanso babwa mu masumu .
Mukwongo , natee mu ntaangu yaba mangisi , masumu maba mu nsi , ngo maba mahele mu lutaangu , bukuri mangisi maba mo pe .
Koomosoko , kuholosono mu ntaangu ya Adami natee ya Moose , lufwa lwaba se mu baatu , bari basii yirika masumu mafwanikina na kusinina kwa mangisi kwa Adami ko . Nde wuri kifwaani kya wunde waba wuri mu kwiisa .
Kasi , kikabu kya bweese kyahele kuba bunu buri kiteesu kya lumvuki . Ngo mbuti heki mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , lufwa luri lwakoto mu baatu balaka , lo dibvuriri mufunu diri bweese bwa Nzaambi , na kikabu kya bweese , mu muutu mosi , ngo Yesu Kiristo , bari baheele byo kwa mansaalisi kuri baatu balaka .
Ngo kikabu kyahele kuba , bunu buri kiteesu kya muutu mosi wayirika masumu . Mukwongo , nkesulu mukanu yayisa mu mutsuundu wa muutu mosi ; ngo kasi ndulukulu yayisa mu kikabu , ha mambisa ma lumvuki lwalaka .
Ngo mbuti mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , lufwa lwatuma lwolukaka , lo dibvuriri mufunu diri ti , mu Yesu Kiristo kitsu , baatu bataambula kwa mansaalisi bweese na kikabu kya nsungumunu , sa batuma mu bumwooyo .
Hango bukuri , mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , bobanso bari kunsa mukanu ; bwobumosi se , mu nsungumunu ya muutu mosi , bobanso bataambula nsungumunu ya bumwooyo ;
bunubwo se buri , mu nko dza muutu mosi , balaka babwa mu masumu , bwobumosi se mu bintambukulu bya muutu mosi , balaka sa baba balulukusu .
Mangisi mayisa mpisi heki lumvuki lufunina ; ngo haho hafunina masumu , hanaho se ha buukulaa bweese ,
mpisi heki , bunu bwaba masumu kuri mari na lutumu mu lufwa , bunubwo se bweese buri na lutumu mu nsungumunu , mu kuha kidziingu kyahele manunu , mu Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu .
Ngo nki tuleele ? Mu masumu tunamitinee kweetu , mpisi heki bweese bubuukila ?
Ti bele na dyo pe ! Beetuneenu bari twafwa mu masumu , buri tubweese kubeele bamwooyo mu masumu ?
Hoti beenu lwahele kuyaaba , ti beetu-banso twabotikiri mu Kiristo Yesu , mu lufwa lwaandi turi twataambula mbotokulu ?
Ngo beetu batudziika kintwaari na nde , mu mbotokulu mu lufwa , mpisi heki bunu bwafulukiri Kiristo mu bafwa , mu nkeembu ya Taayi , bunubwo se beetu , twedyaatila mu kidziingu kyamoono .
Mukwongo , mbuti beetu twayeki muutu mosi na nde , mu lufwa lwafwanikina na lwa nde , lo sa twaba kintwaari na nde se mu mfulukulu .
Bu tuyaari kuri ti , muutu weetu wamukulu bayeki bamukomono kintwaari na nde , mpisi heki nyutu ya masumu yiba yatsyaamunu , na tuhele kubweese kuba bankutu ba masumu .
Bukuri , wunde wumwaafwa , lo walulukusu kwakinkulu mu masumu .
Mbuti twafwa kintwaari na Kiristo , lo twasa kanyi ti sa twaba mwooyo kintwaari na nde .
Bu tuyaari kuri ti Kiristo wafulukiri mu bafwa , kabweese kufwa ko , lufwa ka lubweese kuba na lutumu mu nde ko .
Bukuri , wunde wafwiiri , wafwiiri lwolumosi mu ntoono masumu ngo wunde wuri mwooyo , wuri mwooyo mu ntoono Nzaambi .
Mu didyo , beenu se , beeneenu bunu lwafwa mu masumu beenu-meene , na bunu luri mwooyo mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono Nzaambi .
Ngo yaa lutala ko ti , masumu maba na lutumu mu nyutu yeenu ya mfwiilu , mpisi luhele kutumuma mu nyiimunu dza nyutu .
Yaa lusalila binamu byeenu , bunu bisalulu bya bubayi mu kuyirika masumu ko . Ngo kasi beenu-meene salileenu Nzaambi , bunu baatu bamwooyo bafulukusu mu bafwa , na salileenu binamu byeenu , bunu binwaanunu bya nsungumunu mu kusalila Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , masumu ka mabweese kuba na lutumu mu beenu ko , bukuri beenu lwahele mu lutumu lwa mangisi , ngo luri mu lutumu lwa bweese .
Hango nki ? Masumu tukweyirikee kweetu , bukuri twahele mu lutumu lwa mangisi , ngo turi mu lutumu lwa bweese ? Ti bele na dyo !
Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , lutaambukila kusalila muutu bunu bankutu , lo lweki bankutu ba wunde wu luri mu kutambukila , bankutu ba masumu mu kweende ku lufwa , bunu pe bankutu ba bintambukulu mu kweende ku nsungumunu ?
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , bukuri beenu lwaba bankutu ba masumu , ngo kasi lumwaataambukila mu mutima ndemunso , kiteesu kya nyikusulu dzi bari baluha .
Bu balukuula mu masumu , lwayeki bankutu ba nsungumunu .
Mu kimuutu me nyiri mu kudzoonsolo , mu ntoono ya muswinyi wahele na makwa . Bunu bu lwasariri binamu byeenu bunu bankutu kuri nsumukunu na kuri bubi , mu ntoono mamabi , bunubwo se mu lumalu , salileenu binamu byeenu bunu bankutu kuri nsungumunu , mu ntoono bungisi .
Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi lwaba bankutu ba masumu , lwaba na bunsaalisi mu mitariri nsungumunu .
Ngo nkya bimbutu luri na byo ? Mu lumalu beenu lweki na nsoni mu byo , bukuri manunu ya byo lufwa .
Ngo kasi mu lumalu , bu bamwaalukuula mu masumu , lweki bankutu ba Nzaambi , na luri na bimbutu mu mbakulu bungisi . Manunu ya byo , ngo kidziingu kyahele manunu .
Mukwongo , mufutu masumu ngo lufwa ; ngo kasi kikabu kya mungengi kya Nzaambi , ngo kidziingu kyahele manunu , mu Kiristo Yesu Mfumu yeetu .
Mukwongo , bampaangi , me kuri bari na nyaabulu ya mangisi nyiri mu kudzoonso . Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba , ti mangisi mari na lutumu mu muutu , mu ntaangu yoyinso yikari mu bumwooyo ?
Mukasi wuri kunsa lutumu lwa mulumi , wu bari bakaangama mu mangisi , mu ntaangu yiri mulumi wakiri mwooyo , ngo mbuti mulumi fwiiri , lo nde kuulukiri mu mangisi ma mulumi .
Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti mulumi wakiri mwooyo , ngo mukasi pariri na bakala dikimi , lo baleeriri ti nde ngaa-kimpala ; ngo mbuti mulumi fwiiri , lo mukasi bakiri bunsaalisi ha busu bwa mangisi , kuri hayuku nde pariri na bakala dikimi , lo wahele kuba ngaa-kimpala .
Beenu se bunubwo , bampaangi baami , beenu lwayeki lwafwa mu mangisi mu nyutu ya Kiristo , mu kuba ba muutu mukimi , wunde wafulukusu mu bafwa , mpisi tubeeneenu na bimbutu mu ntoono Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri kwedyaatila mu kimuutu , mantiilu ma masumu mu nzila ya mangisi , maba kwesalaana mu binamu byeetu , mu kubuta bimbutu binata ku lufwa .
Ngo mu lumalu , twayeki twakuuluka mu mangisi , twafwa mu mi twaba twakaangama , kuri heki tuba bankutu mu kiteesu kyamono kya Mpeeve , kari mu kiteesu kya kikulu kya mukaanda ko .
Ngo nki tuleele ? Buri mangisi ngo masumu ? Ti bele na dyo pe ! Kasi mbuti ka nzila ya Mangisi ko , nkani me nyahele kuyaaba masumu . Mukwongo , mbuti ka mangisi maleele kuri ti : « Yaa sa nyiimunu ko » , nkani me nyaketi kuyaaba nyiimunu ko .
Mu nzila ya mangisi , masumu mabaka mpwaani , ya kubuta mu me , nyiimunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu . Bukuri , mangisi mbuti mo pe , lo masumu mafwa .
Mu ntaangu yayikulu , me nyanata kidziingu kwahele mangisi ; ngo mangisi bu mayisa , masumu mabweesiri kuba mamwooyo .
Ngo me nyafwa ; dyamonokono ti mangisi maketi kuha me bumwooyo , meki kunata ku lufwa .
Mukwongo , mu nzila ya mangisi , masumu mabaka mpwaani ya kuwuna me , na ya kudzusa me .
Mu didyo , mangisi matsyeemeke , na lutumu lwangisi , lwasuunguma na lwalubwete .
Buri haho , mamabwe , meki kuri me lufwa ? Ka butsiitsa kuba ko ! Kasi masumu mu kumonoko kuri me ti masumu , mo mabuta lufwa kuri meenu mu nzila ya mamabwete , mpisi ngaa-masumu kaba nkati na masumu mu nzila ya ntumunu .
Beetu tuyaari ti mangisi mari ma kimpeeve , ngo me nyiri na nyutu ya muswinyi , bayeki banyarika kuri masumu .
Mamo ma nyiri mu kuyirika , nyahele kubakula ; bukuri mari nyahele kutya kuyirika , mamo ngo ma nyiyirika , kasi mamo ma mberiri , mamo ngo ma nyiyirika .
Ngo mbuti , mamo mari ntii ko ngo ma nyiyirika , lo me ntaamburi ti mangisi mamabwete .
Ngo mu lumalu , kari me nyibweese kuyirika mamo ko , kasi masumu mari mu me .
Me nyaari ti mamabwe mahele mu me , bu ntiiri kuleele ti , mu muswinyi waami . Nzala kuyirika mamabwe yiri mu me , kasi nyahele kubangisina kumayirika .
Mukwongo , me nyahele kuyirika mamabwe ma ntiiri , kasi me kuyirika mamabi mari ntii ko .
Mbuti mamo mari ntii ko , ngo ma nyiyirika , lo kari me nyibweese kumayirika ko , kasi masumu mari mu me .
Me nyimono kiteesu kimaki : ha ntiiri kuyirika mamabwe , kumonokono mamabi .
Me nyimono kiminu mu mangisi ma Nzaambi , bunu buri muutu wa kunsa-kati .
Ngo me nyimono kiteesu kikimi mu binamu byaami , kiri mu kunwaanisa ngisi ya nyukulu yaami , na kukotoso me boroko dya ngisi ya masumu , yiri kunsa binamu bya me .
Kyaari kuri me ! Nani wukuula me mu nyutu yimayi ya lufwa ?
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , mu Yesu Kiristo Mfumu yeetu ! Hango-nkuumbu , mu nyukulu ya me-meene me nyiri nkutu ya mangisi ma Nzaambi , ngo mu muswinyi , nyiri nkutu ya mangisi ma masumu .
Ngo mu lumalu , kwasaala mbwiilu mu mutsuundu ko , kuri babo bari mu Kiristo Yesu .
Bukuri , ngisi ya Mpeeve , ya bumwooyo mu Kiristo Yesu , yayeki yakuula me mu ngisi ya masumu na ya lufwa .
Mukwongo , mangisi maketi kubangisina mimyo ko , bukuri maba mahele na makwa mu ntoono muswinyi . Ngo Nzaambi bu kaheeke Mwaana waandi , mu kifwa-fwani kya muutu ngaa-masumu , mu ntoono masumu , wabwiisa masumu mu nyutu ya muswinyi ,
mpisi heki nsungumunu mu mangisi , yiba yakukusu mu beetu , turi mu kwedyaatila mu Mpeeve nkani ka mu muswinyi ko .
