Ngo mbuti muutu wahele kuyaaba , lo nde se wahele kuyabakana .
Mu didyo , bampaangi baami , beeneenu na kuheme mu kubikula , na yaa lwekabukisa nzoonsulu mu mandiinga ko ,
ngo myominso milutila bunu bwayelemene , na kunsa bunkete .
Bampaangi , me nyilubaambula mwooyo mu Musamu Wamubwete wu nyiri nyaluyaabisa , wu luri lwataambula , wu luri lwasikikila .
Mu nde beenu lutaambula mvuukulu , mbuti lumukebiri mu kiteesu ki nyiri nyaluyaabisila nde ; mbuti kari bubwo ko , lo kwa buunu luri lwasiila kanyi .
Mukwongo , me nyalutubukiri hani tete , ma nyataamburi me se ti : Kiristo wafwa mu ntoono masumu ma beetu , bunu buri Matinu ;
wadziiku na wafulukusu mu kiluumbu kyabitatu , bunu buri Matinu .
Nde wamonokono kuri Kefa , tumi kuri kuumi na boolo ;
tumi , nde wamonokono ha kimosi kuri bampaangi , baluta lutaangu lwa nkama taanu , mu bo kwakiri bari mwooyo natee lumalu , ngo babamosi bayeki bafwa .
Tumi , nde wamonokono kuri Yakobo , tumi kuri bantumu bobanso .
Ha mambisa ma bobanso , nde wayisa kumonokono kuri me se , nyiri bunu mwaa-mwaana wabutuka kwahele kukukisa mangoondo .
Bukuri me nyiri wubvuriri buntele mu bantumu , me nyahele kukuka ti banteele ntumu , bukuri me nyakwaamisini dibuundu dya Nzaambi .
Mu bweese bwa Nzaambi , me nyiri bu nyiri , na bweese bwaandi ku nyiri me , bwasii ba bwabuunu ko , kasi me nyabvula kusala na bobanso , ngo kari me ko , kasi bweese bwa Nzaambi buri mu me .
Ngo ti diba me , ti diba bo , bu turi twayabisila beetu , bunubwo se beenu luri lwasiila kanyi .
Mbuti bakweyaabisa Kiristo , lo bukuri wafuluka mu bafwa , ngo dyaburi babamosi mu beenu bakweleele ti , mfulukulu ya bafwa yiri ko ?
Mbuti mfulukulu ya bafwa yo pe , lo Kiristo se wahele kufuluka .
Na mbuti Kiristo wahele kufuluka , lo nyabusulu yeetu yabuunu , na kanyi dyeenu se dyabuunu .
Beetu lo tweki bambaangi ba Nzaambi bampya , bukuri tutaanaa kimbaangi kyampya ti Nzaambi wafulukisa Kiristo , kuri nde wahele kumufulukisa ; mbuti ngwanwa ti bafwa bakoofuluka ko .
Mukwongo , mbuti bafwa bakoofuluka ko , lo Kiristo se wahele kufuluka .
Mbuti Kiristo wahele kufuluka , lo kanyi dyeenu dyabuunu , na beenu lwakiri kunsa masumu meenu ,
na babo bafwa kuri bari na kanyi mu Kiristo , lo badziimbila .
Ngo mbuti nsiitu dzi turi na dzo mu Kiristo , munu mu ntoono kidziingu kimaki , lo beetu tubvuriri manyoongi mu baatu bobanso .
Ngo mu lumalu Kiristo wafuluka mu bafwa , nde ngo watete mu bafwa .
Hango , bukuri lufwa lwafumuna mu muutu mosi , mu muutu mosi se mfulukulu ya bafwa yiri yafumuna .
Mukwongo , bunu bu fwiilaa baatu bobanso mu Adami , bunubwo se , bobanso sa baba bamwooyo mu Kiristo ;
ngo muutu-muutu ha kibeendu kyaandi , Kiristo ngo watete , tumi bari mu Kiristo , mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi .
Tumi manunu yiba , mu ntaangu yi kabvutula kimfumu kuri wunde wuri Nzaambi na Taata , kamanaa kutsyaamuna kikuutu kyokinso , lutumu lwolunso , na mpinu dzodzinso .
Bukuri nde yelemini kutuma , natee ku kasuusiri bataatu baandi bobanso , kunsa bitaambi byaandi .
Mutaatu wampotulu wa kutsyaamuna ngo lufwa .
Mukwongo , « Nzaambi wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi byaandi . » Ngo habaanaa baleele ti : « Byobinso biri kunsa lutumu lwaandi . » , lo diri na pwelelee ti , wungu-wungu wunde , wasuusiri byobinso kunsa lutumu lwa Kiristo .
Ngo byobinso bibaanaa byeki byasuusa kunsa lutumu lwaandi , haho nde-meene Mwaana se , kaba kunsa lutumu lwa wunde , wasuusiri byobinso kunsa lutumu lwa Mwaana , mpisi heki Nzaambi kaba byobinso , mu bitotolo byobinso na mu baatu bobanso .
Mbuti kari bubwo ko , lo babo bakootaambulaa mbotokulu ha kibeendu kya baatu bafwa , lo nki basa ? Mbuti ngwanwa ti bafwa bahele kufuluka , lo mu nkya ntoono bari mu kutaambulaana mbotokulu ha kibeendu kya bo ?
Na beetu-meene se , mu nkya ntoono tukookotaa mu nsisi mpisi ntaangu ?
Mpisi kiluumbu me nyiri muutu wafwa ; mu didyo , bampaangi , me nyisiingisa kimweese kyaami mu beenu , kikyo ki nyiri na kyo mu Kiristo Yesu Mfumu Yeetu .
Mbuti mu kimuutu , me nyanweeni na baatu bari makwa bunu bibulu ku Efeso , lo nkya ndaandu me nyiri nyabaka ? Ngo mbuti heki ti bafwa bahele kufuluka , lo « tudyeenee na tunweenee kweetu , bukuri bweepari sa twafwa . »
Yaa luwunukina kweenu ko : « Kimbaasi kyakibi kikoobiyisa bifu byabibwete . »
Nkati bvutukee ha lwaba , na yaa lubwa mu masumu ko , bukuri babamosi bahele na nyaabulu Nzaambi , me nyiludzusa nsoni .
Ngo muutu lo wufuula ti : " Bafwa dyaburi bafulukila ? Nkya nyutu bakwiisa na yo ?
Ye dzeeke dya muutu ! Bibyo bi wukuna ye lo biri menene ko , mbuti byahele kufwa ;
na bibyo bi wukuna ye , kari muti wu wuri mu kukiinga ko , ngo nkono saangu , bunu pe ya muti mukimi .
Tumi Nzaambi kaha nkono yiyo nyutu bu katiiri , na kuri mpisi nkono , nyutu ya nde-meene .
Manyutu momanso mahele kuba momamosi , ngo nyutu ya baatu yikimi , ya bibulu yikimi , ya banoni yikimi , na ya bansu se yikimi .
Manyutu ma ku yulu mari , manyutu ma ha butoto se mari , ngo kuseme kwa manyutu ma ku yulu , kwasoboko na kuseme kwa manyutu ma ha butoto .
Kuseme kwa ntaangu kukimi , kuseme kwa ngoondo kukimi , na kuseme kwa bambwetete se kukimi ; bukuri mpisi mbwetete se yasobokono na yakaka mu kuseme .
Bunubwo se buri mu mfulukulu ya bafwa . Nyutu bayidziikaa kunsa mbolulu , ngo yifulukaana kuri yahele kubweese kubolo ;
bayidziikaa kwahele lukiinsu , ngo yifulukaana kunsa nkeembu ; bayidziikaa mu buyonsi , ngo yifulukaa kunsa mpinu ;
bayidziikaa ya muswinyi , ngo yifulukaana ya kimpeeve . Mbuti nyutu ya muswinyi yiri , lo nyutu ya kimpeeve se yiri .
Hango-nkuumbu , diri dyatinu : « Muutu watete , Adami , waba muutu wamwooyo » ; ngo Adami dyansukulu , mpeeve yihaanaa bumwooyo .
Ngo kari wa kimpeeve watekesele ko , ngo kasi wa muswinyi ; tumi wa kimpeeve keki kwiisa .
Muutu watete wafumuna mu butoto , wa tubuumbu , waboolo wafumuna ku yulu .
Bunu buri muutu wa tubuumbu , bunubwo se buri baatu ba tubuumbu ; bunu buri muutu wa ku yulu , bunubwo se buri , baatu ba ku yulu .
Bunu bu turi mu kifwaani kya muutu wa tubuumbu , bunubwo se tuba mu kifwaani kya muutu wa ku yulu .
Ngo bampaangi , me bu nyiri mu kuleele ti : muswiini na makila ka bitsiitsa kukondolo saala dya kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko , na mbolulu ka yiri nkondolo kiteesu kyahele mbolulu ko .
Me nyiluyaabisa musamu wa mpaanu : beetu-banso tuwa kufwa ko , ngo kasi beetu-banso sa twakituka .
Mu kilookolo kimosi , mu mbwatukulu diisu , mu mvumvuri yampotulu . Bukuri mvumvuri bu yibwa , bafwa sa bafuluka na nyutu yahele mbolulu , na beetuneenu sa twakituka .
Mukwongo , nyutu ya mbolulu yimayi , yiyelemini kulwaata kiteesu kyahele mbolulu , na nyutu yifwaanaa yimayi , yiyelemini kulwaata kiteesu kyahele mfwiilu .
Mbasi-tsuku nyutu yibolaa yimayi , yilwaataana kiteesu kyahele mbolulu , na nyutu yifwanaana yimayi , yilwaataana kiteesu kyahele mfwiilu , haho ngo hayirima maampu matina ti : « Lufwa balumingutini kunsa ndulukulu ! »
« Lufwa , ndulukulu ye yiri hari ? Lufwa , kiba kya ye kiri hari ? »
Kiba kya lufwa ngo masumu , na mpinu dza masumu ngo mangisi .
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , nde kootuhaanaa ndulukulu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Hango , bampaangi baami ba mutima , beeneenu na keketee , na ngwii , salee kisalu kya Mfumu , mu kiteesu kyalutila mu mantaangu momanso , bu luyaari kuri ti kisalu kyeenu mu Mfumu , ka kiri kyabuunu ko .
Mu mitariri ntolulu mboongo mu ntoono bangisi , beenu se yirikeenu bunu bu nyatumini me , kuri mabuundu mari ku Ngalatya .
Mpisi kya lumiingu , muutu-muutu mu beenu kawuunguka ku nzo yaandi , bibyo bi kabangusini kukebe , mpisi bahele kukiinga ku nyikwiisa me mu kutolo mboongo .
Mu ntaangu yi nyitubuka me , me sa nyaheeke baatu ba luri lwasoolo , na mikaanda mpisi banata bikabu bya beenu ku Yerusalemi .
Mbuti bwayelemene ti me se nyeende , lo sa beende kintwaari na me .
Me sa nyiisa kuri beenu ha nyilutila ku Makedonya ; bukuri me ku Makedonya nyilutila .
Mbuti buri bwadzuka , lo me sa nyadzakala kuri beenu , kampe sa nyalutisa se ntaangu ya kyoosi , mpisi lumbakisa mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaami , kwo ngo kwo ku nyibangisina kwe .
Bukuri me nyahele kutya kulumono hani ha nyiluta mu nzila , nyiri na kitsimi kya kudzakala mwaa-mantaangu kuri beenu , mbuti Mfumu heeri miswa .
Me sa nzakala ku Efeso , natee haba munkeembu wa Pantekote ,
bukuri mweelu weki wadzibula kuri me na waangalaa , mu kusala kwakubwe , ti bukuri bataatu balaka .
Mbuti Timoteho wiisiri kuri beenu , lo talee , yaa kaba na boomo ko kuri beenu ; bukuri nde wuri mu kwesala kisalu kya Mfumu bunu me .
Muutu yaa kamunyaafuna ko , ngo mubakisee mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaandi mu kiyeengi , mpisi nde kiisa kuri me , bukuri me nyiri mu kumukiinga , me na bampaangi .
Nkani mu mitariri mpaangi yeetu Apolo , me nyamusyaamisini kwalaka , mpisi kiisa na bampaangi kuri beenu , ngo nde wahele kutya kwiisa mu lumalu , kabakaa ntaangu tumi mbasi-tsuku kiisa .
Beenee naana , teleme na keketee mu kanyi , lwatee kibakala , beenee na makwa .
Hemese myominso mya beenu myeyirimina kunsa ntiilu .
Me nyilusyaamisa bampaangi : beenu luyaa kuri ti baatu ba mu nzo Estefana , ngo batete bayiingiri madyeele mu Akaya ; na bo bayekele manyutu mu kisalu kya bangisi .
Beenu se beeneenu batumuma kuri baatu ba bubwo , na kuri mpisi wunde wukwesala na kwemono mpasi kintwaari na bo .
Me nyimono kiminu mu nyisulu Estefana , na Fortunato , na Akayako , bukuri bo bayisiri mu kuyiingisa beenu luri bo pe .
Mukwongo , bo badzuunisini bitsimi bya me na bya beenu se . Yabukilee baatu ba bubwo .
Mabuundu ma ku Asya maluheekiri mamboto . Akila bo na Piriska , na dibuundu dikutukunaana mu nzo bo , baluheekiri mamboto malaka mu Mfumu .
Bampaangi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto . Helesenee mamboto beenu na beenu mu nyumutunu yangisi .
Taambuleenu mboto ya mu kooko kwa me-meene Pawulo .
Mbuti kuri wuri katii Mfumu ko , lo kabwilikila mpopi ! Marana ta !
Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu buba na beenu .
Me nyilutiiri beenu-banso mu Kiristo Yesu .
Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , na Timoteho mpaangi , kuri dibuundu dya Nzaambi diri ku Korinto , na kuri bangisi bobanso bari mu Akaya dyodinso .
Bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
Kaba wasakumunu , Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , Taayi diri na ngebe na diri na mboondulu yoyinso ,
nde kookutuboondaa mu mpasi dzeetu dzodzinso , mpisi heki mu mboondulu yi tutaambula beetu-meene kuri Nzaambi , tubangisina kuboondo babo bari kunsa mpasi dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu .
Mukwongo , bunu bufununa mpasi dza Kiristo mu beetu , bunubwo se bufununa mboondulu yeetu mu Kiristo .
Ngo mbuti beetu turi mu mpasi , lo mu kuri ti beenu lubaka mboondulu na mvuukulu ; mbuti turi na mboondulu , lo mu kuri ti beenu lubaka mboondulu , yiluha makwa ma kukuunda mpasi dzodzimosi , dzi turi mu kumono beetu se .
Na beetu turi na nsiitu ya makwa mu ntoono beenu , bu tuyaari kuri ti , bunu bu luri kintwaari na beetu mu mpasi , bunubwo se luri kintwaari mu mboondulu .
Mukwongo , bampaangi , beetu tutii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu , mu mpasi dzi twamono beetu ku Asya : beetu twabamini mu kiteesu kibvuriri makwa , na twaba na kitsimi ko ti , lo tubweesiri kuba bamwooyo .
Kasi beetu mu beetu-meene , twataamburi mukanu wa lufwa , mpisi heki tuhele kusiila nsiitu mu beetu-meene , ngo mu Nzaambi wufulukisaa bafwa .
Nde watukuuriri mu lufwa lwa bubwo , na mbasi-tsuku wutukuula , mu nde turi twasa nsiitu ti sa kabweese kutukuula .
Beenu se luri kintwaari , bu luri mu kusaambilaa mu beetu , mpisi heki bweese bu tutaambula beetu , mu ntoono lusaambulu lwa baatu balaka , buba dyaambu dya mvutukulu matoondo kuri beetu .
Mukwongo , kimweese kyeetu ngo kimbaangi kya nsimunu yeetu , beetu twadyaatiri ha nsi , na ha busu bwa beenu , mu nkulukulu na mu nsyemukunu ya Nzaambi , kari mu madyeele ma kimuutu ko , ngo mu bweese bwa Nzaambi .
Beetu turi na misamu mikimi mi tulutinina ko , ha yulu mi luri mu kutaanga na kubakula ; ngo me nsimini ti beenu sa lwayirika kubakula kwakubwe ,
bunu bu lumwaabakula kwa ndaambu , ti beetu turi kimweese kya beenu , bunu bu luba beenu se kuri beetu , mu kiluumbu kya Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
Mu nsiitu dzidzo , me nyabee nyatya kutekesele kwiisa kuri beenu , mpisi heki lutaambula bweese mu lwadzoolo .
Tumi nyisikaa kuri beenu , nyeende ku Makedonya , na nyisikaa ku Makedonya mbweese kwiisa kuri beenu , na beenu lumbakisa mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaami , ku Yudaya .
Buri me ntyaanaa bubwo kuyirika , lo budzeeke nyiri mu kusoongo ? Hoti ma ntii me mamo , mu kimuutu me nyimatiiriri , mpisi heki mu me muba : « heehe lo heehe » na « pele lo pele » ?
Nzaambi wakwiikama , ma turi mu kuleele kuri beenu , mahele kuba « heehe » na « pele » .
Bukuri , Mwaana Nzaambi , Yesu Kiristo wu turi twayaabisa kuri beenu , me na Silvano na Timoteho , nde kasii kuba : « heehe » na « pele » ko .
Mukwongo , nsiilulu dza Nzaambi dzodzinso mu nde dini « heehe » diri , Mu didyo se beetu tukooleelaa ti « Amene » kuri Nzaambi , mu kumuha nkeembu .
Wunde wukookumisaa beetu na beenu mu Kiristo , na watukila maasi , ngo Nzaambi ;
nde se watusa kinyemu kyaandi , na wasuusa bidiimbu bya Mpeeve munsa mitima myeetu .
Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , me nyilaba maalu mu kidziingu kya me-meene ti : me nyasii bweese kwiisa ku Korinto ko , mu kulubatisa misamu .
Kari kuri ti beetu , turi na lutumu mu kanyi dya beenu ko , ngo beetu tukwesala kintwaari na beenu , mu kuri ti beenu lumono kiminu , bukuri beenu lwateleme na keketee mu kanyi .
Mukwongo , me nyamwiini dyo ti bwabubwete , mu kuhele kubweese kwiisa kuri beenu , mpisi luhele kukoto mu ngebe .
Bukuri , mbuti me nyilukotisiri mu ngebe , lo na wubweese kuha me kiminu , mbuti kari wunde wumwaakotoso mu ngebe ko ?
Me nyatinini mimyo , mu kubata kuri ti babo baketi kuha me kiminu , bankotoso mu ngebe mu ntaangu yi nyikwiisa . Me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti , kiminu kya me , kya beenu-banso se .
Mukwongo , mu mpasi dzalaka na mutima kinkuukulu , na mu mansangasa malaka me nyalutinini ; kari mu kulukotoso mu ngebe ko , ngo mu kuri ti luyaaba ntiilu ya bunsaalisi yi nyiri na yo mu beenu .
Mbuti kuri muutu wasakisiri ngebe , lo kari me kakotisiri mu ngebe ko , ngo babamosi mu beenu , bunu pe beenu-banso mbuti nyahele kusa mansaalisi .
Muutu wa bubwo wayelemene kutaambula biŋaŋunu kuri baatu balaka .
Beenu ngo bari , siilee wa bubwo mpemisi , na muboondeenu mpisi kahele kudyaama kunsa ngebe dzibvuriri bunene .
Hango-nkuumbu , me nyilusyaamisa mu kusoongo kimbaangi kya ntiilu yeenu mu nde .
Bukuri mu bubwo me nyalutinini , mpisi me nyilutsiitsa , mu kuyaaba , kari beenu luri na bintambukulu mu myominso .
Beenu lusiilaa muutu mpemisi , lo me se nyimusiriri mpemisi ; mukwongo , mpemisi ngo yiri me nyasa , na mbuti nyasiila muutu mpemisi mu musamu , lo mu ntoono beenu , ha busu bwa Kiristo ,
mpisi heki tuhele kubwa mu mawunu ma Satana , bukuri bitsimi bya nde tubiyaari .
Me nyatubuka ku Torowasi , mu kweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , na Mfumu wanzibukila mweelu ,
ngo mpeeve me yaba yahele na kidzuunu , bukuri nyasii mono Tito mpaangi yaami ko , hango , me nsiisaana bari ku Torowasi , ha nyeki kweendaana ku Makedonya .
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi ! Nde wuri mu mpisi ntaangu wutululukisaa mu Kiristo , na wukwepukulaa mu mpisi kibeendu , mfuku ya nyaabulu yaandi mu beetu .
Bukuri beetuneenu ngo mfuku yayibwete ya Kiristo , kuri Nzaambi , ha kakati dya babvuuka na badziimbila ;
mu bamosi mfuku ya lufwa yihaanaa lufwa , mu bakaka mfuku ya bumwooyo yihaanaa bumwooyo . Ngo na wakuka mu mimyo ?
Mukwongo , beetu turi bunu bakaka bakweyarika maampu ma Nzaambi ko ; ngo kasi mu ngwanwa , mu nkuumbu ya Nzaambi na ha busu bwaandi , beetu turi mu kwedzoonsolo mu Kiristo .
Buri tubweese kubaandika kusaka lutumu mu beetu-meene ? Hoti bunu babamosi , turi na nzala mukaanda wa ntumunu wa kulusoongo , bunu pe kululoombo ?
Mukaanda beetu ngo beenu , watinu mu mitima myeetu , wayabakana na wataangu kuri baatu bobanso .
Nkati diri dyayabakana ti , beenu ngo mukaanda Kiristo wu turi twatubula beetu , wahele kuba watinu mu ntiinta yapiinda , ngo mu Mpeeve Nzaambi yamwooyo ; wahele kuba watinu mu bibari bya malweende , ngo mu mabaya ma mitima mya muswinyi .
Yiyo ngo nsiitu yi turi na yo , mu Yesu Kiristo kuri Nzaambi .
Ka kuri ti lo tuyirikiri kitotolo mu makwa ma beetu-meene ko , ngo makwa meetu mafumunaa kuri Nzaambi ,
nde watuha makwa mu kuba bisari bya lulelusunu lwamoono , kari mu kisoni ko , ngo Mpeeve , bukuri kisoni kidzusaa , kasi Mpeeve yihaanaa bumwooyo .
Ngo mbuti kisalu kya lufwa , kyatinu mu bisoni ha yulu malweende kyabakiri nkeembu , yiri baala ba Isaheli baba bahele kubangisina kusungumina kisoosi ku busu bwa Moose bwaba semaana , mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele ,
lo kisalu kya Mpeeve sa kyabvula nkeembu .
Mukwongo , mbuti kisalu kya kukesele baatu mukanu kyabakiri nkeembu , lo kisalu kya kululukisa baatu sa kyabvula nkeembu .
Mukwongo , bibyo bi bakeembisiri , byasii baka nkeembu yayelemene na nkeembu yibvuriri bunene yimayi ko .
Bukuri , mbuti bibyo byahele kudziingila byabakiri nkeembu , lo bibyo bidziingulaana sa byabvula nkeembu .
Bu turi na nsiitu dza bubwo , ngo turi mu kwesalila mu nsiitu dzodzinso .
Beetu twahele kusa bunu Moose , waba fukaana nsaanda ku busu bwaandi , mpisi heki baala ba Isaheli bahele kumono nsukulu ya bibyo byahele kudziingula .
Ngo kasi bo bari kunsa lubu . Natee mu kiluumbu ki , bo bu bataangaa lulelusunu lwalukulu , lo nsaanda yiyo yahele kuyisika , bukuri yo kuyisikila mu Kiristo .
Ngo kasi natee mu kiluumbu ki , bo bu bataangaa mikaanda mya Moose , lo nsaanda yafuka mitima mya bo .
Ngo , « babaanaa basyeetukiri kuri Mfumu , lo nsaanda yiyisikiri . »
Mfumu ngo Mpeeve , haho hari Mpeeve ya Mfumu , haho se hari bunsaalisi .
Beetu-banso bari busu bwahele kufuka nsaanda , nkeembu ya Mfumu yiri mu kuseme mu beetu , bunu ti mu lumweenye , mu kifwaani kikyo turi twakituka mu nkeembu na nkeembu , mu Mfumu wuri Mpeeve .
Hango-nkuumbu , bu turi na kisalu kimaki , beetu twahele kuholo-bito , bukuri mu ngebe dza Nzaambi turi twakitaambula .
Ngo kasi beetu twabisa mansweeki mansoni , tukwedyaatila kwahele mawunu , na twahele kwekitula maampu ma Nzaambi , ngo mu nsoongulu ngwanwa , beetu turi mu kwesaka kuri ti baatu batufyongokono , ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
Ngo mbuti Musamu Wamubwete wa beetu wasweeku , lo mu bakweyende ku nzimbukulu kari kasweeku ,
mu baatu bahele na kanyi , bari nzaambi ya nsi yi wayeki wabiiyisa madyeele ma bo , mpisi bahele kutalila buungi bwa Musamu Wamubwete , wa nkeembu ya Kiristo , nde wuri kifwaani kya Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , beetu twahele kweyaabisa mi tariri beetu-meene , ngo Yesu Kiristo Mfumu turi mu kweyaabisa ; beetu-meene ngo turi bisari bya beenu mu ntoono Yesu .
Bukuri Nzaambi waleeriri ti : « Mu mampimbisi , buungi sa bwaseme ! » Nde wasemini mu mitima myeetu , mu kusoongo nteendele ya nyaabulu nkeembu Nzaambi , ku busu bwa Yesu Kiristo .
Beetu tukwenata busina bumabu , mu bisa bya tubuumbu , mpisi heki mpinu dza kiteesu kyalutila , dziba dza Nzaambi nkani ka dza beetu ko .
Beetu batuswetekese mu mpele ngo mpele , ngo twahele kunyifuka , turi mu kwedunga , ngo twahele kukoono ,
bakwetulaanda , ngo bahele kutubakila , batubwiisa ha nsi , ngo bahele kututsuumbula .
Mantaangu momanso , tukwenata mwomunso , lufwa lwa Yesu mu nyutu yeetu , mpisi heki bumwooyo bwa Yesu se , buba bwamonokono mu nyutu yeetu .
Mukwongo , mantaangu momanso beetuneenu bamwooyo , turi bayekulu mu lufwa mu ntoono Yesu , mpisi heki bumwooyo bwa Yesu , buba bwamonokono mu nyutu yeetu ya lufwa .
Mu didyo lufwa luri mu kusala mu beetu , ngo bumwooyo buri mu kusala mu beenu .
Bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Me nyasii kanyi , hango-nkuumbu nyadzoonsiri . » Beetu se , mu mpeeve yo yimosi ya kanyi , twasa kanyi , hango-nkuumbu turi mu kudzoonso ,
bu tuyaari kuri ti , wunde wafulukisi Mfumu Yesu , sa kafulukisa beetu se kintwaari na Yesu , na sa katusuusa ha kimosi na beenu bebele na nde .
Mukwongo , myominso mimyo miri mu ntoono beenu , mpisi heki bweese buhamisaana mu baatu balaka , mvutukulu matoondo se yiba yabuukula mu nkeembu ya Nzaambi .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu twahele kuholo-bito . Ngo ti hayuku nyutu yeetu ya ku mbasi yiri mu kwekuuka , lo nyutu ya kunsa-kati yiri mu kwekitukaa yamoono mu kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu .
Mukwongo , mpasi dzeetu dzaleenge mu ntaangu yi , dziri mu kubuta kilemu kya nkeembu ha yulu nkeembu , yahele manunu kuri beetu .
Beetu twahele kutala bitotolo bibyo byamonoko , ngo bibyo byahele kumonoko ; bukuri bibyo byamonoko byahele kudziingula , ngo kasi bibyo byahele kumonoko , bidziingulaa kwakinkulu .
Mukwongo , beetu tuyaari ti , mbuti nzo yeetu ya musaampu ya ha butoto ha yitsyaamukini , lo turi na nzo ya mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi mu mayulu , yahele kuba yatuungu mu myooko mya baatu .
Mu didyo beetu tukwekuuma , na turi na musoongo walaka mu kulwaata nzo yeetu ya ku yulu ,
kuri heki , ti hayuku twahele kulwaata kinkuta , bahele kutumono kimpene .
Mukwongo , bu turi munsa musaampu wumawu , tukwekuuma kunsa kilemu , bukuri twahele kutya kusyonono kinkuta , ngo tutiiri kulwaata kikimi ha yulu , mpisi heki bikoofwa biba byadyaama kunsa bumwooyo .
Wunde watuyirika mu kutaambula mamo ngo Nzaambi , nde watuha bidiimbu bya Mpeeve .
Ngo beetu twaluula mu nsiitu mu mantaangu momanso , na tuyaari ti , bu turi mu nyutu yimayi , turi ku bunzeense la na Mfumu ;
bukuri beetu mu kanyi turi mu kwedyaatila , nkani ka mu mwiinunu ko .
Beetu twaluula mu nsiitu , na tumono kuri ti , bubvuriri bubwete mu kupala mu nyutu yimayi , na kweende mu kudzakala kuri Mfumu .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu di tutiiri mu kubweeye kuri nde , ti tuba mu nyutu yi , bunu pe tupala mu yo .
Bukuri beetu-banso tuyelemini kuteleme ha busu bwa mutsuundu wa Kiristo , mpisi heki muutu-muutu kataambula , museendu wa ma kari kayirika , mu nyutu yaandi , mamabwe bunu pe mamabi .
Ngo bu tuyaari buri kibvumi kya mfumu , beetu tusakaana kuri ti baatu babakula dyo . Nzaambi wutuyaari nkati kwafwaana ; na me nsimini ti mu mitima myeenu beenu se luyaari kwafwaana .
Beetu twahele na nzala kubweese kuba , na ntumunu mu beetu-meene kuri beenu , ngo tutiiri kuluha mpwaani , ya kuba na kimweese mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki luba na mvutu ya kuha kuri babo bakwesa kimweese kya ku mbasi , nkani ka kya mitima ko .
Mukwongo , mbuti beetu twabeeri madzeeke , lo mu ntoono Nzaambi ; ngo mbuti turi na madyeele , lo mu ntoono beenu .
Bukuri ntiilu ya Kiristo yatusweeteke , na tuyaari dyo mu ngwanwa ti , muutu mosi kitsu wafwiila mu bobanso , ngo bobanso se bafwa .
Nde wafwiila mu bobanso , mpisi heki bamwooyo bahele kubweese kuba bamwooyo mu bo-meene , ngo mu wunde wafwiiri na wafulukiri mu ntoono bo .
Hango-nkuumbu , kubandika lumalu beetu twahele kuyaaba muutu mu muswinyi ; na mbuti twayaaba Kiristo mu muswinyi , lo mu lumalu twahele bweese kumuyaabila bubwo .
Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti muutu wuri mu Kiristo , lo nde kiyiriki kyamoono ; byabikulu byayeki byaluta , byamoono byayiingina .
Byobinso byafumuna kuri Nzaambi , nde wabweese kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya beetu , na nde-meene mu Kiristo , na watuha kisalu kya kubweese kwesuusa nyukusunu .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi waba mu Kiristo , mu kubweese kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya nsi na nde-meene , kwahele kutaangula baatu lumvuki lwa bo , na kusuusa mu beetu maampu ma kubweese kusa nyukusunu .
Beetuneenu ngo turi bamonikisi ba Kiristo , buni ti Nzaambi wuri mu kulusyaamisa mu beetu ; beetu tuluyiingikila mu nkuumbu ya Kiristo , taambulee kubweese kuyukusuna na Nzaambi .
Wunde waba wahele na masumu , nde wamusa ngaa-masumu mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki mu nde , tubeenee nsungumunu ya Nzaambi .
Ngo bukuri tukwesala kintwaari na nde , beetu tulusyaamisa mu kuhele kuhololo kwa buunu , bweese bwa Nzaambi buluri lwataambula .
Bukuri nde wuleele ti : « Mu ntaangu yayelemene , me nyikuhaanaa mvutu , mu kiluumbu kya mvuukulu , me nyikubakisaana . » Mono mu lumalu , yi ngo ntaangu nkati yayelemene ; mono mu lumalu , ki ngo kiluumbu kya mvuukulu .
Beetu twahele kubumisa muutu makya mu ntoono ti mosi , mpisi heki kisalu kihele kuba kyasaanu .
Ngo kasi mu myominso , beetu tutiiri kumonokono beetu-meene bunu bisari bya Nzaambi , kunsa kifiki kyalaka , mu mpasi , mu manyoongi , mu kinkuukulu ,
mu biwa , mu maboroko , mu nwanusunu , mu bisalu byamakwa , mu kwekyeelele bwiisi , mu maloomi ,
mu nsyemukunu , mu nyaabulu , mu nkindusulu-mutima , mu mbweeyulu-mutima , mu Mpeeve Yangisi , mu ntiilu yahele bumpitu-bumpyoongo ,
mu maampu ma ngwanwa , mu mpinu dza Nzaambi ; mu kuba na binwaanunu bya nsungumunu , bya kooko kwalubakala na bya kooko kwalumoso ,
mu nkeembu na mu nsaanunu , mu mvuumfu yayibi na yayibwe , bunu bangaa-mpya koomosoko turi bangaa-ngwanwa ,
bunu ba bahele kuyaaba koomosoko twayaabakana kwalaka ; bunu beki mu kufwa koomosoko turi mwooyo , bunu ba bari mu kulata ngo bahele kubadzusa ;
bunu bari mu ngebe , koomosoko bari mu kiminu ; bunu bari kunsa buwelu bwa makwa , koomosoko bakwekabula busina ; bunu bahele na kitotolo , koomosoko bari na byobinso .
Beetu twadzoonsiri kuri beenu , bari Korinto , mitima myeetu myabeeri myadzibulu na pwelelee .
Beetu twahele kaanga mitima mu beenu , ngo beenu-meene lwakaanga mitima myeenu .
Me nyiludzoonsolo bunu baala baami , beenu se mu kuha mvutu , dzibulee mitima .
Yaa luba mu kihaangu kimosi na bangooyi ko ; mukwongo , nki byantwaari ha kakati dya nsungumunu na bubayi , bunu pe nki byantwaari ha kakati dya buungi na mampimbisi ?
Nkya nyukusunu yiri ha kakati dya Kiristo na Belyari , bunu pe nki byantwaari ha kakati dya ngaa-kanyi na mungooyi ?
Nkya nyukusunu yiri ha kakati dya Nzo ya Nzaambi na biteki ? Bukuri beetuneenu turi Nzo ya Nzaambi yamwooyo , bunu bwaleele Nzaambi ti : « Me sa nzakala ha kakati dya bo , na me sa nyeyende na bo , Me sa mba Nzaambi bo , na bo sa baba baatu baami . »
Hango nkuumbu , Mfumu ti : « Paleenu ha kakati dya bo , na haambikiseenu na bo . Yaa lubelemene kitotolo ti kimosi kya sumuka ko , na me sa nyalutaambula .
Me sa mba Taayi kuri beenu , na beenu sa lwaba baala ba babakala , na ba bakyeetu kuri me , Mfumu Ngaa-mpinu wuleele . »
Ngo banduku ba mutima , bukuri turi na nsiilulu dza bubwo , tutsyeemekeenu mu mamviindu momanso ma muswinyi na ma kiluunsi , na tukukiseenu bungisi kunsa kibvumi kya Nzaambi .
Taambulee beetu mu mitima myeenu ; beetu twasii yirikila muutu mamabi ko , twasii maana kuholo bya muutu ko , na twasii diila muutu manene ko .
Me nyahele kuleele bubwo mu kulukesele mukanu ; bukuri me nyatekisiri kuleele ti , beenu luri mu mitima myeetu , ti mu lufwa ti mu bumwooyo .
Me nyiri na nsiitu yalaka mu beenu , nyiri na kimweese kyalaka mu beenu , me nyaluula mu mboondulu , me kiminu kyabuukula kunsa mpasi dzeetu dzodzinso .
Mukwongo , beetu tutubukaana ku Makedonya , twasii baka ntaangu ya kuwuumisa manyutu meetu ko , ngo kasi , kwokunso mpasi na mpasi ; nwaanunu ku mbasi , boomo kunsa mitima .
Ngo Nzaambi wuboondaana bakuluka , watuboondiri mu nyisulu Tito ,
kari munu mu nyisulu nde ko , ngo se na mu mboondulu yi kabakiri nde kuri beenu ; nde watuyaabisiri musoongo wu luri na nde , bidilu byeenu , na kuheme ku luri na kwo mu me , na mu didyo me nyabweesiri kumono kiminu kibvuriri bunene .
Ngo mbuti me nyalumonisini ngebe mu mukaanda waami , lo me nyahele kunyoongo mu didyo ; lu ti hayuku nyanyoongini ha nyamwii kuri ti , mukaanda wunde waluhee ngebe mu mwaa-ntaangu .
Mu lumalu , me nyimono kiminu ; kari bukuri beenu lwamwii ngebe ko , ngo bukuri lwamwii ngebe mu kuyiinga madyeele ; mukwongo , beenu lwamwii ngebe bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , mpisi heki mu kibari kya beetu , beenu luhele kutaambula mamabi .
Bukuri ngebe dza ntiilu ya Nzaambi , dzibutaa nyiingulu madyeele , mu kubaka mvuukulu kwahele kunyoongo ; ngo kasi ngebe dza nsi dzibutaa lufwa .
Sa monee mu lumalu , nkya kifiki ngebe dza ntiilu ya Nzaambi dzibutiri mu beenu : nkya mampemisi , nkya minyoongi , nkya boomo , nkya musoongo , nkya kuheme , nkya maseembu ! Mu myominso beenu lwasoongiri ti , lwahele na kibila mu musamu wunde .
Ngo mbuti me nyalutinini , lo kari mu ntoono muyiriki-mamabi , bunu pe mu ntoono wunde wu bari bayirikila mamabi ko , ngo mu kusoongo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , kuheme ku luri na kyo mu beetu .
Mu didyo , beetu twabakiri mboondulu . Ha yulu mboondulu yiyo , beetu twabweesiri kumono kiminu kyalaka , mu kiminu kyabeeri na Tito , bukuri beenu-banso lwadzuunisini bitsimi byaandi .
Ngo mbuti ha busu bwa nde , me nyasoongiri kimweese mu ntoono beenu , lo me nyasii mono nsoni mu mimyo ko , ngo kasi bunu buri ngwanwa yoyinso yi turi twaleele kuri beenu , bunubwo se kimweese ki twasoongiri kuri Tito mu ntoono beenu , kiri kyangwanwa .
Nde wuri na musoongo walaka mu beenu , mbiki ti ha kabaambuka nde mwooyo mu kutumuma kwa beenu-banso , na bu lwasiiri mu kumutaambula mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu .
Me nyimono kiminu , bu nyiri na nsiitu mu beenu mu myominso .
Beetu tuyaabisa kuri beenu , bampaangi , bweese bwa Nzaambi bwataamburi mabuundu mari ku Makedonya .
Kunsa mpasi dzi bari babwanikina na dzo , kiminu kya bo kya mansaalisi , na buwelu bwa bo bwa musundu , byabwookoso busina mu mpeelu bikabu bya bo ,
bunu bwaba lubaku lwa bo , me nyi bateele kimbaangi ti , bo baheeri mu kiteesu kyalutila lubaku lwa bo , mu bunsaalisi .
Bo batuyingukiri kwalaka , kuri ti bo se babaka bweese bwa kuha lubakusu , mu kisalu kitariri bangisi .
Bo bayirika ma lutila kiteesu ti na ma twaba twatsima beetu , bo batekisiri kuha mitima kuri Mfumu , tumi kuri beetu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu twasyaamisini Tito , mpisi kamana kisalu kya lubakusu kikyo , ki kamwaabaandika kuri beenu .
Ngo bukuri beenu luri na byobinso byabuukula : kanyi , lungweensu , nyaabulu , kuheme mu myominso , na ntiilu yi luri na yo mu beetu ; lo beenee se babuukula mu bweese bubwo .
Me nyahele kuluha lutumu , kasi me nyiludzoonsolo mu kuheme kya bambaasi , mu kuri ti beenu se lusoongo bungwanwa bwa ntiilu yeenu .
Mukwongo , beenu luyaari bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo : nde waba kisina , kasi mu ntoono beenu , walwaata buwelu , mpisi heki mu buwelu bwaandi , beenu luba bisina .
Me nyiluha kitsimi kya mu mimyo : mukwongo , myayelemene mu beenu mimami , beenu lwaba batete kari munu mu kutolo lubakusu ko , ngo na mu kubaka kitsimi kya bubwo , kuholosono mu mubvu wayooko .
Ngo mu lumalu , kuundulee kisalu kikyo , mpisi heki mamo ma lutiiri kukukisa , bunu buri lubaku lweenu , mayelemene na kifiki kya kutya kweenu .
Bukuri mbuti bitsimi biri byabibwete , lo bataamburi kikabu , bunu buri bi tubakiri nkani ka mu bi tuheriri kubaka ko .
Mukwongo , ka kuri ti beenu ngo bari lukoto mu mpasi , heki bakaka babaka lubakusu ko , ngo kasi mu kusa nsiisa ;
mu ntaangu ya lumalu , bibyo bi luri na byo bya mansaalisi , sa byabakisa babo bahele na kitotolo , mpisi heki ha luba beenu se kuri kitotolo pe , bi baba na bo bya mansaalisi bibakisa beenu , mpisi heki kuba nsiisa ,
bunu buri matinu : « Wunde waba na byalaka , kasii ba na bya mansaalisi ko ; na wunde waba na byantele , kasii ba na bi kaheriri ko . »
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , wasa mu mutima Tito , kuheme kwokumosi na ku turi na beetu mu beenu .
Nde wataamburi mbila yeetu mu kuheme kwokunso , na nde-meene wabakiri kitsimi kya kwiisa kuri beenu .
Beetu twaheekiri mpaangi mosi , yikweyende kintwaari na nde , mpaangi yiyo mabuundu momanso mari mu kumusiikaana , mu dyaambu ditariri Musamu Wamubwete .
Kari minimyo ko , ngo mabuundu mamo mamusooriri se mu kweyende na beetu , mu kisalu kya lubakusu ki turi mu kwesala , mu kusaka nkeembu ya Mfumu nde-meene , na mu kusoongo kifiki kyeetu .
Beetu tukwebata maseembu , mu mitariri bwa kusalila mboongo dzalaka dzi bari batuha ;
bukuri beetu tutiiri kuyirika mamabwe , kari hani ha busu bwa Mfumu ko , ngo se na ha busu bwa baatu .
Beetu twaheekiri mpaangi yeetu mu kweyende na bo , mu mantaangu malaka , beetu twamutsitsiri , mu kumono buri kuheme kyaandi , ngo mu lumalu kuheme kwaandi kweki kwabvulila mu ntoono nsiitu dzalaka dzikari na dzo mu beenu .
Ti hayuku mu ntoono Tito wu turi kintwaari , mbaasi yaami ya kisalu ku luri beenu ; ti hayuku bampaangi beetu , bantumu ba mabuundu , bobanso bakwesala mu nkeembu ya Kiristo .
Yirikee kusoongo , ha busu bwa mabuundu , kidiimbu kya ntiilu yeenu , na kimweese kyeetu mu beenu kuri bo .
Mu mitariri kisalu kya mbakusulu bangisi , me nyahele kumono mufunu mu kulutinina .
Mukwongo , me nyaari kifiki kya beenu , na mu kyo me nyiri na kimweese mu beenu kuri bari Makedonya . Bari ku Akaya beki bayirima kuholosono mubvu wayooko , na kuheme kwa beenu kwaheeri nsyamusunu kuri balaka mu bo .
Ngo me nyaluheekiri bampaangi babo , mpisi heki kimweese kya beetu mu beenu , kihele kuba kya buunu mu ntoono yiyo , na kuri ti beenu luba bayirima , bunu bu nyabee leele ;
mu kubata kuri ti , mu nsiitu dza bubwo beetu tufwa nsoni , mu kuhele kuleele ti beenu lufwa nsoni , mbuti heki bari Makedonya biisaana kintwaari na me , bamwii kuri ti beenu lwahele kuyirima .
Ngo me nyamwii mufunu , mu kuloombo kuri bampaangi babo , mpisi batekesele kwiisa kuri beenu na batekesele kuyirikisa bikabu bya lubakusu bi luri lwasa nsiilulu , mpisi heki lubakusu lulwo luba bunu kikabu kya bunsaalisi nkani ka kya lukakutu ko .
Yaabee ti : Wunde wukuna mwaa-kwantele sa katolo se mwaa-kwantele , na wunde wukuna kwalaka sa katolo se kwalaka .
Mpisi muutu kaha bunu bu kari katsima kunsa mutima waandi , kwahele nyoongunu bunu pe mu kukwiikisa ; bukuri Nzaambi tiiri wunde wuhaanaa mu kiminu .
Nzaambi wakuka mu kululuulusa mu mabweese ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , mpisi heki mu mantaangu momanso beenu luba na byakuka , na luba se na bya mansaalisi mu kweyirika momanso mamabwe ,
bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Nde kookabulaa , nde koohaanaa kuri bawelu , nsungumunu yaandi yinamitina kwakinkulu . »
Wunde wuhaanaa nsaangi kuri mukuni , na byandya bya kudya , sa kaluha nsaangi , sa kafunisa dzo , na sa kamenise bimbutu bya nsungumunu yeenu .
Beenu sa lwaba bisina mu myominso , mpisi lweha bikabu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , bisa kuri ti mu kisalu kya beetu , baatu babvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi ;
bukuri kisalu kikyo kya ntolulu bikabu , kari lunu lubakusu kiha kuri bangisi ko , ngo se kisa kuri ti , baatu babvutula matoondo malaka kuri Nzaambi .
Bamonaa bubwe bwa kisalu kikyo , bo sa bakeembese Nzaambi , mu ntoono kutumuma ku luri mu kusoongo beenu , mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , na mu kukabula lubakusu lweenu kintwaari na bo , na baatu bobanso .
Mu nsaambulu dza bo mu beenu , bo sa basoongo musoongo walaka wu bari na nde , mu ntoono bweese bwa mansaalisi bwaluha Nzaambi .
Matoondo kuri Nzaambi mu ntoono kikabu kyaandi kyankimukunu !
Me Pawulo , nyilusyaamisa me-meene mu bundeembu , na mu mutima-bubwete wa Kiristo . Bakweleele ti , me nyiri na nsoni habaanaa nyiri ha kakati dya beenu , ngo kasi nyakasuka habaanaa nyiri la na beenu ;
me nyisaambila mu kuri ti , mpele kuba nyakasuka ha nyikwiisa kuri beenu , mu kitsimi kya kusoongo ti nyakasuka , ha busu bwa bakweleele ti , beetu tukwedyaatila mu kimuutu .
Mukwongo , mu kimuutu turi mu kwedyaatila , ngo kari mu kimuutu turi mu kwenwaanina ko .
Bukuri binwaanunu bituri mu kwenwaanina kikiindu , biri bya kimuutu ko ; ngo kasi bya mpinu dza Nzaambi , byakuka mu kutsyaamuna bisweemunu bya makwa . Beetu tukwetsyaamuna nzoonsulu dzadzibi ,
na mpinu dzodzinso dza masiiku dzikwetungukula nyaabulu ya Nzaambi , mpisi tukitula bitsimi bya baatu kuri heki batumuma kuri Kiristo ,
na tuba twayirima mu kuseembe babo bahele kutumuma , mu ntaangu yiri beenu-banso lumwaamana kutumuma .
Yirikee kutala bitotolo bunu bu biri . Mbuti muutu wumono dyo ti nde wuri wa Kiristo , lo kayirika kuyaaba ti nde bukari wa Kiristo beetu se turi ba Kiristo .
Mukwongo , ti bukuri me nyasii mwaa-kimweese mu bumfumu bwa tuha Mfumu , mu kulutuunga nkani ka mu kulutsyaamuna ko , lo me nyiri na nsoni mu mimyo ko .
Me ntii kumonokono , buni ti me nyilusa boomo mu mikaanda myaami ko ;
bukuri bakweleele ti , mikaanda mimyo miri na musundu na mya makwa , koomosoko nde-meene mu kumumono wahele na makwa , na nzoonsulu dzaandi dzahele kitotolo .
Ngo mpisi wunde wuleele bubwo lo kayaaba ti : bu nyiri me mu maampu ma nyitina mikaanda kuri nyiri la , bunu bubwo se nyiri mu biyiriki ha busu bwa beenu .
Beetu ka tutsiitsa kuba nsiisa , bunu pe kusaka nsobokoso , dzi turi na dzo na baatu bamosi , bakweha ntumunu mu bo-meene ko . Baatu babo bahele kubakula , bukuri bo bakweteese bambaasi mu kiteesulu kya bo-meene , na bakwesaka nsobokoso ha kakati dya bo-meene .
Beetu ngo bari twahele kusa kimweese kwa mansaalisi , ngo beetu kusiila bunu buri kiteesu kya kisalu kya tuha Nzaambi , mu kutubuka natee kuri beenu .
Mukwongo , beetu twahele kuluta mandilu , ngo beetu twatubuka na Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo natee kuri beenu .
Beetu twahele kusa kimweese kya mansaalisi mu bisalu bya ŋani , ngo beetu turi na nsiitu ti kanyi dya beenu dihamisaana , lo kisalu kya beetu se sa kyahamisa kubuuka bunu buri kiteesu ki turi twatsima ,
mu kweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete mu mankoonsi mabvuriri la na beenu , kwahele kusa kimweese mu biteesu bya ŋani mu bisalu byeki byayirima .
Ngo kasi , « wunde wutiiri kusa masiiku , lo kasa masiiku mu Mfumu . »
Mukwongo , kari wunde wusalaa mu ntumunu ya nde-meene bateela kimbaangi ko , ngo wunde wasala mu ntumunu ya Mfumu .
Mbuti beenu lo lukuundiri mwaa-bulawuku bwa me , lo katee kukuunda me .
Mukwongo , me nyilusiila bukwa mu kiteesu kya bukwa bwa Nzaambi , bukuri me nyaluyakisa mu lulelusunu lwa makweele kuri bakala dimosi , bunu mwaa-ntuumba ya nswaasa yatsyeemeke ya kusoongo kuri Kiristo .
Ngo bunu bwaba wuna nyoko Eva mu lupyelu lwaandi , me nyibata ti bitsimi bibiya na biba la na nkulukulu na nsyemukunu ha busu bwa Kiristo .
Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wiisiri kuri beenu , wuluyaabisiri Yesu dikimi diri beetu twasii yaabisa ko , bunu pe lutaamburi mpeeve yasoboko na yiyo yi lwataamburi , bunu pe Musamu Wamubwe wasoboko na wunde wu lwataamburi , lo beenu mya bubwo ngo miri lukuundaa .
Mukwongo , me nsimini ti nyahele kubvula buntele , na bantumu ba beenu babanene babo , mu ntoono ti mosi .
Mbuti mu mya kudzoonso me nyahele na lungweensu , ngo kari mu mya nyaabulu ko ; mimyo beetu twasoongo mu mpisi mpwaani , na mu biteesu byobinso kuri beenu .
Hoti masumu me nyiri nyayirika mu kuba wakuluka me-meene , mpisi beenu luba lwadzaangusu , bukuri twaluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete kwa mungengi ?
Me nyakuukusa mabuundu makaka , mu kutaambula mufutu kuri bo mu kusalila beenu .
Ha nyaba kuri beenu , bu nyaba na nzala lubakusu , me nyasii diila muutu manene ko ; ngo me nyataambula lubakusu kuri bampaangi bafumini ku Makedonya ; mu myominso me nyabisiri kuri ti beenu lumbuungula , na sa nyanamitina kubisa ntoono yiyo .
Yiyo ngwanwa ya Kiristo yiri mu me , kuri muutu wudika me ko mu kuba na kimweese kikyo mu mankoonsi ma Akaya .
Bukuri nki ? Mu kuri ti me nyahele ku lutya ? Nzaambi yaari .
Ma nyiri mu kuyirika , me sa mbweese kumayirika , mpisi me nyisila mpwaani , kuri babo batiiri kubaka mpwaani ya kusa kimweese bunu beetu .
Bukuri baatu babo ngo bantumu bampya , bisari byamawunu , bikweswemekene mu kifwaani kya bantumu ba Kiristo .
Diri dya nkimukunu ko , bukuri Satana nde-meene wuswemekinaa mu kifwaani kya mbasi ya buungi .
Ngo diri dyansisi ko , mbuti bisari bya nde se bikweswemekene mu kifwaani kya bisari bya nsungumunu . Nsukulu bo sa yaba bunu buri biyiriki byaaku .
Me nyibweese kuleele ti , ya kuba muutu wuhololo me bunu kilawuku ko , ngo mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo taambulee me bunu kilawuku , mpisi me se mba na mwaa-kimweese .
Ma nyiri mu kuleele , me nyahele kuleele mo bunu bu tiriri Mfumu , ngo bunu ti kunsa bulawuku , mu nsiitu yiyo ya kuba na kimweese .
Ngo bukuri baatu balaka bakwesa kimweese mu muswinyi , me se sa nsa kimweese .
Mukwongo , beenu luri na madyeele , lukwekuunda mu ntiilu ya beenu-meene , babo bahele na madyeele !
Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wulusiiri bunkutu , mbuti muutu wuludiila manene , mbuti muutu horiri bi luri na byo , mbuti muutu wubilika mu beenu , na mbuti muutu wululeti ku busu , lo beenu lukuunda momanso mamo .
Me nyiri na nsoni mu kuleele mimyo , beetuneenu twasoongiri buyonsi . Ngo me nyiri mu kudzoonsolo bunu ti kunsa bulawuku . Mbuti muutu wakuka mu mpisi diba , lo me se nyakuka .
Bo Bahebeleho bari ? Me se . Bahisaheli bari ? Me se . Basundukila mu Abalaami bari ? Me se .
Bisari bya Kiristo bari ? Me nzoonsulu bunu kilawuku , mu kuleele ti me mvuriri na bo ; mu bisalu bya makwa , me mvuriri na bo ; mu maboroko , me mvuriri na bo ; mu nkuba kubwilikila , me mvuriri na bo ; na me mvuriri kuba mu nsisi dza lufwa mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu .
Mbala taanu , me nyiri nyabwilikila nkwaasulu makuumi matatu na wa kuri Bayudayo ;
mbala tatu me bari bandata nkwaasulu , mbala mosi me bari bandatila mu matari , mbala tatu me nyiri nyadyaama mu bwaatu , butsuku na mwiini me nyiri nyalutisa kunsa maampa .
Me nyasa budyeengi bwa mu miilu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakoto mu nsisi dza manyari , mu nsisi dza bangaa-bumfuna , mu nsisi dza ba turi kitsuumbu kimosi , mu nsisi dza makaanda , mu nsisi dza kunsa bvula , mu nsisi dza ku nsi yankatu , mu nsisi dza mu mubu , mu nsisi dza bampaangi bampya .
Me nyasala na nyamono mpasi , me nyakyeelele bitulu bya bwiisi ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakolo nzala na mpwiisu , nyakoto maloomi ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakuukila kyoosi na nyaba mpene .
Nyahele kutaanga kwaandi ti mi siiri , ngo musamu wu mbinikini me mpisi kiluumbu , musoongo wu nyiri na nde mu mabuundu momanso .
Na wuri na buyonsi , kuri lo me se nyahele kuba na buyonsi ? Na wubwa kuri lo me mutima wahele kusa mambaawu ?
Ngo mbuti mu kusa kimweese , lo me nsiiri kimweese mu misamu mitariri buyonsi bwaami .
Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu Yesu , nde wasakumunu mu mibvu ngo mibvu , yaari kuri ti me nyahele kusa mpya .
Ku Damasiko mfumu yaba mumonikisi mbyaasi Areta , watelemisi bari Damasiko mu kukebe bvula mpisi bansiimba .
Ngo me bansudukila munsa mpiri , mu mwaa-mweelu wantele , waba mu kibaka kya lupaangu , na me nyapatika mu myooko mya nde .
Buri me nsa kimweese ? Kwahele mufunu ! Ngo me nzoonsulu mu mitariri mamono-miisu , na manyabusulu ma Mfumu .
Me nyaari muutu mosi mu Kiristo wuri , mibvu kuumi na mina mimwaaluta , kari mu nyutu yaandi , kari kwahele nyutu yaandi me nyaari ko , ngo Nzaambi yaari , muutu wunde bamunaakisa natee ku yulu dya matatu .
Ngo me nyaari ti muutu wunde , ti diba mu nyutu yaandi , ti diba kwahele nyutu yaandi , me nyahele kuyaaba , ngo Nzaambi yaari
kuri ti bamunaakisa ku paradiso , na nde wayuka mantoono mahele ndelulu , mari muutu ti mosi wakiri kubaka pe miswa mya kuleele .
Mu muutu wa bubwo , lo me nsiiri kimweese , ngo mu me-meene me nyahele kusa kimweese mbuti ka mu buyonsi bwaami ko .
Mukwongo , mbuti me ngo mbeeri nyatya kusa kimweese , nkani me nketi kuba kilawuku ko , bukuri ngwanwa me nyileele . Me nyibisa kwaami mu kubata kuri ti , baatu bahele kumono me , mu kiteesu kibvuriri na mimyo mi bamono mu me , bunu pe mi bayuka kuri me .
Mu ntoono manyabusulu mankimukunu . Hango-nkuumbu , mu kuri ti me mpele kuba na masiiku , me bankotoso lunseende mu nyutu , mbasi ya Satana yikwendata , mpisi heki me mpele kuba na masiiku .
Me nyayingukiri Mfumu mbala tatu , mpisi kayisila mpasi dzidzo mu me .
Ngo nde wandeele ti : « Bweese bwa me bwakuka mu ye , bukuri mpinu dzaami dzimonokinaa kunsa buyonsi . » Ngo me mvuriri kutya kusa kimweese mu buyonsi bwaami , mpisi heki mpinu dza Kiristo dzidzakala mu me .
Hango-nkuumbu , me nyimono kiminu mu buyonsi , mu bitari , mu mbamusunu , mu nkwamusunu na kinkuukulu mu ntoono Kiristo ; bukuri me mbaanaa nyiri na buyonsi , lo haho ngo ha nyiri na makwa .
Me nyeki kilawuku bukuri beenu lwankwikisiri . Mukwongo me nyaketi kubaka ntumunu kuri beenu , bukuri me nyahele kubvula buntele , na bantumu ba beenu babanene babo , mu ntoono ti mosi , ti hayuku nyiri wabuunu .
Bidiimbu bisoongo kuri ti me ntumu , byayirimini ha kakati dya beenu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu : bidiimbu , biyiriki byankimukunu , na bimaangu .
Mukwongo , nki beenu luri lwabaka biri mwaa-byantele , ti na biri na mabuundu makaka , buti ka kuri ti , me nyahele kuludiila manene ko ? Hemesenee me mu bubayi bubwo .
Yimayi ngo mbala yatatu , me mwaayirima mu kwiisa kuri beenu , ngo nyahele kwiisa kuludiila manene ; bukuri me bi nyiri na nzala byo kari bitotolo bya beenu ko , ngo beenu-meene . Mukwongo , kari baala bayelemini kuwungukila babuti bitotolo ko , ngo babuti bayelemini kuwungukila baala bitotolo .
Me ngo wuri , nyiri na kutya mu kuha bi nyiri na byo , na sa nyaha kidziingu kyaami mu ntoono miheebulu mya beenu . Habaanaa me nyiri na ntiilu yalaka mu beenu , buri lo beenu ntiilu yantele luba na yo mu me ?
Ngo leelee kwaandi ti , beenu lwahele kubuungula me , ngo me bu nyiri ngaa-lupyelu , nyiri nyalubaka mu mawunu .
Buri me manene nyiri nyaludiila , ha lumbisa lwa mosi mu baatu ba nyiri nyaluheekele ?
Me nyayingukiri Tito , na nyamuheekiri kuri beenu kintwaari na mpaangi mosi ; buri Tito waludiiriri manene ? Buri beetu na nde twasii dyaatila mu kitsimi kimosi ko ? Bunu pe mu bitaambi bimosi ko ?
Kuholosono na kidzika , beenu kutsima ti beetu manyutu turi mu kukalila ha busu bweenu . Ngo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu Kiristo , beetu turi mu kudzoonso ; na myominso mimyo , banduku ba mutima mu ntoono ya kulutuunga .
Mukwongo , me nyibata kuri ti , ha nyikwiisa me mpele kulumono mu kiteesu ki ntiiriri me ; na beenu se luhele kumono me mu kiteesu ki lutiiriri beenu . Me nyibata ti ha kakati dya beenu , haba mayumu , musoki , mankesi , nkalikisi , makele , kintori , kinwa , na kisaangila .
Me nyibata kuri ti , ha nyibweese kwiisa , Nzaambi kankulula ha busu bwa beenu , na me nkoto bufwiiri , mu ntoono balaka bayirikiri masumu mu ntaangu yayikulu , na bahele kuyiinga madyeele mu kuhoto kuyirika , mya nsumukunu , mya kimpala na mya buyala .
Yimayi ngo mbala yatatu me nyeki kwiisa kuri beenu ; « Mu munwa wa bambaangi boolo bunu pe batatu musamu ndemunso sa kawa . »
Me nyaleeriri ha busu bwa beenu , mu luyisu lwadzoolo , na lumalu se nyibweese kuleele kuri nyahele ha busu bwa beenu , kuri bayirikiri masumu mu ntaangu yaluta , na kuri bobanso bakaka ti , mbuti me bweesiri kwiisa lukimi lo nyiluhemese ko ,
bukuri beenu luri mu kusaka kimbaangi ti Kiristo wudzoonsaa mu me . Nde wahele na buyonsi kuri beenu , ngo kasi wusoongaa mpinu dzaandi mu beenu .
Mukwongo , nde bamukomini ha kuruwa mu ntoono buyonsi , ngo kasi wuri mwooyo mu mpinu dza Nzaambi . Na beetu se turi na buyonsi mu nde , ngo kasi sa twaba mwooyo mu mpinu dza Nzaambi kuri beenu .
Fyongokinee mitima myeenu beenu-meene , mu kumono kari luri mu kanyi , tswiikiseenu mitima myeenu ; hoti lwahele kubakula beenu-meene , ti Yesu Kiristo wuri mu beenu ? Mbuti pele , lo beenu lwahele kuba batswiikama .
Me nsimini ti , sa lwabakula ti beetu ngo bari , turi batswiikama .
Ngo beetu tusaambila Nzaambi , mpisi beenu luhele kuyirika ntoono ti mosi yayibi ; kari mu kuri ti beetu twaswiikama tumonokono ko , ngo mu kuri beenu luyirika mamabwe , ti hayuku beetu turi bunu twahele kuswiikama .
Bukuri beetu turi na di tubangisina kuyirika ko , mu kunwaanisa ngwanwa , ngo kasi beetu kubangisina kusalila ngwanwa .
Mukwongo , beetu tumonaa kiminu mpisi ntaangu yiri , beetu turi na buyonsi kasi beenu luri na makwa ; mi turi mu kusambikilaa beetu miri ti beenu lubaanguka .
Hango-nkuumbu , bu nyiri la na beenu me nyilutinina misamu mimyo , mpisi heki ha nyiba ha busu bwa beenu , me mpele kusalila kibakala , bunu buri lutumu lwa mpa Mfumu , mu kutuunga nkani ka mu kutsyaamuna ko .
Mu misiiri ngo miri , bampaangi , monee kiminu , sakeenu kuba babaanguka , syamisinee beenu na beenu , beenee kitsimi kimosi , beenee na kiyeengi , na Nzaambi ya ntiilu na ya kiyeengi sa kaba na beenu .
Helesenee mamboto beenu na beenu , mu nyumutunu yangisi . Bangisi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto .
Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , ntiilu ya Nzaambi , na kintwaari kya Mpeeve Yangisi biba na beenu-banso .
Me Pawulo ntumu , kari bu tiiri baatu bunu pe muutu ko , ngo bu tiiriri Yesu Kiristo na taayi Nzaambi wamufulukisa mu bafwa .
Mu kintwaari na bampaangi bobanso bari na me , turi mu kutina kuri mabuundu ma mu nkoonsi ya Ngalatya .
Bweese na kiyeengi , bifumunaa kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
Yesu Kiristo wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono masumu ma beetu , mpisi heki katukuula mu ntaangu yayibi yimayi , bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi wuri Taayi dyeetu .
Kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu mibvu ngo mibvu ! Amene .
Me nyimono dyo dya nkimukunu , ti mu mawasu-mawasu , beenu lutekele mbisa , kuri wunde waluteele mbila mu bweese [ bwa Kiristo ] , mu ntoono Musamu mukimi Wamubwete .
Mukwongo , kuri Musamu mukimi ko , mbuti ka bangaa-kisaangila ko , batiiri kukitula Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo .
Ngo ti hayuku beetu , bunu pe mbasi ya ku mayulu wuluyaabisiri Musamu Wamubwete wasoboko na wunde wu turi twaluyikisa , lo kabwilikila mpopi !
Bunu bu twaleele , na mu lumalu nyibweese kuleele ti : mbuti muutu wuluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wasoboko na wunde wu luri lwataambula , lo kabwiilikila mpopi !
Mukwongo , mu lumalu , me nsalila makwa mu kuyirika ma tiiri baatu hoti ma tiiri Nzaambi ? Buri haho mbweeyulu kuri baatu nyisaka ? Mbuti mbee nyakiri kwesaka mbweeyulu kuri baatu , lo nketyee kuba nkutu Kiristo ko .
Kuri beenu bampaangi nyiyaabisa ti : Musamu Wamubwete wu nyiri nyayaabisa kari bu tiiriri baatu ko .
Nyahele se kutaambula nde kuri muutu ; kuri muutu ti mosi se ko wanyikisa nde , ngo me nyataambula nde mu nyabusulu ya nde-meene Yesu Kiristo .
Beenu lwayukiri bwaba ndyaatulu yaami , mu ntaangu yi nyaba mu Nzaambi Bayudayo . Me nyakwaamisa dibuundu dya Nzaambi mu kiteesu kyabvulila , na nyadibamisa .
Mu kinzaambi kya Bayudayo , me nyaba mvuriri kiteesu na ba turi kiseendu kimosi , ba kitsuumbu kya me . Me nyaba nyakaangama kwalaka mu kikulu kya bakuutu baami .
Ngo [ Nzaambi ] , wansoolo kuholosono mu mwooyo nguri yaami , wanteele mbila mu bweese bwaandi , bu kamono dyo ti dyadibwete ,
mu kumonokoso Mwaana waandi kuri me , mpisi heki me nyimuyaabisa ha kakati dya makaanda ; ha nsi na nsi , me nyasii loombo ndoongi kuri muutu ko .
Me nyasii kweende se ku Yerusalemi kuri bantumu batekisiri mu kisalu na me ko , ngo me nyateleme na nyayende ku nsi ya Arabya , na nyabweese kubvutuka ku Damasiko .
Tumi , mibvu mitatu bu myaluta , me nyatoomboko ku Yerusalemi mu kuyaabisina na Kefa , na nyadzakala kuri nde biluumbu kuumi na bitaanu .
Me nyasii mono bantumu bakaka ko , ngo wuni Yakobo , mpaangi Mfumu .
Ma nyiri mu kutinina beenu , nkati ha busu bwa Nzaambi , me nyahele kusa mpya .
Tumi , ha nyeki kweendana , mu nkoonsi ya Sirya na ya Kilikya .
Mabuundu ma Kiristo ma ku Yudaya , maba mahele kunyaaba mu kidziri .
Ngo bo bunu bu bayukiri ti : « Wunde waba kwetukwamisaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , mu lumalu weki kweyikisa kanyi di kaba kwebamisaana haba tete . »
Mabuundu mamo masiika Nzaambi mu ntoono me .
Ha mambisa ma kuumi na mina mya mibvu , me nyabweese kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi beetu na Barnaba , nyaholo se Tito .
Me nyatoomboko kukwo , bunu bwaba nyaabusulu , me nyabaangula kuri bo Musamu Wamubwete , wu nyiri mu kweyikisa ha kakati dya makaanda ; nyabaangula se mu buwungu-buwungu kuri bakuutu ba kibvumi , mu kubata kuri ti kisalu ki nyiri mu kusala , bunu pe ki mwaamana kusala kikwiisa kuba kyamungengi .
Tito , Muhelene waba na me , basii kumukwiikisa kuteende bubakala ko .
Kwaba kwaandi na bampaangi bampya , ba mumpitu , bayolimiki ha kakati dya beetu mu kwetukete kunsa bunsaalisi bweetu , bu turi na bwo mu Kiristo Yesu , mpisi heki batusa bankutu ,
ngo kasi kuri bo , ti mu kilookolo kimosi , beetu twasii kubaheele nyutu ko , mpisi heki ngwanwa ya Musamu Wamubwete yisa kikuundi kuri beenu .
Kwaba se baatu ba lukiinsu , ngo me nyasii mono byasobokono mu bo ko ; Nzaambi ka koomonaa buri muutu ko . Kuri me , bakuutu ba kibvumi babo basii nkwiikisa ntoono ti mosi ko .
Ngo kasi , bo bamwiini kuri ti me bampeeri Musamu Wamubwete mu kunata kuri bahele kuteende bubakala , bunu bu baheeri se , Musamu Wamubwete kuri Petelo , mu kunata kuri bateende bubakala .
Bukuri wunde wasariri mu Petelo , kuri ti kaba ntumu kuri bateende bubakala , wasariri se mu me , kuri ti me mba ntumu kuri makaanda .
Yakobo , Kefa na Yowane , bari kubahololo bunu makuunsi , bamanaa kubakula ti me bampeeri bweese , batuha mamboto , beetu na Barnaba mu kusoongo kidiimbu kya nyukusunu , mpisi heki beetu tweende kuri makaanda , na bo beende kuri bateende bubakala .
Ngo kasi , kunu kuloombo batuloombo ti tubambukila bawelu mwooyo . Dyaambu didyo , me se nyaba nyasiila mutima , mu kudiyirika .
Ntaangu ya yisiri Kefa ku nsi ya Antyoke , me nyamutungukila ha kidziri , bukuri nde waba wayelemene kutaambula maseembu .
Tekesele baatu bafumini kuri Yakobo batubuka , nde wadya ha kimosi na bahele kuba Bayudayo . Ngo baatu babo bamanaa kutubuka , nde wakoso nyutu na weki kweba luteke-luteke , mu kubata bakwesyaamisa nteendulu bubakala .
Bayudayo bakaka se basalila bubwo kintwaari na nde . Barnaba se wayendekele mu kitukulu kya bo mu bumpitu-bumpyoongo .
Kasi me monaana ti , bahele kwedyaatila kunsa ngwanwa ya Musamu Wamubwete , me nyaleele kuri Kefa ha busu bwa bobanso ti : « Mbuti ye Muyudayo , wahele kwedyaatila bunu Muyudayo kasi bunu muutu wahele kuba Muyudayo , lo dyaburi ye wutsiitsa kukwiikisa bahele kuba Bayudayo mu kuba na mbeelu Bayudayo ? »
Beetuneenu twabutuka Bayudayo , twahele kufumuna mu kaanda dya bahele kuba Bayudayo , bangaa-masumu .
Tuyaari se ti , muutu wahele kuba walulukusu mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , ngo mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo . Na beetu twasa kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu , mpisi heki tuba twalulukusu mu kanyi mu Kiristo , nkani ka mu biyiriki bya Mangisi ko , bukuri mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , lo kuri muutu ti mosi ko wuba walulukusu .
Na mbuti heki mu kusaka kuba balulukusu mu Kiristo , tumonokini beetu-meene se , ti turi bangaa-masumu , buri lo Kiristo beeri kisari kya masumu ? Pele , kuri ti bele ko .
Mukwongo , mbuti heki , me nyeki bweese kutuunga bibyo bi nyiri nyatsyaamuna , lo me-meene nkitukiri musinini Mangisi .
Mukwongo , mbuti mu mitariri Mangisi , lo me nyafwa mu Mangisi , mpisi heki me mba mwooyo mu Nzaambi . Me bayeki bankomono ha kuruwa kintwaari na Kiristo .
Me nyiri mwooyo , ngo kari me ko , kasi Kiristo wuri mwooyo mu me . Mi nyikwemono me lumalu , mu kidziingu kya me mu muswinyi , me nyikwenata myo mu kanyi di nyiri na dyo mu Mwaana Nzaambi , wantya na wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono me .
Me nyahele kulooso bweese bwa Nzaambi . Mukwongo , mbuti ndulukulu yiri mu ntoono Mangisi , lo Kiristo kwa buunu kari kafwiila .
Sa beenu bari Ngalatya bimpuumbulu ! Na waluloko ? Buri kari ha miisu mya beenu , bari bayirika kubaangula bunu bu bakomini Yesu Kiristo ha yulu kuruwa ko ?
Yaabiseenu me ntoono mosi : Mpeeve yi luri lwataambula , haho mu biyiriki bya mangisi , hoti mu ma luri lwayuka ma kanyi ?
Nkati ngwanwa ti beenu bimpuumbulu luri ? Bu lwabaandikiri mu Mpeeve , ngo mu lumalu lweki manisa mu muswinyi ?
Buri momanso ma luri lwayika mamo mabuunu ? Heki mbuti ngwanwa ti mabuunu !
Wunde wuri mu kuluha Mpeeve , na wuri mu kweyirika bimaangu ha kakati dya beenu , haho mu biyiriki bya mangisi , hoti mu Maampu ma luri lwayuka ma kanyi ?
Ngo bukuri Abalaami kasaana kanyi mu Nzaambi , mu didyo bari bamutaangula mamo bunu nsungumunu ,
lo yaabeenu ti , babo bari na kanyi ngo baala ba Abalaami .
Matinu bu matekisiri kuyaaba , ti Nzaambi wululukisaana bahele kuba Bayudayo mu kanyi , matekisiri se kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wumawu kuri Abalaami ti : « mu ye makaanda momanso sa maba masakumunu . »
Mu kiteesu kikyo , baatu bari mu kanyi , bari basakumunu ha kimosi na Abalaami ngaa-kanyi .
Bobanso bari mwooyo mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , bari kunsa mpopi ; bukuri dyatinu ti : « Mpisi wunde wahele kukwiikama , mu kukukisa momanso matinu mu mukaanda Mangisi , lo kaba kunsa mpopi . »
Diri dya ngwanwa , kuri muutu ko wuba walulukusu ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu Mangisi , bukuri diri dyatinu se ti : « Ngaa-kusuunguma sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi . »
Ngo Mangisi mahele kufumuna mu kanyi ; kasi : « Wunde wumakukisa sa kaba mwooyo mu mo . »
Kiristo watukuula mu mpopi ya Mangisi , bu kabwilikila mpopi mu ntoono beetu , bukuri dyatinu ti : « Mpisi wunde wu bari bamanika ha yulu muti , lo kabwilikila mpopi . »
Mu bubwo , mu Kiristo Yesu , lusakumunu lwa Abalaami luri lwatubuka natee kuri bahele kuba Bayudayo , mpisi heki tutaambuleenu Mpeeve yi bari batusa lusiilulu mu kanyi .
Bampaangi , me nyidzoonso bunu budzoonsolaana baatu : mu misiku mya muutu mu masaala , kuri muutu mukimi wutsiitsa kuyisila bunu mpe kuteeteke ntoono ti mosi ko .
Nsiilulu basii dzo kuri Abalaami na kuri wapalila mu nde . Bahele kuleele ti : « kuri bapalila mu nde » , bunu ti kuri baatu balaka , ngo kuri muutu mosi , « na kuri wapalila mu ye » , ngo Kiristo .
Me bu nyiiri mu kuleele ti : lulelusunu lwa Nzaambi lu katekesele kukaanga , ka lutsiitsa kuba lwayaalu kuri Mangisi ko mayisa , ha mambisa ma nkama na makuumi matatu ma mibvu , mu kubwiisa lusiilulu .
Mukwongo , mbuti saala kubakula mu mangisi , lo ka dibweese kufumuna mu lusiilulu ko ; ngo mu lusiilulu Nzaambi kari kaha bweese kuri Abalaami .
Ngo Mangisi ma nki kwaandi ? Mo mari mu kubweeseme mu kuri ti lumvuki lumonokono , natee kukwiisa kiseendu ki basiiriri lusiilulu . Bambasi bayaabisa Mangisi mamo mu kooko kwa munkabu-kati .
Munkabu-kati mbuti kibari kimosi , lo nde pe ; ngo Nzaambi nde-kaka wuri .
Buri Mangisi mari kitaatu na nsiilulu [ dza Nzaambi ] ? Pele , kuri ti bele ko ! Mukwongo , mbuti kuri ngisi yi baheeri yakuka mu kuha kidziingu , lo ngwanwa nsungumunu yikwiisikilaa mu Mangisi .
Ngo kasi , Matinu masoongo ti , bobanso bakaangama kunsa masumu , mpisi heki mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo , lusiilulu luba lwaha kuri bangaa-kanyi .
Tekesele kanyi dikwiisa , beetu twaba munsa boroko dya mangisi , batuduka ha kimosi , mu ntoono kanyi dyaba dyayelemene kuyabakana .
Mu didyo , Mangisi maba mukebi weetu natee ha yisiri Kiristo , mpisi heki mu kanyi , tuba twalulukusu .
Kanyi bu dyayisa , beetu twasaala kunsa lutumu lwa mukebi ko .
Mukwongo , beenu-banso luri baala ba Nzaambi , mu kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu ,
bukuri , beenu-banso lwabotoko mu Kiristo , na lwalwaata Kiristo .
Kwa saala Muyudayo ko , Muhelene ko , nkutu ko , muutu wuri na bunsaalisi ko , kwahele bakala , kwahele mukyeetu , bukuri beenu-banso luri mosi mu Kiristo Yesu .
Mbuti beenu luri ba Kiristo , lo lwapalila mu Abalaami , bakondiri ba saala bunu buri lusiilulu .
Mu lumalu me nyileele ti : mu ntaangu yonso yiri mukondiri-saala wakiri mwaa-mwaana , lo wahele kusobokono na nkutu mu ntoono ti mosi , lu hayuku nde mfumu mu byobinso .
Ngo kasi , lo wuri kunsa lutumu lwa babuukisi na batwaalisi , natee kukuka kiteesu kya leeriri taayi dyaandi .
Beetu se bwobumosi , bu twaba twakiri mwaa-baala , twaba kunsa bunkutu bwa misamu mya nsi .
Ngo ntaangu bu yakuka , Nzaambi waheeke Mwaana waandi , wabutuka mu wa mukyeetu , na watumuma mu Mangisi ,
mpisi heki , kakuula bari kunsa Mangisi , na tutaambuleenu kiteesu kya kuba baala .
Ngo bukuri beenu luri baala , Nzaambi waheeke Mpeeve ya Mwaana waandi , munsa mitima myeetu , yiri mu kubikisa ti : « Aba , ho Taata ! »
Mu didyo , ye wahele kubweese kuba nkutu ngo wuri mwaana ; na mbuti ye wuri mwaana , lo wuri se mukondiri-saala mu Nzaambi .
Kasi mu ntaangu yayikulu , bu lwaba lwahele kuyaaba Nzaambi , beenu lwaba bankutu , kuri bibyo biri byahele kuba Nzaambi mu ngwanwa .
Ngo mu lumalu , bu lumwaayaaba Nzaambi , dibvuriri bubwete diri lumwaayabakana kuri Nzaambi , dyaburi beenu lubweese kubvutuka kuri bitotolo byahele makwa na byabuunu , mu nzala kubweese kuba bankutu kuri byo ?
Beenu luri mu kwebvumina biluumbu , mangoondo , mantaangu na mamvula .
Ngo me nyiri na boomo mu ntoono beenu , ti mpasi dzi nyiri nyamono mu beenu , dzikwiisa kuba kwaandi dzabuunu .
Bampaangi , me nyikuyingukila , beeneenu bunu me , bukuri me se , nyiri bunu beenu . Beenu lwahele kunyirikila ntoono ti mosi yayibi .
Beenu luyaari ti , me nyaluyaabisiri Musamu Wamubwete , mu lwatete , kuri lo nyabeele mu muswinyi .
Mu ntoono nyutu me , beenu lwakoto mu mpasi , ngo lwasii nyaafuna me na kundobokolo mante ko , kasi beenu , lwantaambula bunu Mbasi Nzaambi , bunu Kiristo Yesu .
Hango lwambwe lwa beenu hari luri ? Mukwongo , me lo nyiluteeriri kimbaangi ti , mbuti bwakuka , nkani haba beenu lwaketi kuhokolo miisu myeenu na kumpa myo .
Buri me mutaatu beenu nkitukiri , bukuri me nyiri mu kululeele ngwanwa ?
Bo bari na kuheme mu beenu , ngo kari mu kusaka bubwe bwa beenu ko . Bo batiiri kulutatula na me , mpisi heki beenu luba na kuheme mu bo .
Diri dyadibwete , mu kuba na kuheme mu mamabwete , mantaangu momanso , nkani ka munu mu mantaangu mari , me nyiri ha busu bwa beenu ko .
Baala baami , me nyiri mu kubweese kumono misoongo mya mbutulu , natee kuyirima Kiristo munsa beenu .
Me mbee ntiiri kwaandi kuba na beenu lumalu , na kuyiinga nzoonsulu yaami , bukuri me nyidunga mu ntoono beenu .
Leelee meti me , beenu lutiiri kuba kunsa Mangisi , buri beenu lwahele kuyuka mamo maleele Mangisi ?
Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : Abalaami wabuta baala boolo , mosi mu mukyeetu wa nkutu , wakaka mu mukasi wahele kuba nkutu .
Ngo wunde wu kabakiri mu nkutu wabutuka mu muswinyi , kasi wunde wu kabakiri mu mukasi wahele kuba nkutu , wabutuka bunu bwaba lusiilulu .
Bakyeetu babo bari bunu nkuma : bari mu kusoongo ndelusunu dzoolo . Lulelusunu lwamosi lwafumuna ku mulaandu wa Sinayi , mu mbutukulu ya bunkutu , ngo Angara .
Angara mulaandu wa Sinayi mu nsi ya Arabya ; nde wafwanikina na Yerusalemi dya lumalu , bukuri nde na baala baandi , bankutu bari .
Yerusalemi dya ku yulu diri na bunsaalisi , dyo diri nguri beetu .
Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : « Keembe kwaaku , ye wa kisita , wuhelaa kubuta ! Fula miloolo mu kiminu , ye wuhelaa kumono misoongo mya mbutulu ; bukuri mukyeetu wafuukila bvuriri baala na mukyeetu wuri na mulumi . »
Ngo bampaangi , beenu se luri baala ba lusiilulu bunu buri Isaki .
Ngo bunu buri mu ntaangu yayikulu , wabutuka mu muswinyi , wakwaamisini wabutuka mu mpeeve , bunubwo se buri mu lumalu .
Ngo Matinu nki mari mu kuleele ? « Binga nkutu na mwaana waandi , mpisi heki mwaana nkutu kahele kukondolo saala , bo na mwaana mukyeetu wahele kuba nkutu . »
Hango-nkuumbu , bampaangi , beetuneenu ka turi baala ba mukyeetu wa nkutu ko , ngo baala ba mukyeetu wahele kuba nkutu .
Kiristo watukuula mpisi tuba na bunsaalisi . Ngo telemee na ngwii , na yaa lubweese kukoto mu kihaangu kya bunkutu ko .
Yukeenu , me Pawulo , bu nyiri mu kuleele ti : mbuti beenu lutaamburi ti baluteende bubakala , lo Kiristo kasiiri mufunu kuri beenu ko .
Me nyibweese kutswiikisa dyo , kuri mpisi muutu wutaambula kuteende bubakala ti , lo yelemini se kukukisa Mangisi momanso .
Beenu lukwesaka kuba balulukusu mu Mangisi , lwayeki lwatabula kintwaari na Kiristo , lwayeki lwadziimbisa bweese .
Mukwongo , mu Mpeeve , beetu turi mu kwekiingila nsungumunu yi turi twasiila nsiitu mu kanyi .
Bukuri , mu Yesu Kiristo , kuteende bubakala bunu pe kuhele kuteende bubakala ka biri mufunu ko , ngo biri mufunu , kanyi disoongaana biyiriki mu ntiilu .
Beenu lwaba kwedzumuna kwakubwe ; ngo na walukabukisi mu kuhele kutumuma kuri ngwanwa ?
Muyooyolo wunde , wahele kunaangukina kuri wunde waluteele mbila .
« Mwaa-ndaambu lufunusu , lutoombolaana mbanda mampa yoyinso » .
Me nyiri na nsiitu mu Mfumu mu ntoono beenu , ti beenu ka luba na bitsimi bikimi ko . Wunde wukotoso kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu , sa kabwilikila maseembu , bwooso kabeele .
Me ngo wuri , bampaangi , mbuti me nyakiri mu kweyikisa nteendulu bubakala , lo mu nkya ntoono bari mu kubweese kwenkwaamisa ? Haho ngo hari lo , musamu kuruwa wahele kubweese kubumisa baatu makya .
Hemese babo bakwekotoso kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu , bahokolo manyutu bo-meene .
Mukwongo , bampaangi , beenu baluteele mbila mu kuba mu bunsaalisi . Ngo kasi , bunsaalisi bubwo yaa buba mpwaani ya kwedyaatila mu kimuutu ko ; ngo kunsa ntiilu yendee lwesalisina beenu na beenu .
Bukuri Mangisi momanso mari makuka mu dyaambu dimosi , ngo dimadi : « Tya mbaasi yaaku bunu ye-meene . »
Ngo mbuti beenu lukwetatikaa na lukwekaakila bambaasi beenu na beenu , lo seenee madyeele , mpisi heki luhele kwefwilisina beenu na beenu .
Ngo kasi me nyiluleele ti : dyaatileenu mu Mpeeve , na luba ti bele na dyo pe , mu kuyukutisa nyiimunu dza muswinyi .
Bukuri muswinyi wukwenyiima mari kitaatu na Mpeeve ; ngo Mpeeve se wukwenyiima mari kitaatu na muswinyi ; mukwongo , bo batelemese kitaatu , wamosi mu wakaka , mpisi heki luhele kubangisina kuyirika ma lutiiri .
Ngo mbuti beenu luri lwatwaalusu kuri Mpeeve , lo lwahele bweese kuba kunsa lutumu lwa Mangisi .
Biyiriki bya muswinyi byayabakana , ngo bi : kimpala , nsumukunu , buyala ,
nsambukulu-biteki , buloki , lubelu , kitaatu , bukwa , kituunsi kya nkesi , kubakana , nkabunu , mpambukusu ,
musoki , nkolulu malu , ndiilu ya mawaamba , na myominso myafwanikina na mimyo . Me nyilulubula mu mimyo , bunu bu nyatekesele kululeele ti , bayirikaana mya bubwo , ka bakondolo saala dya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko .
Kasi kimbutu kya Mpeeve ngo : ntiilu , kiminu , kiyeengi , nkindusulu-mutima , mbweeyulu-mutima , nzala-baatu , kanyi ,
bundeembu , nkebulu-nyutu . Mangisi mahele kitaatu na mya bubwo .
Babo bari ba Kiristo [ Yesu ] , bayeki bakomono muswinyi na mantiilu , na nyiimunu dzaandi .
Mbuti turi mwooyo mu Mpeeve , lo tudyaatilee se mu Mpeeve .
Yaa tubeenee bangaa-masiiku ko , beetu na beetu bisoombolo pe , musoki pe .
Bampaangi , mbuti muutu bamutangusini wuyirika mamabi , lo beenu bakimpeeve suungukeenu wa bubwo , mu mpeeve ya bundeembu , ngo ye-meene se , sa madyeele mpisi hele kubwa mu nsindukulu .
Yendeenu lwenatisina binati beenu na beenu , mu bubwo , beenu lukukisa Mangisi ma Kiristo .
Mukwongo mbuti muutu wutsima ti wuri mufunu , koomosoko wabuunu , lo nde wuwunukinaana .
Hemese mpisi muutu kayirika kutala kisalu kyaandi , tumi yiyo yiba ntoono ya kimweese mu nde-meene , nkani ka mu mukimi ko .
Mukwongo , mpisi muutu kanaanguna kilemu kya nde-meene .
Hemese wunde wu bayikisa Maampu , kaha kikuuku kya byobinso bikari na byo , kuri wunde wumuyikisa .
Yaa luwunukina kweenu ko , bakoosiila Nzaambi munsiku ko ; bukuri , mamo ma kunaa muutu mani mamo se katolo .
Bukuri wunde wukuna mu kimuutu kya nde-meene , sa katolo mu kimuutu mbiiyulu ; na wunde wukuna mu Mpeeve , sa katolo mu Mpeeve , kidziingu kyahele manunu .
Tweyirikeenu mamabwe , yaa tuholo-bito ko , bukuri ntaangu bu yikuka , sa twatolo , mbuti twahele kubwoongolo .
Mu didyo , ha twakiri na ntaangu , tuyirikeenu mamabwe kuri baatu bobanso , ngo bvula-bvula kuri baturi kintwaari mu kanyi .
Monee , buri bunene bwa bisoni bi nyiri mu kutina mu kooko kwaami .
Bobanso bari na nzala-kubila mu muswinyi , batiiri kulukwiikisa kuteende bubakala , mpisi heki bahele kuba bakwaamusu mu ntoono ya kuruwa dya Kiristo .
Mukwongo , bateende bubakala bahele kubvumina Mangisi bo-meene , ngo kasi bo batiiri ti beenu luba lwateende bubakala , mpisi babilika mu manyutu ma beenu .
Me ngo wuri , nyahele kusa nzala-kubila mu kitotolo , mbuti kari mu kuruwa dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo ko , mu dyo , nsi yayeki yakomono mu ntoono ya me , na me bankomono mu ntoono ya nsi .
Mukwongo , kuba wateende bubakala bunu pe kuhele kuba wateende bubakala kuri mufunu ko ; ngo biri mufunu kuba kiyiriki kyamoono .
Na bobanso basalila mu ngisi yiyo , kiyeengi na ngebe biba kuri bo , na kuri Isaheli dya Nzaambi .
Mu misiiri ngo miri , muutu yaa kansiila nduungusu ko , mukwongo , me nyiri na bidziminu bya Yesu mu nyutu yaami .
Bampaangi , bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu ! Amene .
Me Pawulo , ntumu Yesu Kiristo , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , kuri bangisi bari ku Efeso , na kuri bakwiikama mu Kiristo Yesu ,
bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba na beenu .
Kaba wasakumunu , Nzaambi wuri Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , nde watusakumuna mu nsakumunu dzodzinso dza kimpeeve , kunu kinsongi-yulu mu Kiristo .
Mu nde , Nzaambi watusoolo , tekesele nyirikulu nsi , mu kuba bangisi na bahele na mi babaseembele , ha busu bwaandi kunsa ntiilu .
Nzaambi watutaasiri mu kuba baala baandi ba kubuukisa mu Yesu Kiristo , bunu buri bweese bwa ntiilu yaandi ,
mu kuha ndumusu ya nkeembu ya bweese bwaandi , bu kari katuha kwa mungengi mu mwaana waandi wa mutima .
Mu nde , beetu turi na nkuululu mu makila maandi , na mpemusunu ya lumvuki , bunu buri busina bwa bweese bwaandi ,
bu kari kabwookoso mu beetu , kunsa nyaabulu yoyinso na madyeele .
Nde watuyaabisa mpaanu dza kutya kwaandi , bunu buri kiminu kyaandi ki kasoongiri mu Kiristo ,
mu ntoono kitsimi kya nkukulu mantaangu : kukutukisa byobinso mu Kiristo , biri ku mayulu na biri ha butoto mu nde .
Mu nde , beetu twataambula saala mu nteelulu wari , batekesele kutusoolo , bunu buri bitaasi bya wunde wuyirikaana momanso , bunu buri kutya kwaandi ,
mu kuri ti tuha ndumusu ya nkeembu yaandi , bu twatekesele kusa nsiitu mu Kiristo .
Mu nde , beenu luri lwayuka maampu ma ngwanwa , Musamu Wamubwete wa mvuukulu yeenu . Mu nde se , bu lwasiiriri kanyi , balusiiri kidiimbu mu Mpeeve Yangisi ya lusiilulu .
Mpeeve yiyo , yitukebelaa saala dyeetu , natee mu nkuululu yi tubaka mu ntoono ndumusu ya nkeembu yaandi .
Hango-nkuumbu , me se bu nyayukiri badzoonsolo mu ntoono kanyi dyeenu mu Mfumu Yesu , na ntiilu yeenu mu bangisi bonso ,
nyahele kuhoto kubvutula matoondo mu ntoono beenu . Me nkoolubaambukilaa mwooyo mu nsaambulu dzaami ,
mpisi heki Nzaambi ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , Taayi dya nkeembu , kaluha mpeeve ya madyeele na ya nyabusulu , mu kuyaaba nde .
Hemese Nzaambi katsyeemese mwiinunu yeenu mu mitima , mpisi lubakula nkya nsiitu yiri mu mbila yikari kaluteele , nkya busina bwa nkeembu yiri mu saala dyaandi , ha kakati dya bangisi ,
na nkya nzaangumunu , ya bvulula , ya mpinu dzaandi , mu ntoono beetu basiila kanyi , bunu buri mpinu dza makwa ma lutumu lwaandi ,
dzi kari kamonokoso mu Kiristo , bu kamufulukisi ha kakati dya bafwa , na bu kamudzakisa ha lubakala lwaandi kunu kinsongi-yulu .
Kiristo wuri ha yulu kikuutu kyokinso , lutumu lwolunso , mpinu dzodzinso , kimfumu kyokinso , na mpisi nkuumbu yibatsiitsa kutaanguna ; kari munu mu ntaangu yimayi ko , ngo se na mu ntaangu yikwiisa .
Nzaambi wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi bya Kiristo , na wamusuusa mu kuba mutu ha yulu dibuundu dyodinso ,
diri nyutu yaandi , nduululu ya wunde wuluulusaa byobinso mu bobanso .
Beenu lwaba lwafwa mu ntoono lumvuki lweenu , na mu masumu meenu ,
mu mo , beenu lwaba kwedyaatilaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , bunu buri bifu bya nsi yimayi , bunu buri lutumu lwa mfumu mpinu dza kingye-kingye , mpeeve yiyo yiri mu kwesala mu lumalu , ha kakati dya baala ba tungu .
Beetu-banso se twaba kintwaari na bo , na twaba kwedyaatilaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , bunu buri nyiimunu dza muswinyi weetu , mu kweyirika matiiri muswinyi na bitsimi byeetu byabibi . Mu mbeelu yeetu , twaba baala bayelemene kubwiilikila nkesi dza Nzaambi bunu bakaka .
Ngo Nzaambi waluula mu ngebe , mu ntoono ntiilu yaandi yayinene , yikari katutiila ,
bu twaba twafwa mu lumvuki , nde watuha mwooyo mu Kiristo . Mu bweese beenu luri lwabvuukila .
Mu Kiristo Yesu , Nzaambi watufulukisa ha kimosi na nde , na watudzakisa ha kimosi na nde kunu kinsongi-yulu ,
mu kusoongo mu mantaangu makwiisa , busina bwabuukula bwa bweese bwaandi , mu mbweeyulu-mutima waandi kuri beetu mu Kiristo Yesu .
Mukwongo , mu bweese beenu luri lwabvuukila mu ntoono kanyi , kari mu beenu-meene ko , ngo kikabu kya Nzaambi ;
kari mu biyiriki ko , mpisi heki muutu kahele kusiika .
Mukwongo , beetu turi biyiriki bya Nzaambi , nde watuyirika mu Kiristo Yesu , mu kuba na biyiriki byabibwete , bi kari katekesele kuyirika , mpisi tubisalila .
Hango-nkuumbu , baambukeenu mwooyo ti , beenu mu ntaangu yayikulu , lwaba bangooyi mu muswinyi , bahele kuteende bubakala , mu mwiinunu ya babo bateende bubakala , mu nteendulu ya myooko mya baatu .
Baambukeenu mwooyo ti lwaba , mu ntaangu yiyo kwahele Kiristo , bahele kuba na miswa mu kudzakala mu nsi ya Isaheli , banzeense mu ndelusunu dza lusiilulu , bahele na nsiitu na bahele na Nzaambi mu nsi .
Kasi mu lumalu , mu Kiristo Yesu , beenu bari mu ntaangu yayikulu lwaba la , lweki bebele mu makila ma Kiristo .
Mukwongo , nde ngo kiyeengi kyeetu : nde wasa kuri ti baba boolo , beki mosi , na mu nyutu yaandi , nde wabwiisa kibaka kya mpambukusu ngo lubelu .
Nde wayisila lutumu lwa Mangisi na misiku , mpisi heki mu nde-meene , nde kayirika mu bo boolo , muutu ndemosi wamoono , mu kusa kiyeengi ,
na mu kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya bamosi na bakaka , mu nyutu yomosi kintwaari na Nzaambi mu kuruwa , mu dyo , nde kari kamana lubelu .
Bu kayisa , nde wayaabisa Musamu wa kiyeengi kuri beenu lwaba la , na kuri baba bebele .
Bukuri mu nde , beetu turi na miswa , bamosi na bakaka , mu Mpeeve yomosi , mu kuba hari Taata .
Mu didyo , beenu lusii banzeense , na minzakikiri ko , kasi lweki bangaa-nsi kintwaari na bangisi , baatu bari mu kaanda dya Nzaambi .
Beenu lwatuunguma ha yulu lufulu lwa bantumu na babikiri , Kiristo Yesu nde-meene ngo tari dya ha kuumbu .
Mu nde , ntuungulu yoyinso yasuunguma na deredee , yiri mu kunaaka mu kuba Nzo-nzaambi yangisi mu Mfumu .
Mu nde , beenu se luri lwatuunguma mu kintwaari , mu kuba nzo yi dzakalaa Nzaambi mu Mpeeve .
Mu ntoono yiyo , me Pawulo , nyiri boroko dya Yesu Kiristo , mu beenu makaanda .
Kampe beenu lwayukiri , bunu buri kisalu kya bweese bwa Nzaambi kibari baha me , mu ntoono beenu .
Me nyataambula mpaanu mu nyabusulu , bunu bu nyatekisiri kulutinina mu bukufi .
Lumanaa kutaanga , beenu sa lwabakula nkya madyeele me nyiri na mo , mu mitariri mpaanu dza Kiristo ,
dziri mu biseendu byalabuka , basii yaabisa dzo kuri baala ba baatu ko , ngo mu lumalu , Mpeeve mwaayaabisa dzo kuri bantumu baandi bangisi , na kuri babikiri .
Mu nzila ya Musamu Wamubwete , makaanda se meki bakondiri ba saala mu kintwaari , bari mu nyutu mosi , na bataambula ha kimosi na Bayudayo , lusiilulu luri mu Yesu Kiristo .
Mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , me nyayeki kisari , bunu buri kikabu kya bweese bwa Nzaambi bu baheeri kuri me , bunu buri kisalu kya mpinu dzaandi .
Kuri me wu bvuriri buntele mu bangisi bobanso , bari baha bweese bumabu , bwa kuyaabisa kuri makaanda busina bwa Kiristo bwahele mbangukulu ,
na mu kuyirika kubaangula kuri bobanso bunu buri kisalu kya mpaanu ki bari basweeke , kuholosono mu mibvu , mu Nzaambi , wuri nde muyiriki bitotolo byobinso .
Mu lumalu , mu nzila ya dibuundu , batumi na bamfumu ba kinsongi-yulu bamwaayaaba madyeele ma Nzaambi ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ,
bunu buri bitaasi bya mpisi mibvu , bikari kayirika mu Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yeetu .
Mu kanyi mu nde , beetu turi na bunsaalisi bwa kudzoonso na kukokosolo kuri Nzaambi mu nsiitu dzodzinso .
Hango , me nyiloombo ti yaa luholo-bito ko , mu ntoono mpasi dzaami , dzi nyiri mu kwemono me mu beenu ; mpasi dzidzo ngo nkeembu yeenu .
Mu didyo , me nyitsukuma ha busu bwa Taata ,
kuri nde , mpisi kaanda ku mayulu na ha butoto , diri dyataambula nkuumbu .
Nde , mu Mpeeve yaandi , kaluha makwa mu muutu wa kunsa-kati , bunu buri busina bwa nkeembu yaandi mu mpinu .
Nde kadzakisa Kiristo kunsa mitima myeenu mu kanyi , na luba lwamene myaansi na lwatuunguma kunsa ntiilu ,
mpisi heki luba na makwa , ma kubakula mu kintwaari na bangisi , bunu buri bunene , bula , nzangumunu na musundu ,
luyaaba ntiilu ya Kiristo , yalutula nyaabulu . Mu bubwo beenu luba lwaluula natee mu nduululu yoyinso ya Nzaambi .
Kuri wunde wakuka mu kuyirika , kwakinkulu , ha yulu momanso ma tuloombaa bunu pe ma tutsimaa , bunu buri mpinu dzikwesala mu beetu ,
kuri nde kuba nkeembu , mu dibuundu na mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono biseendu byobinso , mu bibvu ngo bibvu , bunubwo . Amene .
Me nyilusyaamisa , me nyiri boroko mu ntoono Mfumu , mu kudyaatila mu kiteesu kyayelemene na mbila yiyo yibari baluteele ,
mu nkulukulu yoyinso , mu bundeembu , mu nkindusulu-mutima , mu kwekuunda bambaasi beenu na beenu mu ntiilu .
Salilee makwa , mu kukebe kintwaari kya Mpeeve , mu musiinga wa kiyeengi .
Nyutu mosi yiri , na Mpeeve se mosi , bunubwo se bari baluteele mu nsiitu mosi , ya mbila yeenu .
Mfumu mosi , kanyi dimosi , mbotokulu yimosi ,
Nzaambi mosi yiri , Taayi dya bobanso , wutuma bobanso , wukwesala mu bobanso , na wuri mu bobanso .
Kuri mpisi muutu mu beetu , bari baha bweese , bunu buri kiteesu kya kikabu kya Kiristo .
Hango-nkuumbu , diri dyaleelu ti : « Bu kamana kunwaata ku yulu , nde wakaanga bunkutu , na waha bikabu kuri baatu . »
Ngo , « nde wanwaata » , lo mambangukulu ti ki ? Ti nde katekisilaana kukulumuka mu mankoonsi ma ku nsuku butoto tumi keki nwaata .
Wunde wakulumuki , wunu nde se wanweeti kunu kinsongi-yulu , mpisi heki nde kaluulusa nsi na yulu .
Na nde-meene wasa kuri ti , babamosi baba bantumu , bakaka babikiri , bakimi madingisi , bakaka se batari , na bakimi se bayikisi .
Mimyo , mu kusa kuri ti , bangisi baba bayirima mu kusa kisalu , kya ntuungulu nyutu ya Kiristo ,
natee bu tutubukiri beetu-banso , mu kintwaari kya kanyi na kya nyaabulu Mwaana Nzaambi , mu muutu wabuuka , mu kiteesu kya kuba na mutele wasuka wa Kiristo .
Haho lo tubweese kuba baala , banyingusu na bakweyende mu mpisi kiteembu kya nyikusulu dza kimpa kya baatu , mu lupyelu lwa bo ko , na mu mawunu na lumvuki lwa bo .
Ngo kasi habaanaa tukwedzoonso ngwanwa mu ntiilu , lo tukwebuuka mu nde mu momanso ; nde Kiristo , wuri mutu .
Mu nde nyutu yoyinso yiri yayirima , na yasokomo kwakubwete , mu biyikulu byobinso byayikwaata , bunu buri kisalu kyayelemene na mpisi muutu , na yikwebuuka mu ntuungulu ya yo-meene kunsa ntiilu .
Mu didyo , me nyileele na nyitswiikisa mu Mfumu ti , yaa lubweese kwedyaatila bunu bangooyi ko bakwedyaatila mu madyeele ma bo-meene mahele mufunu .
Madyeele ma bo mayeki mamabi , bo banzeense mu mwooyo wa kinzaambi , mu ntoono kuhele kwa nyaabulu , na mu ntoono nkubusulu mutima yi bari na yo .
Bo basaala na nsoni mu bo-meene ko , bayeki bayekele manyutu maaku mu buyala , mu kweyirika nsumukunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu mu kiteesu kya makwa .
Ngo beenu kari bubwo ko , luri lwayika mu kuyaaba Kiristo .
Mbuti heki beenu lwayuka mi kari kaleele nde-meene , na mu nde , beenu baluyikisa , bunu buri ngwanwa yiri mu Yesu ,
lo luyelemini kuyisila ndyaatulu yatekesele ya mu muutu wamukulu , wukwesumuka mu nyiimunu dza mawunu .
Kitukeenu baatu bamoono , mu mpeeve ya madyeele meenu ,
na lwaatee muutu wamoono , wayiriku bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , kunsa nsungumunu na bungisi byangwanwa .
Hango-nkuumbu , hotee mpya , dzoonsee ngwanwa mpisi muutu kuri mbaasi yaandi , bukuri turi binamu bamosi na bakaka .
Bu lubakiri nkesi , yaa lubwa mu masumu ko : ntaangu yaa yidyaama , kuri beenu bunu bu luri na nkesi ko ,
yaa luha mpwaani kuri dyabulu ko .
Ngaa-kwiibi ya kabweese kuyiba ko , ngo kamono mpasi mu kusala bunu buyelemini , mu myooko mya nde-meene , mpisi heki kabaka kya kuha kuri wunde wuri na nzala kubaka .
Yaa kupala ntoono ti mosi yayibi mu munwa weenu ko , ngo mbuti kuri yipala , lo yiba yayibwete , yiri mufunu mu ntuungulu , mpisi yiha bweese kuri babo bayuka .
Yaa lunyoongoso Mpeeve Yangisi ya Nzaambi ko , mu yo beenu bari balusa kidiimbu mu kiluumbu kya nkuululu .
Mpisi musamu wankari , wa kabala , wa nkesi , kuyaama , bitari , na mpisi mamabi , biba byayusula ha kakati dya beenu .
Beeneenu na mbweeyulu-mutima mu beenu na beenu , bangaa-bundeembu , kwehemesene beenu na beenu , bunu bwa luhemesene Nzaambi mu Kiristo .
Beeneenu minsombisiri mya Nzaambi bunu baala ba mutima ;
na dyaatileenu kunsa ntiilu , bunubwo se Kiristo kari kalutiila , na kayekele nyutu yaandi kuri Nzaambi mu kikabu na mu kumudzusa , mu ntoono beetu , bunu mananaasi ma mfuku yayibwete .
Buyala , na nsumukunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , bunu pe ntiki-mboongo , yaa biba ha kakati dya beenu ko , bubwo bwayelemene kuri bangisi .
Mantoono mamabi , nzoonsulu dza budzeeke bunu pe dzansoni , byahele kuyelemene ha kakati dya beenu ; ngo kasi byayelemene mvutukulu matoondo .
Mukwongo , yaabeenu dimadi : mpisi kiyala , bunu pe wasumuka , bunu pe ngaa-lukakutu , yiyo nsambukulu-biteki , lo wabubwo wahele na saala mu Kimfumu kya Kiristo bo na Nzaambi .
Yaa kuba muutu wuluwuna mu misamu myahele mufunu ko , bukuri mu mimyo nkesi dza Nzaambi dzikwiisaana ha yulu baala ba nko .
Yaa luba mfuundu mosi na bo ko .
