Mu ntaangu yayikulu beenu lwaba mampimbisi ; mu lumalu beenu lweki buungi mu Mfumu . Yendee lwedyaatila bunu baala ba buungi .
Mukwongo , kimbutu kya buungi kiri mu nyirikulu momanso ma mbweeyulu , ma nsungumunu , na ma ngwanwa .
Yaabeenu kuswaasisa mari mamabwe ha busu bwa Mfumu ,
na yaa lweba kintwaari mu biyiriki byahele mufunu bya mampimbisi ko , ngo kasi bitungukilee .
Mukwongo , diri dyansoni mu kudzoonsolo ma bari mu kweyirika bo mu nsweeki .
Momanso ma bari batungukila mamo , mari mamonokono ha buungi ,
bukuri momanso ma baanaa mamonokono lo meki buungi . Hango-nkuumbu , kaleele ti : « Siimbika , ye wuri tolo , teleme ha kakati dya bafwa , na Kiristo kasemese buungi bwaandi ha yulu ye . »
Ngo seenee madyeele na bunkete mu ndyatulu yeenu , yaa luba bunu biwulu ko , ngo beenee bunu bangaa-madyeele ,
bayaari kubakila ndaandu mu ntaangu yimayi , bukuri biluumbu biri byabibi .
Hango-nkuumbu , yaa luba madzeeke ko , ngo kasi bakuleenu buri kutya kwa Mfumu .
Yaa lwekolo malu ko , mu mo mu kwiisikila nzimbusulu , kasi beenee baluula mu Mpeeve .
Syamisineenu beenu na beenu mu mikuunga mya nkeembu , mu mikuunga mya mbambukulu mwooyo , na mikuunga mya kimpeeve , yimbileenu na siikeenu Mfumu mu mutima weenu ndemunso .
Bvutulee matoondo mpisi ntaangu , mu myominso , kuri Taayi Nzaambi , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Yende lwetumuma bamosi kuri bakaka , mu kibvumi kya Kiristo .
Bakasi batumuma kuri balumi ba bo-meene bunu ti kuri Mfumu ,
bukuri mulumi ngo mutu mukasi , bunu Kiristo se wuri mutu dibuundu , nde Mubvuukisi nyutu ;
ngo kasi bunu bu tumumaana dibuundu kuri Kiristo , bunu bwo se , bakasi bayelemini kutumuma kuri balumi baaku mu myominso .
Balumi , tyeenee bakasi beenu , bunubwo se Kiristo kari watya dibuundu , na wayekele nyutu yaandi mu ntoono dyo .
Nde wadisa dyangisi mu kuditsyeemese mu nswaakulu ya maampa , kunsa Maampu ;
mpisi kamonokoso kuri nde-meene , dibuundu dyakeembusu , dyahele na mpita bunu pe mihonyi , bunu pe kitotolo kyafwanikina na bibyo , ngo kasi diba dyangisi na dyahele maseembu .
Balumi se bunubwo , bayelemini kutya bakasi ba bo-meene , bunu bu batiiriri manyutu ma bo-meene . Wunde wutiiri mukasi wa nde-meene , lo nyutu ya nde-meene katiiri .
Mukwongo , kuri muutu wutsiitsa kubele nyutu ya nde-meene ko , kasi nde wudiisila na wusaana bunkete mu yo ; bunubwo se Kiristo kakoosiilaa mu dibuundu .
Bukuri beetuneenu turi binamu bya nyutu yaandi .
Mu didyo , wabakala sa kasiisa taayi na nguri yaandi , na sa kakaangama na mukasi waandi , na boboolo sa baba muutu mosi .
Mpaanu dzimadzi dziri dzadzinene ; na me bu nyiri mu kuleele ti , mimyo mitariri Kiristo na dibuundu .
Ngo kasi mitariri se mosi-mosi mu beenu , mpisi muutu mu beenu katya mukasi wa nde-meene , bu katiiriri nyutu ya nde-meene ; na mukasi kabvumina mulumi .
Baala , tumumeenu mu Mfumu kuri bataayi na banguri beenu , bukuri mamo masuunguma .
« Bvumina taayi dyaaku na nguri yaaku » , lulwo ngo lutumu lwatete luri na lusiilulu :
« mpisi heki ye ba mu lwambwe , na ba na kidziingu kyakila ha butoto . »
Bataayi , yaa lwebakisa baala beenu nkesi ko , ngo babuukiseenu kunsa nyikusulu na mandoongi ma Mfumu .
Bankutu , tumumeenu kuri bamfumu beenu ba muswinyi , mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu , kunsa nkulukulu mutima , bunu ti kuri Kiristo .
Kari hana ha miisu mya bo ko , bunu ti mu nzala kubweeye kuri baatu , ngo bunu bankutu ba Kiristo bari mu kuyirika kutya kwa Nzaambi , mu mutima wamutsiina .
Basalileenu mu mutima-bubwete , kuri bunu beenu lusalila Mfumu nkani ka baatu ko ,
bu luyaari ti mpisi muutu , mbuti yirikiri mamabwe , lo sa kamataambula kuri Mfumu , ti kaba nkutu bunu pe kahele kuba nkutu .
Beenu se bamfumu , yirikeenu bwobumosi kuri bankutu beenu , mu kuhele kwesalila kibakala , bu luyaari ti , na bo na beenu luri na Mfumu yiri mu mayulu , na kuri nde kimpengeki kyo pe .
Mu misiiri ngo miri , yendee lwebakila makwa mu Mfumu , mu makwa ma mpinu dzaandi .
Lwateenu binwaanunu bya Nzaambi , mu kubangisina kuteleme na ngwii ha busu bwa biyiriki bya dyabulu .
Bukuri kikiindu ki turi na kyo , kari kya kunwaanisa muswinyi na makila ko , ngo kasi kya kunwaanisa bakuutu , batumi , na bamfumu ba nsi ya mampimbisi yimayi , kya kunwaanisa mampeeve mamabi mari ku kinsongi-yulu .
Hango-nkuumbu , holeenu binwaanunu bya Nzaambi , mpisi heki lubangusina kusa bunkuri mu kiluumbu kyakibi , na kuba bateleme na ngwii , bu lumeeni kuyirika momanso .
Telemeenu na ngwii , lwateenu ngwanwa ngo musweele mu luketu lweenu , na lwaateenu nsungumunu ngo kinkuta kya mu ntulu kya mukaanda kibulu .
Lwaateenu se masapaatu mu miilu , ngo malwangukila ma kunata Musamu Wamubwete wa kiyeengi .
Mu mpisi diba , kwaateenu kikakusulu kya kanyi , mu kyo beenu lubangusina kudzimisa misomono mya mbaawu mya Ngaa-bubi .
Na taambuleenu mpu ya kiseengu ya mvuukulu , na mbeesi yayila ya Mpeeve ngo Maampu ma Nzaambi .
Mu nsaambulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu na ndoombulu , saambileenu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu mu Mpeeve . Mu didyo , beenee naana , beenee na kifiki , loombee mu bangisi bobanso ,
na mu me se , mpisi heki me bampa dyaambu dya kuleele , mu ntaangu yintiiri kudzibula munwa waami , mu kuyaabisa mu bunsaalisi mpaanu dza Musamu Wamubwete .
Mu Musamu wunde , me nyiri mumonikisi wuri mu bikonyi , mpisi heki me nzoonsolo , mu bunsaalisi bunu bu nyelemini kuyikisa .
Me ntiiri ti beenu se luyaaba misamu mitariri me , mi nyiri mu kusalila . Tikiko , mpaangi ya mutima , na kisari kyakwiikama mu Mfumu , sa kaluyaabisa myominso mimyo .
Me nyamuheekiri kuri beenu mu ntoono yiyo , mpisi heki beenu luyaaba misamu mitariri beetu , na kasyaamisa mitima myeenu .
Kiyeengi , ntiilu na kanyi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba kuri bampaangi .
Bweese buba kuri bobanso , batyaanaa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu ntiilu yiri yabiiyaa ko .
Pawulo na Timoteho , bankutu ba Yesu Kiristo , kuri bangisi mu Kiristo Yesu bari ku Filipo , bari kintwaari na bakuutu ba dibuundu na bisari :
bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba na beenu .
Me nyibvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi yaami , mu mpisi ntaangu yi nyibambukilaa beenu mwooyo .
Mantaangu momanso ma nyisaambilaa me mu beenu-banso , nyisambikilaa mu kiminu ,
mu ntoono kintwaari , ki luri mu kusoongaa beenu kuri me mu Musamu Wamubwete , kuholosono kiluumbu kyatete natee mu lumalu .
Me nyiri na nsiitu mu dimadi : wunde wabaandika kisalu kyakibwe mu beenu , sa kamana kyo natee mu kiluumbu kya Yesu Kiristo .
Buri bwa yelemene ti , me nyetsima ma bubwo mu beenu-banso , bukuri me nyalusuusa mu mutima waami . Ti hayuku me nyiri mu boroko , nyiri mu kukalala nyutu , na nyiri mu kusyaamisa Musamu Wamubwete , lo beenu-banso luri kintwaari mu bweese bwa me .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , me nyilutiiri beenu-banso kwalaka mu lusaambu lwa Kiristo Yesu .
Di nyiri mu kwesaambikila me diri ti : ntiilu yeenu yihamisa kubvuriri mu nyaabulu yangwanwa , na mu mbakululu yoyinso ,
mu kuyaaba kusobokoso miri mufunu . Mu bubwo beenu luba batsyeemeke , na kuhele kuba na mi baluseembele mu kiluumbu kya Kiristo ,
na luba lwaluula mu biyiriki bya nsungumunu bifumunaana mu Yesu Kiristo , mu nkeembu na ndumusu bya Nzaambi .
Bampaangi , me ntiiri ti beenu luyaaba ti : mimyo mitariri me , myadziburi nzila kuri ti Musamu Wamubwete keende ku mankula .
Mu didyo , boroko dya me mu Kiristo , diri dyayabakana kuri bobanso mu nzo yoyinso ya miyalu , na mu bibeendu byakaka byobinso ,
na balaka mu bampaangi , ba mwaasiila nsiitu mu Mfumu , mu ntoono boroko dya me , na babweese kubaka kibakala mu kuyikisa maampu kwahele boomo .
Bamosi bari mu kweyaabisila Kiristo mu bukwa na mu nkalikisi , ngo bakaka mu mutima-bubwete .
Babamosi mu ntiilu , bu bayaari kuri ti , mu ntoono ya kukalila Musamu Wamubwete me nyiri mu boroko ,
ngo bakaka kweyaabisila Kiristo mu nkalikisi , kwahele kuba na mu mutima watsyeemeke ; bo batiiri kuhamisa mpasi dza me mu boroko .
Mukwongo nki ? Kiteesu bwooso kibeele , ti kiba mu kumana mafuumbu , ti kiba mu ngwanwa , lo ngo bukuri Kiristo bari mu kwemuyabikisa , na mu didyo me nyiri na kiminu . Kasi me sa mbweese kuba na kiminu ,
bukuri me nyaari ti mimyo sa myatwaala mvuukulu kuri me , mu ntoono lusaambulu lwa beenu na lubakusu lwa Mpeeve ya Yesu Kiristo .
Bunu buri ma nyiri mu kwekiinga , na ma nyiri nyasiila nsiitu , me ka nyiba na nsoni mu ntoono ti mosi ko . Ngo kasi mu nsiitu dzodzinso , bunu mu mpisi ntaangu na mu lumalu , Kiristo sa kaba wakeembese mu nyutu yaami , mu kidziingu kyaami bunu pe mu lufwa lwaami .
Bukuri ku nyiri me , kuba mwooyo ngo Kiristo , na kufwa ngo ndaandu .
Ngo mbuti kuba mwooyo mu muswinyi , diri ndaandu mu kisalu ku nyiri me , lo nki me nyisoolo ? Nyahele kuyaaba .
Me nyiri mu kudunga ha kakati dya manzala mo moolo : me nyiri na nzala kweende , na kuba na Kiristo , bukuri bubwo bubvuriri bubwete ;
ngo kuba mwooyo mu muswinyi , bubvuriri mufunu mu ntoono beenu .
Didyo ngo diri me mwaabakula , me nyaari ti sa nyaba mwooyo na sa nzakala na beenu-banso , mu ntoono yiri ti beenu lubuuka , na lumono kiminu mu kanyi dyeenu ,
mpisi heki , kimweese kya beenu mu me , kihamisa mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono yiri ti me nyibweese kuba ha kakati dya beenu .
Beenu ngo bari dyaatileenu mu kiteesu kyayelemene na Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , mpisi heki , ti hayuku me nyiisiri kulumono , bunu pe nyahele kuba na beenu , me nyuka ti beenu luri na keketee mu mpeeve yomosi , na luri mu kwenwaana mu kitsimi kyokimosi , mu ntoono kanyi mu Musamu Wamubwete ,
kwahele kubata bataatu mu ntoono ti mosi . Kuri bo kikyo ngo kidiimbu kya nzimbukulu , ngo kuri beenu kya mvuukulu , na mimyo mifuminaa kuri Nzaambi .
Bukuri beenu baluha bweese mu ntoono Kiristo , kari munu mu kusiila kanyi mu nde ko , ngo na mu kumono mpasi se mu ntoono nde ,
mu kwenwaana kikiindu kyokimosi ki luri lwamono mu me , na ki luri mu kweyuka natee lumalu ti me nyiri mu kwenwaana .
Ngo mbuti kuri nsyamusunu mu Kiristo , mbuti kuri mboondulu mu ntiilu , mbuti kuri kintwaari mu Mpeeve , mbuti kuri lusaambu na ngebe ,
lo kukiseenu kiminu kya me , mu kuba ndyaatulu mosi , ntiilu mosi , mutima mosi , kitsimi kimosi , na kuba na kintwaari .
Yaa lwesalila kunsa nwaanusunu ko , bunu pe mu nzala-kubila yabuunu ko , ngo kasi mu nkulukulu , holulee bambaasi bunu ti bo babvuriri na beenu .
Mpisi muutu mu beenu yaa kasaka ndaandu yini ya nde-meene ko , ngo kasaka se ndaandu ya bambaasi .
Dyaatileenu bubwo ha kakati dya beenu , bunu bwayelemene mu Kiristo Yesu .
Nde wuri bu kaba mu kinzeri kya Nzaambi , kasii saka kuba nsiisa na Nzaambi ko .
Ngo nde-meene wasokomono nyutu yaandi , waholo kinzeri kya nkutu , mu kufwanikina na baatu , na mu nzelu yaandi wamonoko bunu muutu .
Nde wakuluka nde-meene , mu kuba watumuma natee mu lufwa , lufwa lwa ha yulu kuruwa .
Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kamudzaangisa , na kamuha nkuumbu yibvuriri na mankuumbu momanso ,
mpisi heki mu nkuumbu ya Yesu , maboongo momanso matsukuma , ku yulu , ha butoto , na ku nsuku butoto ,
na ndima dzodzinso dzileele ti Yesu Kiristo ngo Mfumu , mu nkeembu ya Taayi Nzaambi .
Mu didyo , banduku baami ba mutima , bunu bu lukootumumaa mu mpisi ntaangu , kari hani ha busu bwa me ko , ngo mu lumalu , bvulee kutumuma , me bu nyiri nde pe . Salilee mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu , mu kubaka mvuukulu ya beenu-meene ,
bukuri Nzaambi koosalaa mu beenu , na kusa kuri ti , lutya na lusala bunu buri kutya kwaandi kwakubwete .
Yirikee momanso kwahele kwemunguta na kwahele nkalikisi ,
mpisi luhele kuba na mi baluseembele , luhele kuba na kinsaangi-nsobo , luba baala ba Nzaambi bahele na mi babaseembele , ha kakati dya kiseendu kya baatu bawumuka na bababi . Ha kakati dya baatu babo , beenu luri mu kweseme bunu byuufu bya mbaawu mu nsi ,
bu luri lwakaangama mu maampu ma mwooyo . Mu mimyo me nyiba na kimweese mu kiluumbu kya Kiristo , bukuri me nyasii kudzumuna kwa buunu ko , na nyasii mono mpasi kwa buunu ko .
Ngo ti hayuku makila ma me bamayitiri ha yulu kikabu kya kuha kuri Nzaambi , mu kisalu kya kanyi dya beenu , lo me nyimono kiminu , nyimono kiminu ha kimosi na beenu-banso .
Bwobumosi beenu se monee kiminu , monee kiminu ha kimosi na me .
Me nyiri nsiitu mu Mfumu Yesu , ti sa nyaluheeke Timoteho mu mawasu , mpisi heki me se mba nyasyaamusu , mu mampolo ma nyitaambula mu ntoono beenu .
Mukwongo , me nyahele na muutu mukimi ha yulu nde , wuri bitsimi byobimosi na me , wutsiminaa misamu mitariri beenu mu ngwanwa .
Bobanso kwenama misamu mini mya bo-meene , nkani ka mya Yesu Kiristo ko .
Ngo beenu luyaari ma kari kayirika nde : bunu bu buyirikaa mwaana kuri taayi , nde wasala kintwaari na me mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete .
Nde me nyitsima kuheeke kuri beenu , me manaa kumono na pwelelee bunu bulutila misamu mitariri me .
Me nyiri na nsiitu mu Mfumu ti , me-meene sa nyiisa mu mawasu .
Ngo me nyamwii ti diri mufunu , mu kubvutula Epaforodito kuri beenu , mpaangi na mbaasi yaami ya kisalu na ya binwaanunu , ntumu yi lwampeekiri mu kumbakisa ,
bukuri nde wuri na nzala beenu yalaka , na wuri mu kubamaa , bukuri beenu lwayukiri ti nde wabee wabeele .
Mukwongo , nde wabee wabeele , na ha ntele hasiiri nkani wafwiiri , ngo kasi Nzaambi wamubakiri ngebe , kari wunu nde ko , ngo na me se , mpisi heki me mpele kuba na kyaari ha yulu kyaari .
Ngo me nyeki hebele mu kumuheeke kuri beenu , mpisi heki bu lumumwiini , beenu lubweese kumono kiminu , na me mba na kyaari kyantele .
Ngo mutaambulee mu kiminu kyokinso mu Mfumu , na beenee na lukiinsu mu baatu ba bubwo ,
bukuri mu kisalu kya Kiristo , nde kakokosirye bebele na lufwa , na kakotisirye kidziingu kyaandi mu mpasi , mpisi kasalila me , ha kibeendu kya beenu .
Mu misiiri ngo miri , bampaangi baami , monee kiminu mu Mfumu . Me nyahele kuholo-bito mu kulutinina misamu myomimosi mimyo , miha nsiitu kuri beenu .
Seenee madyeele mu bambwa , seenee madyeele mu bisari byabibi , seenee madyeele mu nteendulu bubakala yampya .
Mukwongo , bateende bubakala ngo beetuneenu , tusaambilaa mu Mpeeve ya Nzaambi , tumonaa kimweese mu Kiristo Yesu , na tuhelaa kusiila nsiitu mu muswinyi ,
ti bukuri me-meene nyasiila nsiitu se mu muswiini . Mbuti muutu mukimi wutsima ti wasa nsiitu mu muswinyi , lo me mvuriri na nde .
Me banteendiri bubakala kiluumbu kya mpoomo , nyiri mu kitsuumbu kya Isaheli , mu kaanda dya Benyamini , Muhebeleho wabutuka mu Bahebeleho . Mu mitariri mangisi , me Mufarisi ,
mu kifiki , me mukwaamisi dibuundu , mu mitariri nsungumunu mu mangisi , me nyiri na mi banseembele ko .
Kasi bibyo byaba ndaandu kuri me , me nyamono kuri ti byafuukila , mu ntoono Kiristo .
Ngo kasi nyimono se ti byobinso byafuukila , ha busu bwa nyaabulu yibvuriri bunene mu Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yaami . Mu ntoono nde , byobinso bi nyaba na byo nyamana kubibwoongolo , na me nyibimono bunu bitiiti byaloosu , mpisi heki me mbaka Kiristo ,
na bamwiinina me mu nde , kuri nyahele na nsungumunu ya me-meene , yiri kubakila kari mu mangisi ko , ngo yiri kubakila mu kanyi mu Kiristo , yifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , yatuunguma ha yulu kanyi .
Me ntii kuyaaba nde , na kuyaaba mpinu dza mfulukulu yaandi , na kuba kintwaari mu mpasi dzaandi , mu kunama kifwaani kya nde mu lufwa lwaandi ,
mbuti bwakuka ti me se ntubuka mu mfulukulu ya bafwa .
Pele , me nyahele kuleele ti mwaabakila bunu pe mwaatubuka ha ndilu , ngo nyiri mu kudzumuna mu nsiitu ya kwekwaata , bukuri me se Kiristo Yesu wayeki wankwaata .
Bampaangi , me-meene ngo wuri nyitsima ti nyakiri kukwaata pe ; ngo musamu mosi me mbinikini : kudzimikina myominso miri ku mambisa , mu kunama miri ku mankula ,
nyiri mu kudzumuna mu kutubuka ha ndilu , mu kubaka kimbwanga kya mbila ya ku yulu , ya Nzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu .
Ngo beetu-banso bu turi baatu bayirima , tubeenee na mbeelu ya bubwo ; na mbuti luri mu kiteesu kya mbeelu yikimi , lo Nzaambi sa kaluyaabisa dyo .
Ngo mu ha tumwaatubukee hamaha , tudyaatilee ha kimosi .
Bampaangi , beenee bakwesombosolo me , talee bakwedyaatila mu kifwaani ki luri mu kumono mu beetu .
Mukwongo , bunu bu nyaba kweluleelaana mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu , na mu lumalu se nyiluleele kunsa kidilu ti , balaka bakwedyaatila mu butaatu bwa kuruwa dya Kiristo .
Nsukulu bo ngo mfuukulu , Nzaambi bo ngo mwooyo waaku , na nkeembu bo kumwiina kunsa mya nsoni myaaku , bo bakwenama mya nsi .
Mukwongo , bula bweetu ngo mayulu , kukwo kuri Mubvuukisi wu turi mu kwekiinga , Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
Nde mbasi-tsuku wukitula nyutu yeetu ya manyoongi , kuri yiba bunu buri nyutu ya nde ya nkeembu , bunu buri mpinu dzi kari na dzo , mu kusuusa byobinso kunsa lutumu lwaandi .
Mu didyo , bampaangi baami ba mutima , ba ntiiri kwalaka , beenu luri kiminu kyaami na lukoongolo lwaami ; ngo banduku ba mutima , beenee na keketee mu Mfumu .
Me nyisyaamisa Evodya na Sintike mu kuba na nyukusunu mu Mfumu .
Heehe , me nyiloombo kuri ye se , mbaasi yaami ya kisalu ya ngwanwa ti , bakisa bakyeetu babo , bo banweeni kintwaari na me , mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , kintwaari se na Kelema na bambaasi ba me bakaka ba kisalu , bari mankuumbu mari mu mukaanda wa mwooyo .
Monee kiminu mu Mfumu mu mpisi ntaangu ; me nyibweese kuleele , monee kiminu .
Hemesee bundeembu bweenu buba bwayabakana kuri baatu bobanso . Mfumu weki bebele .
Yaa luba na boomo mu ntoono ti mosi ko ; ngo mu myominso , hemesee ndoombulu dzeenu dziba dzayabakana kuri Nzaambi , mu nsaambulu , mu nyingukulu na mu mvutukulu matoondo .
Tumi kiyeengi kya Nzaambi kibvuriri na madyeele momanso , sa kyakebe mitima myeenu , na bitsimi byeenu mu Kiristo Yesu .
Mu misiiri ngo miri bampaangi , myominso miri myangwanwa , myominso myalukiinsu , myominso myasuunguma , myominso myatsyeemeke , myominso mi batiiri , myominso myamibwe mu kuleele , na mbuti kuri manzelu mamabwete , na myayelemene kusiika , lo tsiminee myominso mimyo .
Mamo ma luri lwayika , ma luri lwataambula , ma luri lwayuka , na ma luri lwamono kuri me , salilee mo ; tumi Nzaambi ya kiyeengi kaba na beenu .
Me nyamwiini kiminu kyalaka mu Mfumu , bu lwabweesiri kutsimina me lolo di . Lwaba kwaandi na kitsimi , ngo mpwaani yaba yo pe .
Kari mu nzala kubaka ko me nyileele bubwo , ngo bukuri me nyayika kuba mu kiminu , kunsa biteesu byobinso bi nyiri .
Me nyaari kuba kunsa buwelu , na nyaari kuba se kunsa byabuukula ; mu byobinso na mu myominso , me bansaatsa mu kuba wayukuta na mu kukolo nzala , kuba kunsa byabuukula na kuba na nzala kubaka .
Me lo nyakuka mu myominso , mu wunde wumpaana makwa .
Ngo beenu lwayirikiri mamabwe , mu kukabula mpasi dza me .
Beenu bari Filipo luyaari se ti , mu mbandukulu Musamu Wamubwete , me manaa kupala mu nsi ya Makedonya , kwasii ba dibuundu ti dimosi ko , dyatolo mboongo na dyapalisa mboongo mu me , mbuti ka beenu kitsu ko .
Bukuri bu nyaba nyakiri ku Tesalonika , beenu lwampeeke lubakusu , mbala mosi bunu pe dzoolo .
Kari kuri ti me nyisaka bi bankabula ko , ngo me nyisaka kuri ti ndaandu yiba yabuukula kuri beenu .
Me nyataambula byobinso , na nyiri na byabuukula , me nyaluula bu nyataamburi bi lwampeekiri kuri Epaforodito , biri bunu mananaasi ma mfuku yayibwete , kikabu kya kudzusa kyataambulu na kyabweeye kuri Nzaambi .
Nzaambi yaami sa kayukitisa manzala meenu momanso , bunu buri busina bwaandi kunsa nkeembu mu Kiristo Yesu .
Nkeembu kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu mu bibvu ngo bibvu . Amene .
Henee mboto kuri mpisi wangisi mu Kiristo Yesu . Bampaangi bari na me baluheekiri mamboto .
Bangisi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto , bvulu-bvulu ba mu nzo Kayisari .
Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu .
Me Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , na Timoteho mpaangi ,
kuri bampaangi bangisi na bakwiikama mu Kiristo , bari ku Kolosayi , bweese na kiyeengi kuri beenu bifumunaa kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi biba na beenu .
Beetu tubvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , bu tusaambilaa mu beenu mantaangu momanso .
Beetu twayukiri badzoonsolo mu kanyi di luri na dyo mu Kiristo Yesu , na mu ntiilu yi luri na yo mu bangisi bobanso ,
mu ntoono nsiitu yibari balusweekele mu mayulu , yi luri lwatekesele kuyuka , mu maampu mangwanwa ma Musamu Wamubwete .
Musamu meene watubuka natee kuri beenu , bwobumosi se kari mu nsi yansiina , wuri mu kwebuta bimbutu na wuri mu kwebuuka ; bunubwo se kari mu kwesala mu beenu , kuholosono kiluumbu ki luri lwayuka , na ki luri lwabakula bweese bwa Nzaambi kunsa ngwanwa .
Epafara , nduku yeetu ya kisalu ya Mutima , bunubwo se kari kaluyikisa , nde wuri kuri beenu kisari kyakwiikama kya Kiristo .
Nde wamonikisi kuri beetu , ntiilu yaluha Mpeeve .
Mu didyo se beetu , kuholosono kiluumbu kitwayukiri mamo , twahele kuhoto kusaambila mu beenu , na kuloombo kuri ti , luba lwaluula mu nyaabulu ya kutya kwaandi , mu madyeele momanso na mbakukulu ya kimpeeve ,
kuri ti beenu lwedyaatila mu nzelu yayelemene mu Mfumu , mu kubweeye kuri mu myominso , mu kubuta bimbutu mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete , na kubuuka mu nyaabulu ya Nzaambi .
Mu bubwo beenu luba na mpinu mu myominso bunu buri makwa ma nkeembu yaandi , mu kuba na kifiki na kukiindisa mutima mu myominso . Mu kiminu ,
bvutuleenu matoondo kuri Taata , wasa kuri ti luba bakuka mu kutaambula kikuuku kya saala dya bangisi kunsa buungi .
Nde watupalisa mu lutumu lwa mampimbisi , na watunata mu Kimfumu kya Mwaana wa ntiilu yaandi .
Mu nde , beetu turi na nkuululu na mpemisi ya masumu .
Kiristo ngo kidzisi kya Nzaambi wuri bamumonaa ko . Nde ngo watete wabutuka mu biyiriki byobinso ,
bukuri mu nde , bitotolo byobinso bari babiyirikila , mu mayulu na ha butoto , bi bamonaa na biri bamonaa ko , ti mamboloko , ti bumbyaasi , ti bimfumu , ti lutumu . Bitotolo byobinso mu nde , na mu ntoono nde , bari babiyirikila .
Tekesele byobinso biba , lo nde wuri , na bitotolo byobinso biri na kidziingu mu nde .
Nde ngo mutu nyutu , nyutu ngo dibuundu . Nde wuri mbandukulu , watete wafuluka mu bafwa , mpisi heki mu byobinso nde kaba watete .
Bukuri Nzaambi watiiri kudzakisa nduululu yoyinso ya kinzaambi kyaandi mu nde ,
na mu kasa nyukusunu ya bitotolo byobinso mu nde , na mu ntoono nde . Nde wasa kiyeengi ha kakati dya bitotolo biri ha butoto na biri ku mayulu , mu makila ma mwaana waandi ha lukuruwa .
Beenu se mu ntaangu yaluta , lwaba banzeense na bataatu mu bitsimi , mu ntoono biyiriki byabibi .
Kasi mu lumalu , Nzaambi wasa nyukusunu mu lufwa lwa mwaana waandi mu nyutu ya muswinyi , mpisi kalumonokoso bangisi , bahele mi babaseembele , na bahele na mi babafuundila , ha busu bwaandi .
Ngo luyelemini kunamitina kuba batuunguma , na kuba na keketee mu kanyi , kwahele kusasika mu nsiitu ya Musamu Wamubwete wu luri lwayuka , wu bari bayaabisa kuri biyiriki byobinso ha butoto , na wu nyayeki me Pawulo kisari .
Mu lumalu , me nyimono kiminu , kunsa mpasi mu ntoono beenu , na me nyiri mu kukukisa mpasi dza mbamunu Kiristo , mu muswinyi waami , mu ntoono nyutu yaandi , ngo dibuundu .
Mu dyo , me nyayeki kisari , bunu buri bitsimi bya Nzaambi , bikari kaha kuri me , mu ntoono beenu , mu kukukisa maampu ma Nzaambi ,
mpaanu dza Nzaambi dzaba dzasweeku , kuholosono mu mibvu na mu biseendu , dzeki dzayabakana mu lumalu kuri bangisi baandi .
Kuri bo , Nzaambi katiiri kuyaabisa , ha kakati dya makaanda , bunu buri busina bwa nkeembu ya mpaanu yimayi . Mpaanu yiyo ngo Kiristo mu beenu , nsiitu ya nkeembu .
Nde beetu turi mu kweyaabisa , mu kulubula mpisi muutu , na kuyikisa mpisi muutu , mu madyeele momanso , mpisi muutu kaba nyirimunu yakuka mu Kiristo .
Mu bubwo se , me nyiri mu kubama , mu kwenwaana bunu buri makwa maandi , mari mu kwesala mu me , mu mpinu .
Mukwongo , me ntiiri ti beenu luyaaba , nkya mudziingu me nyiri mu kwenwaana , mu ntoono beenu , mu ntoono bari ku Lahodikya , na mu ntoono babo bakiri kidziri kya me kumono pe mu muswinyi .
Me ntiiri ti mitima mya bo miba myasyaamusu , baba babvuutuna mu kintwaari kunsa ntiilu , na mu kubaka busina bwobunso bwa nduululu ya madyeele , mu nyaabulu mpaanu dza Nzaambi , ngo Kiristo ,
mu nde mwaswekeme busina bwobunso bwa madyeele , na bwa nyaabulu .
Me nyiri mu kuleele mamo , mpisi heki muutu kahele kaluwumuna mu nzoonsulu dza lupyelu .
Mukwongo , mbuti heki mu nyutu ya muswinyi me nyahele kuba na beenu , ngo mu kimpeeve nyiri kintwaari na beenu , lo me nyimono kiminu , mu kumono ti beenu luri na bunkete , na luri babukekete mu kanyi dyeenu mu Kiristo .
Ngo bu lwayeki lwataambula Kiristo Yesu Mfumu , dyaatilee mu nde ,
bu lwayeki lwamene myaansi , lwatuungu mu nde , na lwasyaamusu mu kanyi , bunu bu bari baluyikisa , bvutuleenu matoondo ha yulu matoondo .
Seenee madyeele , muutu mu beenu kahele kubwa mu mweete wa madyeele ma nzoonsulu , na mu mawunu mabuunu , bunu buri kikulu kya baatu , na bunu buri bitotolo bya nsi , byahele kuba mu Kiristo .
Bukuri mu nyutu ya nde , mwadzakala nduululu yoyinso ya kinzaambi ,
na mu nde beenu lwayeki lwaluula mu byobinso , nde wuri Mfumu ha yulu bobanso bari na kimfumu na bari na lutumu .
Mu nde se , beenu bari baluteende bubakala , mu nteendulu yahele kuba ya myooko mya baatu , ya nyubukulu nyutu ya muswinyi , ngo mu nteendulu ya Kiristo .
Beenu baludziikiri mu mampeembe kintwaari na nde , mu mbotokulu ; mu nde se , beenu bari balufukisa mu kanyi , mu mpinu dza Nzaambi wamufulukisi mu bafwa .
Beenu lwaba lwafwa mu ntoono lumvuki lweenu , na bukuri lwaba lwahele bateende bubakala mu muswinyi weenu , ngo Nzaambi walusa bamwooyo kintwaari na Kiristo , mu kuluhemesene lumvuki lweenu lwolunso .
Nde wayaala mukaanda wamubi wa mfuundulu bunu buri mangisi , wayisila nde mu kumukomono ha kuruwa .
Bu kasyoonono kimfumu kya bakuutu na batumi , wabayanika mu kuba basaana ha busu bwa baatu , wabakoko bunu maboroko kunsa ndulukulu yaandi .
Ngo yaa kuba na muutu wulutsuundisa mu ntoono byandya na nwiinunu ko , bunu pe mu ntoono munkeembu , bunu pe mu ntoono ngoondo yamoono , bunu pe mu ntoono kiluumbu kya mpuumunu .
Byobinso bibyo kini kifwaani kya bitotolo bikwiisa ku mankula ; ngo byangwanwa biri mu Kiristo .
Yaa lutala ko ti babo bakwemono kiminu mu kiteesu kya nkulukulu , na mu kwesaambila bambasi , baluwuungula . Bo bakwekengese bitotolo kwa buunu , na bakwesiika mu bitsimi bya kimuutu kyaaku .
Bo bahele kukaangama na mutu , bwakaangama nyutu yoyinso , mu biyikulu na misiinga mya nyutu , kuri nyutu yikwebuuka mu mbuukulu yifumunaa kuri Nzaambi .
Mbuti beenu lufwa na Kiristo mu mya nsi , dyaburi beenu luri mu kwetumuma mu mya nsi bunu ti beenu luri mwooyo mu mya nsi ?
" Yaa holo , yaa biimba , na yaa belemene ko ,
byobinso bibyo bikoofuuka mu kubisalila , bunu buri mangisi na nyikusulu dza baatu .
Byobinso bibyo bisoongo madyeele mu nsambukulu , mu nkulukulu , na nkwamusunu nyutu ; koomosoko byahele na ndaandu , ti hayuku biyukitisaa muswinyi .
Mbuti beenu lwafulukusu na Kiristo , lo sakeenu bya ku yulu , kukwo kwadzakala Kiristo ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi .
Bvuleenu kusaka bya ku yulu , nkani ka bya ha butoto ko .
Bukuri beenu lwafwa , na kidziingu kyeenu kyasweeku kintwaari na Kiristo mu Nzaambi .
Mu ntaangu mbasi-tsuku yi monokono Kiristo , nde wuri kidziingu kyeenu , beenu se kintwaari na nde sa lwamonokono mu nkeembu .
Ngo hoteenu kusalila bifu bya nsi : buyala , nsumukunu , mantiilu mamabi , nyiimunu dzadzibi , na ntiki-mboongo yiri nsambukulu-biteki .
Mu ntoono mimyo , nkesi dza Nzaambi dzibwaanaa ha yulu baala ba tungu .
Beenu se mu ntaangu yayikulu , lwaba kwedyatilaana mu bifu bibyo , bu lwaba mwooyo mu byo .
Ngo mu lumalu , bwoongoleenu byobinso bibyo : nkesi , kituunsi , mutima-bubi , bitari , dzoonsolo dza nsoni mu minwa myeenu .
Yaa lwesilisina mpya ko beenu na beenu , bu lwayeki lwapala mu muutu wa mukulu , na mu biyiriki byaandi ,
na bu lwayeki lwalwaata muutu wamoono , wubweese kukituka wamoono , mu kubaka nyaabulu mu kifwaani kya wamuyirika .
Mu didyo , kwasaala Muhelene na Muyudayo ko , wateendu bubakala na wahele kuteende bubakala ko , munzeense , Musikite , nkutu , muutu wuri bunsaalisi ko ; ngo Kiristo wuri byobinso na wuri mu bobanso .
Ngo bu luri lwasoolu kuri Nzaambi , luri bangisi , na lwatya kuri nde , beeneenu na mutima wa ngebe , wa mbweeyulu , wa nkulukulu , wa bundeembu na wa nkindusulu .
Yendeenu lwekuunda bambaasi beenu na beenu , na kwehemesene beenu na beenu . Mbuti mosi mu beenu wuri na mwaa munyoongi mu mbaasi , lo bunu bwaluhemesene Mfumu , beenu se seenee bubwo .
Ha yulu momanso mamo , salilee ntiilu ngo musiinga wa nyirimunu yakuka .
Hemese kiyeengi kya Kiristo , ki bari baluteelele mbila mu nyutu mosi , kituma mitima mya beenu . Beeneenu bayaari kubvutula matoondo .
Hemese maampu ma Kiristo madzakala mu beenu mu busina . Mu madyeele momanso , yikisineenu na lubusineenu beenu na beenu , mu mikuunga mya ndoombulu , mya ndumusu na mya kimpeeve . Yimbikilee Nzaambi mikuunga mya matoondo mu mitima myeenu .
Na momanso ma lutsiitsa kuyirika mu nzoonsulu , bunu pe mu biyiriki , yirikilee momanso mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu , mu mvutukulu matoondo mu nde , kuri Taata Nzaambi .
Bakasi , beenee batumuma kuri balumi beenu , bunu bwayelemene mu Mfumu .
Balumi , tyeenee bakasi beenu , na yaa lwebanyokono ko .
Baala , tambukilee mu momanso kuri bataayi na banguri beenu , bukuri buri bwabubwete mu Mfumu .
Bataayi , yaa lwebakisa baala beenu nkesi ko , mpisi bahele kuholo-bito .
Bankutu , tambukilee mu momanso , kuri bamfumu beenu ba muswinyi , kari hani ha busu bwa bo ko , mu nzala kubweeye kuri baatu , ngo mu nkulukulu na mu kibvumi kya Mfumu .
Mamo ma lutsiitsa kuyirika , yirikilee mo mu mutima wamutsiina , bunu ti kuri Mfumu , nkani ka kuri baatu ko ,
bu luyaari ti , sa lwataambula kuri Mfumu museendu ngo saala . Beenee bakwesalila Mfumu Kiristo .
Mukwongo , wunde wusalila bubayi sa kataambula mamo ma kari kayirika ma bubayi ; ka kuba munsoori mu baatu ko .
Bamfumu , yirikeenu kuri bankutu beenu ma suunguma na mayelemene , bu luyaari ti beenu se luri na Mfumu ku mayulu .
Syaamee mu lusaambulu , beenee naana mu lwo , mu mvutukulu matoondo .
Mu ntaangu yo yimosi , saambilee se na mu beetu , mpisi heki Nzaambi katuha mpwaani ya kuyikisa maampu , na kuyaabisa mpaanu dza Kiristo , bukuri mu ntoono mpaanu dzidzo me nyiri mu boroko .
Saambilee mpisi heki me mbaangula mpaanu dzidzo , bunu bunyelemini kuyikisa .
Dyaatilee mu madyeele ha busu bwa baatu ba ku mbasi ; salilee ntaangu .
Ma lukwedzoonso beenu maba ma bweese mu mantaangu momanso , matwa mungwa , mu kuyaaba bunu bwayelemene kuha mvutu kuri mpisi muutu .
Mu misamu mitariri me , Tikiko sa kaluyaabisa , nde wuri mpaangi ya mutima , kisari kyakwiikama na mbaasi ya kisalu mu Mfumu .
Me nyamuheekiri kuri beenu mu ntoono yiyo , mpisi heki beenu luyaaba misamu mitariri beetu , na kasyaamisa mitima myeenu .
Nde bo na Onesimo , mpaangi yakwiikama na ya mutima , wuri mosi mu beenu , sa baluyaabisa misamu myominso miri kumaku .
Aristarako , mbaasi yaami yi turi mu boroko , wuluheekiri mboto . Malako , mpaangi Barnaba , nde se wuluheekiri mboto . Mu ntoono ya nde , beenu lwataamburi ntumunu ; mbuti wiisiri kuri beenu , lo mutaambuleenu .
Yesu , wubateelaa ti Yusto , nde se wuluheekiri mboto . Mu bateende bubakala , banabo kitsu bakwesala kintwaari na me mu ntoono Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ; bo ngo babeeri mboondulu ku nyiri me .
Epafara , wa beenu-meene wuluheekiri mboto . Nde nkutu Kiristo Yesu , wukwelunwanikina mpisi ntaangu mu nsaambulu , mpisi heki beenu luteleme nangwii , luba bakuka mu kuyirika momanso matiiri Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , me nyimuteele kimbaangi ti , nde wuri mu kwebama kwalaka mu ntoono beenu , na mu bari ku Lahodikya , na mu bari ku Yerapoli .
Luka , mubuki-babeeru , nduku yeetu ya mutima , bo na Dema baluheekiri mboto .
Henee mamboto , kuri bampaangi ba ku Lahodikya , kuri Nimfa na kuri dibuundu dikutukunaa mu nzo nde .
Bu lumeeni kutaanga mukaanda wumawu , lo seenee kuri ti kaba wataangu se kuri dibuundu dya bari ku Lahodikya ; na mukaanda wa bari ku Lahodikya beenu se lumutaanga .
Leeleenu kuri Arkipo ti : Sa madyeele mu kisalu ki wuri wataambula mu Mfumu , mpisi sala kyo kwakubwete .
Taambuleenu mboto ya mu kooko kwa me-meene Pawulo . Baambukeenu mwooyo ti me nyiri mu boroko . Bweese buba na beenu !
Pawulo , Silvano na Timoteho , kuri dibuundu dya Tesalonika , mu Taata Nzaambi na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo : bweese na kiyeengi biba na beenu .
Beetu tubvutulaana matoondo mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi , mu beenu-banso , na twahele kuhoto kuluyekelaana mu nsaambulu dzeetu .
Beetu tubaambukaana mwooyo mu biyiriki bya kanyi dyeenu , mu kisalu kya ntiilu yeenu , na mu kifiki kya nsiitu dzeenu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi .
Bampaangi batya kuri Nzaambi , beetu tuyaari nsoolulu yeenu .
Mukwongo , Musamu beetu Wamubwete wahele kutubuka kuri beenu , munu mu nzoonsulu kitsu , ngo se mu mpinu , mu Mpeeve Yangisi na mu nyukusulu ya musundu , bunu bu luyaari bu twaba beetu ha kakati dya beenu , mu ntoono beenu .
Na beenu lwayeki minsombisiri mya beetu na mya Mfumu , bu lwataamburi Maampu kunsa mpasi dzalaka , mu kiminu kya Mpeeve Yangisi .
Mu didyo , beenu lwayeki kifwaani kuri bobanso basiila kanyi , bari ku Makedonya na bari ku Akaya .
Bukuri , kuholosono kuri beenu , kari mani Maampu ma Mfumu mayukukuna , mu Makedonya na mu Akaya ko , ngo kanyi dyeenu mu Nzaambi se dyayabakana mwomunso , kuri lo beetu twahele kubweese kwaandi ti kudidzonsolo .
Bukuri bobanso bakwedzoonsolo mu beetu , mu ntambukulu yi lwatutaamburi ha twayisiri kuri beenu , na bunu bu luri lwasiisila beenu biteki na kusyeeteke kuri Nzaambi , mu kusalila nde , Nzaambi ya mwooyo na ya ngwanwa ,
na mu kwekiingila Mwaana waandi wufumuna ku mayulu , wu kafulukisi mu bafwa , Yesu , nde wutukuula mu nkesi dzikwiisa .
Bampaangi , beenu-meene luyaari dyo ti nyisulu beetu kuri beenu yasiiri kuba yabuunu ko .
Bunu bu luyaari , beetu twamono mpasi na batubamisa ku Filipo , ngo Nzaambi yeetu watusyaamisa mu kuyikisa Musamu waandi Wamubwete kunsa nwaanusunu dzamakwa .
Mukwongo , nyikusulu dza beetu ka dziri dza nzimbusulu ko , dza nsumukunu bunu pe dza mawunu ko .
Ngo bukuri Nzaambi watufyongokini mu kutuyakisa Musamu Wamubwete , beetu tukweyikisa kari mu kubweeye ha busu bwa baatu ko , ngo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , nde wufyongokinaa mitima myeetu .
Bunu bu luyaari , beetu twasii salila mu nzoonsulu dza lupyelu ko , bunu pe mu buungu dya ntiki-mboongo ko , Nzaambi mbaangi .
Beetu twasiiri saka masiiku mafumuna kuri baatu ko , mafumuna kuri beenu , bunu pe kuri bakimi ko .
Twaba kwaandi lo twakuka mu kuri ti beenu lutubuungula , bu turi bantumu ba Kiristo , ngo kasi beetu twaba twaluula mu bundeembu ha kakati dya beenu , bunu musoombi wubuungulaana baala ba nde-meene .
Mu musoongo wu turi na nde mu beenu , beetu turi na kiminu mu kuluha , kari wunu Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi ko , ngo na kidziingu kya beetu-meene se , bukuri beenu luri bampaangi ba mutima .
Mukwongo , baambukeenu mwooyo , bampaangi , mu kisalu kya makwa na mpasi dza beetu : beetu twaluyikisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi , mu kwesala butsuku na mwiini , mpisi heki ti mosi mu beenu kahele kutubuungula .
Beenu luri bambaangi , Nzaambi se mbaangi : ndyaatulu beetu yaba yangisi , yasuunguma , na yahele maseembu ha busu bwa beenu basiila kanyi .
Beenu luyaari se ti , beetu twaba kuhololo mosi mosi mu beenu bunu bu hololaana taayi baala baandi .
Beetu twaba kweluboondaana , kwelusyaamisaana , na kweluyingukilaana mu kuba na ndyaatulu yitiiri Nzaambi , nde wuri mu kuluteele mu kimfumu na mu nkeembu yaandi .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu tubvutulaana matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu , bukuri maampu ma Nzaambi ma luri lwayuka kuri beetu , beenu lwamataamburi , kari bunu maampu ma baatu ko , ngo bunu bu mari maampu ma Nzaambi ma ngwanwa , ma kwesala mu beenu basiilaana kanyi .
Mukwongo , bampaangi , beenu lweki minsombisiri mya mabuundu ma Nzaambi , mari mu nkoonsi ya Yudaya , masiila kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu , bukuri beenu se lwabamini kuri ba beenu-meene ba luri nsi mosi , mu misamu myomimosi mya bamini mabuundu mamo kuri Bayudayo .
Bo ngo baba dzusa Mfumu Yesu na babikiri , na bakwaamisini beetu . Bahele kubweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na bo ngo bataatu ba baatu bobanso .
Bakwetukabukisa kuyikisa bangooyi mpisi bahele kubvuuka . Mu didyo bo bari mu kukukisilaana kiteesu kya masumu maaku , mpisi ntaangu . Ngo ku manunu nkesi dza Nzaambi dzi mwaa kubatubukila .
Bampaangi , beetu ngo bari , bu twaba la na beenu mu mwaa ntaangu , mu manyutu nkani ka mu mitima ko , mu musoongo walaka wu twaba na nde , twabaka kitsimi kya makwa mu kuri ti tumoneenu mu miisu na miisu .
Mu didyo , beetu twaba na nzala kwiisa kuri beenu , mbiki ti me Pawulo , mbala mosi bunu pe dzoolo , ngo Satana watukabukisi .
Mukwongo , beenu luri nsiitu yeetu , kiminu kyeetu , bunu pe lukoongolo lweetu lwa ndulukulu , ha busu bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi .
Mukwongo , beenu luri nkeembu yeetu na kiminu kyeetu .
Hango , bu twakonini kukiingila , beetu twamono dyo ti bwabubwete mu kusaala beetu bakaka ku Atena ,
na kuheeke mpaangi yeetu Timoteho , nde wukwesala kintwaari na Nzaambi mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , mu kulukumisa na kulusyaamisa mu kanyi dyeenu ,
mpisi heki muutu kahele kubwa mu ntoono manyoongi ma ntaangu yimayi . Mukwongo , beenu-meene luyaari ti mu bubwo turi mwooyo .
Mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri kuri beenu , beetu twaba kwelulubulaana ti , bee batumonisini manyoongi ; ngo bunubwo se mimyo mi mwaakututubukila , na beenu luyaari .
Hango-nkuumbu , me nkoonaa kukiinga , ha nyaheekiri Timoteho mu kwiisa kuyaaba bunu buri kanyi dya beenu , mu kubata kuri ti Musindukiri kakwiisa kulusindukila na kisalu kya beetu kihele kuba kya buunu .
Ngo mu lumalu , Timoteho bu kabeeri kuri beenu mwaakwiisa bvutuka kuri beetu , na watuyaabisiri musamu wamubwete mu ntoono kanyi na ntiilu yeenu , na ti , beenu bunu luri lwakebe bitsimi byabibwete mu beetu , na luri na nzala beetu kumono , bunu bu turi na beetu se nzala kulumono .
Mu didyo , bampaangi , kunsa mpasi dzeetu na manyoongi meetu , beetu twabakiri mboondulu mu beenu mu ntoono kanyi dyeenu .
Ngo mu lumalu , beetu turi mwooyo bukuri beenu lwakwiikama mu Mfumu .
Nkya matoondo beetu tutsiitsa kubvutula kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono beenu , mu kiminu kyokinso ki turi mu kumono mu dyaambu dya beenu , ha busu bwa Nzaambi yeetu ?
Butsuku na mwiini , beetu turi mu kwesaambilaana kwalaka mpisi tubweese kulumono na kukukisila mari mu kuhele mu kanyi dyeenu .
Hemese Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi nde-meene na Mfumu yeetu Yesu batudzibukila nzila mu kwiisa kuri beenu .
Hemese Mfumu kabuukisa na kabweese ntiilu yi luri na yo beenu na beenu , na mu baatu bobanso , bunu bu tulutiiriri beetu seenee .
Hemese nde kakumisa mitima myeenu , mpisi heki beenu luba bangisi na bahele maseembu ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , mu ntaangu ya nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu kintwaari na bangisi baandi bobanso . [ Amene ] .
Mu misiiri bampaangi , beetu tululoombo na tulusyaamisa mu Mfumu . Bu lwayeki lwayika kuri beetu ndyaatulu yayelemene mu kubweeye kuri Nzaambi , bunubwo se luri mu kwedyaatila , ngo bweeseenu kutoombolo kiteesu .
Mukwongo , beenu luyaari nkya nyikusulu beetu turi twaluha mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
Kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri ti , beenu luba bangisi na luhele kwesalila buyala .
Mpisi muutu mu beenu kayaaba kuhololo mukasi waandi , kunsa bungisi na lukiinsu ,
kwahele kuba mu lutumu lwa mantiilu mamabi , bunu bangooyi bari bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi .
Mu dyaambu di , yaa kuba wuyirika ma lumvuki kuri mpaangi yaandi , bunu pe kumuwuna ko , bukuri beetu twatekesele ku luyaabisa na kusiingisa dyo ti : Mfumu wubvutulaana mamabi kuri bayirikaana ma bubwo .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi ka siiri kututeele mbila mu kuba kunsa nsumukunu ko , ngo mu kuba kunsa bungisi .
Hango-nkuumbu , mpisi wunde wubisa nyikusulu dzimadzi , lo kari muutu kabisiri ko , ngo Nzaambi wuhaanaa Mpeeve yaandi Yangisi kuri beenu .
Mu dyaambu dya ntiilu ya kimpaangi , beenu luri na nzala kuri ti ba lutinina ko , bukuri beenu-meene lwayeki lwayika kuri Nzaambi bwa kutilisina beenu na beenu .
Bubwo se beenu luri mu kuyirikaana kuri bampaangi bobanso bari ku Makedonya , ngo beetu tulusyaamisa bampaangi , mu kubweese kutoombolo kiteesu ,
mu kweba na nzala kunata kidziingu kunsa kidzuunu , na kwenama misamu mini mya beenu-meene , na kwesala mu myooko mya beenu-meene bunu bu turi twalutuma dyo .
Mpisi heki luba na ndyaatulu yayelemene ha busu bwa baatu bari ku mbasi , na muutu kahele kulubuungula .
Bampaangi , beetu tutii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu , mu mitariri babo ba mwaafwa , mpisi luhele kwenyoongo bunu bakaka bahele na nsiitu .
Mbuti tusiila kanyi ti Yesu wafwiiri na wafulukiri , lo tusiileenu se kanyi ti Nzaambi sa kafulukisa mu Yesu , babo bafwiiri kuri bari na kanyi mu nde .
Mukwongo , mi turi mu kuleele beetu , bunu buri maampu ma Mfumu , mimami : beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo natee mu nyisulu Mfumu , ka tuba ku mankula ma babo bafwa ko .
Bukuri Mfumu nde-meene , mu kidiimbu kya nyaabusulu , mu mbeembu ya mukuutu bambasi , mu munyiingu mvumvuri ya Nzaambi , sa kasunduka mu mayulu , na babo bafwiila mu Kiristo sa batekesele kufuluka ;
tumi beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo , batunaanguna ha kimosi na bo mu matuti , mu kubwaana Mfumu mu kingye-kingye , na kuba kintwaari na Mfumu mantaangu momanso .
Hango-nkuumbu , yendeenu lwebondosono beenu na beenu mu maampu mamo .
Mu ntoono ya mantaangu na bilookolo , bampaangi , beenu ka luri na nzala kuri ti balutinina ko .
Mukwongo , beenu-meene luyirikiri kuyaaba ti , kiluumbu kya Mfumu sa kiisa bunu ngaa-kwiibi mu butsuku .
Mbasi-tsuku haleele baatu ti : turi na kiyeengi , turi na kidzuunu , hanaho se mfukusulu yibabwilikila na sisuu , bunu bu kwiisikila misoongo mya mbutulu kuri mukyeetu wuri na yimi , ngo bo ka batsiitsa kubvuuka ko .
Ngo kasi , bampaangi , beenu lwahele kunsa mampimbisi kuri heki kiluumbu kikyo kiisa kuri beenu na sisuu buni ngaa-kwiibi .
Mukwongo , beenu-banso luri baala ba buungi na baala ba mwiini . Beetuneenu ka turi baatu ba butsuku bunu pe ba mampimbisi ko .
Hango-nkuumbu , yaa tubweeneenu tolo bunu bakaka ko , ngo tubeenee naana na kuba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene .
Bukuri bangaa-tolo , butsuku bakoobwaana tolo , na binwi bya malu , butsuku bakookolaa malu .
Ngo beetuneenu turi baatu ba mwiini , tubeeneenu na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene twahele kukolo malu , twalwaata kanyi na ntiilu bunu kinkuta kya mu ntulu kya mukaanda kibulu , na twalwaata nsiitu ya mvuukulu bunu mpu ya kitari .
Bukuri Nzaambi kasiiri kututaasila mu kubwilikila nkesi ko , ngo kutaambula mvuukulu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Nde wafwa mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki , ti hayuku turi naana ti hayuku twabwa tolo , lo tubeeneenu mwooyo kintwaari na nde .
Hango-nkuumbu , syamisineenu beenu na beenu , na tuungusineenu beenu na beenu bunu bu luri mu kwesalila .
Bampaangi , beetu tululoombo mu kwebvumina babo bari mu kwesala ha kakati dya beenu , bakwelutwaalisa mu Mfumu na bakwelulubula .
Namitineenu kubvula kwebasiila mutima na kwebatya , mu ntoono kisalu ki bari na kyo . Beeneenu na kiyeengi beenu na beenu .
Beetu tulusyaamisa , bampaangi : seembeenu babo bari kunsa kisaangila , syaamiseenu bari na boomo , kumiseenu bari na bubolo , beeneenu na nkindusulu-mutima mu bobanso .
Taleenu yaa kuba muutu wubvutula bubi mu bubi ko , ngo namitineenu kweyirika mamabwete , ha kakati dya beenu na beenu na kuri bobanso .
Beeneenu na kiminu mpisi ntaangu .
Saambileenu kwahele manunu .
Bvutuleenu matoondo mu myominso , bukuri bubwo buri kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri beenu mu Yesu Kiristo .
Yaa ludzimisa Mpeeve ko .
Yaa lusaana mbikululu ko ,
ngo fyongokineenu myominso , lukebe myamibwete .
Yaa luyirika ti dimosi dyadibi ko .
Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi nde-meene , kalusa bangisi mu kiteesu kyakuka , na bumuutu bwa beenu bwobunso , kiluunsi , muheebulu na nyutu , biba byakebu kwahele maseembu , mu nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Wunde wuri mu kuluteele mbila wakwiikama , sa kakukisa momanso .
Bampaangi , saambileenu se mu beetu .
Heeneenu mamboto kuri bampaangi bobanso mu nyumutunu yangisi .
Me nyiluyingukiri mu nkuumbu Mfumu : taangiseenu mukaanda wumawu kuri bampaangi bobanso .
Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu .
Pawulo , Silvano na Timoteho kuri dibuundu dya bari Tesalonika , mu Nzaambi Taayi dyeetu , na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
Bweese na kiyeengi bifumini kuri Nzaambi Taayi [ dyeetu ] , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
Bampaangi , Beetu tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo mpisi ntaangu kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono beenu . Buri bwabubwete , bukuri kanyi dya beenu diri mu kwebuuka kwalaka , na ntiilu yi luri na yo mu bambaasi yiri mu kwehamisa mu muutu-muutu .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu turi na kimweese mu beenu ha kakati dya mabuundu ma Nzaambi , mu ntoono kifiki kyeenu na kanyi dyeenu , kunsa nkwamusunu dzeenu dzodzinso , na manyoongi ma luri mu kwekuunda .
Kikyo kidiimbu kya mutsuundu Nzaambi wasuunguma , mpisi luba lwamonoko ti lwayelemene mu kimfumu kya Nzaambi , ki luri mu kwemwiina mpasi .
Mukwongo , diri dyasuunguma ti Nzaambi kabvutula manyoongi kuri babo bakwelusoongo manyoongi ;
na kaha mpuumunu , kuri beenu luri mu kwemono manyoongi , na kuri beetu . Mimyo mbasi-tsuku sa myaba ha monokono Mfumu Yesu mu mayulu na bambasi ba mpinu dzaandi ,
kunsa mbaawu ya mile , mu kubvutula bubi kuri babo bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi , na bahele kutumuma mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
Bo sa bataambula maseembu ma mfukusulu yahele manunu , la na busu bwa Mfumu , na la na nkeembu ya makwa maandi ,
mbasi-tsuku ha kakwiisa , mu kiluumbu kikyo , mu kuba wakeembusu mu bangisi baandi , na mu kuba wasiika mu bobanso basiilaana kanyi , bukuri beenu lwasiiriri kanyi mu kimbaangi kyeetu .
Hango-nkuumbu , beetu tunamitina kusaambila mu beenu , mpisi heki Nzaambi yeetu kamono ti , beenu lwayelemene na mbila yi kari kaluteele , na mu mpinu dzaandi kakukisa nzala yoyinso yakuyirika mamabwe yiri mu beenu , na kisalu kya kanyi .
Bubwo , nkuumbu Mfumu yeetu Yesu , yiba yakeembese mu beenu , na beetu se tuba twakeembese mu nde , bunu buri bweese bwa Nzaambi yeetu , na bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
Ngo mu mitariri nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , na kukutukuna kuri nde , bampaangi , beetu tululoombo ti :
yaa luwasula kumono mutima mambaawu ko , na yaa luba na boomo ko mu mbikululu , mu nyikusulu , bunu pe mu mukaanda wu baleele ti wafumuna kuri beetu ; bunu ti kiluumbu kya Mfumu ki mwaakwiisa .
Muutu yaa kaluwuna mu ntoono ti mosi ko . Kiteesu kya nyekululu kanyi mu Nzaambi kyakiri kutekesele kwiisa , na muutu wahele na mangisi wakiri kumonokono , mwaana wa mfukusulu .
Wunde wutelemese kitaatu , na wudzaangama ha busu bwa mpisi ki baleeriri ti Nzaambi bunu pe ki basaambilaana , natee mu kiteesu kya kudzakala mu nzo Nzaambi , na kuleele nde-meene ti nde ngo Nzaambi .
Beenu lwahele kubaambuka mwooyo ti me nyaluyaabisiri dyo , ha nyaba nyakiri kuri beenu ?
Ngo mu lumalu beenu luyaari kikyo kyamukangikila , mpisi nde kaba kumonokono munu mu kilookolo kya nde-meene .
Mukwongo , mpaanu ya mamabi yeki mu kwesala ; ngo kasi wunde wamukangikila yelemini kuba wayisila .
Tumi , wahele na mangisi kaba wamonokono , na hanaho Mfumu [ Yesu ] kamudzusula mu muheebulu wupala mu munwa waandi , na kamudziimbisila mu kumonokono kwa nyisulu yaandi .
Nyisulu wahele na mangisi sa yayirimina mu makwa ma Saatana , mu biyiriki bya mpinu , na bidiimbu , na bimaangu byampya ,
na kunsa mawunu momanso , ma bubayi kuri babo bari mu kudziimbila , bukuri bahele kutaambula ntiilu ya ngwanwa mu kuba babvuuka .
Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi wuri mu kubaheekele makwa ma kuwumuka , mpisi basiila kanyi mu mpya .
Mpisi heki , bobanso bahele kusa kanyi mu ngwanwa , ngo bamono kiminu mu bubayi , baba batsuundisa .
Beetu ngo bari , tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu , mu ntoono beenu bampaangi batya kuri Mfumu , bukuri Nzaambi walusoolo bunu mintekesele , mu kuba babvuuka kunsa bungisi buluha Mpeeve , na kanyi mu ngwanwa .
Mu didyo , Nzaambi kari kaluteele mbila mu Musamu Wamubwete wu turi twaluyikisa , mu kubaka nkeembu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Hango-nkuumbu , bampaangi , beenee bakwiikama na kebeenu kikulu ki lwataamburi kuri beetu , mu ndzonsulu bunu pe mu mukaanda .
Hemese Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo nde-meene , na Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , watutya na watuha mu bweese bwaandi , mboondulu ya bibvu ngo bibvu na nsiitu yayibwete ,
kaboondo mitima myeenu , na kalukumisa mu biyiriki byobinso , na mu nzoonsulu dzadzibwete .
Mu misiiri , bampaangi , saambileenu mu beetu , mpisi heki maampu ma Mfumu maba mayabakana na maba makeembele bunu bu mari kuri beenu .
Saambileenu se mpisi heki beetu tukuuluka mu myooko mya baatu bangaa-kibakala na bari na mutima-bubi ; bukuri bobanso bahele na kanyi .
Ngo Mfumu wakwiikama , nde sa kalukumisa na kulukala mu Ngaa-bubi .
Beetu turi na kanyi mu Mfumu mu ntoono beenu , bukuri mamo ma turi mu kulutumaa , beenu luri mu kumayirakaa , na sa lwanamitina kumayirika .
Hemese Mfumu kutwaalisa mitima myeenu mu ntiilu ya Nzaambi , na mu kifiki kya Kiristo .
Bampaangi , beetu tululoombiri mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu kutatuku la na mpisi mpaangi yi kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila , kwahele kuyelemene na kikulu ki lwataambula kuri beetu .
Beenu-meene luyaari bunu bwa kusombosolo beetu . Bukuri beetu twasii kunatina kidziingu kunsa kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu ko .
Beetu twasii kudya byandya bya muutu kwa buunu ko ; ngo kunsa kisalu kya makwa na kunsa mpasi , butsuku na mwiini , beetu twasala mpisi heki mu beenu , muutu kahele kutubuungula .
Kari bukuri ti beetu twaba twahele na miswa ko , ngo beetu twaba tutiiri kulusoongo mu beetu-meene kifwaani kyayelemene kunama .
Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba kuri beenu , beetu twaba luleelaana ti : mbuti muutu katiiri kusala ko , lo yaa kadya se ko .
Ngo beetu turi mu kweyuka ti bakaka mu beenu , bari mu kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila , bahele kwesala , kasi bakwenama misamu myominso .
Beetu tuloombo na tusyaamisa baatu ba bubwo , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo ti : basala mu kidzuunu mu kubaka bya kudya bya bo-meene .
Beenu ngo bari , bampaangi , yaa luholo-bito ko mu kuyirika mamabwe .
Mbuti kuri muutu wahele kutambikila ma turi mu kuleele beetu mu mukaanda wu , lo kebee dyo mu kuhele kubweese kuba kintwaari na wa bubwo , mpisi kamono nsoni .
Ya lumuhololo bunu mutaatu ko , ngo museembeenu bunu mpaangi .
Hemese Mfumu ya kiyeengi , nde-meene kaluha kiyeengi , mu mantaangu momanso na mu myominso . Mfumu kaba na beenu-banso .
Mboto yi ya mu kooko kwa meme Pawulo , kidiimbu mu mpisi mukaanda , wunkootinaa kiri bumabu .
Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu-banso .
Pawulo , ntumu Yesu Kiristo , bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu , na lwa Yesu Kiristo , nsiitu yeetu .
Kuri Timoteho mwaana wangwanwa mu kanyi : bweese , ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yeetu , biba na ye .
Bunu bu nyabee kuleele , ha nyabee kweende me ku Makedonya , dzakala ku Efeso , mpisi heki wedika babamosi , yaa beyikisa nyikusulu dzikimi ko ,
yaa bakaangama mu bimpa , na mu miloongo mya kinkaaka myahele kusuka ; myominso mimyo mitwaalaana nkalikisi , ha kibeendu kya kukukisa kitsimi kya Nzaambi kiri mu kanyi .
Mufunu ntumunu yimayi , wuri mu kuri ti luba na ntiilu yifumunaa mu mutima watsyeemeke , nsimunu yayibwete , na kanyi dyahele bumpitu-bumpyoongo .
Babamosi bayeki batatuka la na mamo , na badziimbila kunsa nzoonsulu dzahele mufunu .
Bo batiiri kuba bayikisi ba mangisi , kasi bahele kubakula mi bari mu kuleele , na mi bari mu kuyirika kutswiikisa .
Beetu tuyaari kuri ti mangisi mari mamabwete , mbuti muutu wumasalila kwakubwete .
Tuyaabeenu ti mangisi bahele kumaha mu ntoono basuunguma , ngo mu ntoono bahele na mangisi , na bahele kutumuma , bahele na kinzaambi , bangaa-masumu , bahele na kanyi , bangaa-saana , bakwedzusa bataayi na banguri , badzusi ba baatu ,
bangaa-buyala , babakala bakweta kimpala na bambaasi babakala , baatu bakweyarika bankutu , bangaa-mpya , bakwelaba-maalu ma mpya , na bakweyirika mari kitaatu na nyikusulu dzadzibwete ,
dzayelemene na Musamu Wamubwete wu bari bayakisa me , wa nkeembu ya Nzaambi ya kiminu .
Me nyibvutula matoondo kuri wunde wampa makwa , Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu , bukuri nde wamwiini ti me nyayelemene mu kunsuusa mu kisalu .
Mu ntaangu yaluta me nyaba ngaa-bitari , ngaa-nkwaamusu , na ngaa-kinwa , kasi nde wambakila ngebe , bukuri me nyaba nyahele na nyaabulu , na nyaba kweyirika mamo kwahele kanyi .
Ngo bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu bwabuukila , ha kimosi na kanyi na ntiilu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu .
Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi , na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso ti : Kiristo Yesu wayisa ha nsi mu kubvuukisa bangaa-masumu , mu bo me watete .
Hango-nkuumbu , me bambakila ngebe , mpisi heki mu me watete , Kiristo Yesu kasoongo kifwaani kya nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso , kuri basiila kanyi mu nde , mu kutaambula kidziingu kyahele manunu .
Kuri Mbyaasi ya mantaangu momanso , yiri kafwaana ko , bamumonaa ko , Nzaambi yomosi kitsu , kuba lukiinsu na nkeembu mu bibvu ngo bibvu , Amene .
Ntumunu yi nyiri mu kuha kuri ye mwaana waami Timoteho , bunu buri mbikululu dzi bari batekesele kuleele mu ntoono ye , kuri ti , mu dzo , ye nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete ,
bu wuri na kanyi na nsimunu yayibwete . Nsimunu yiyo babamosi bayeki bayilooso , na mu mitariri kanyi bo bayeki bapatuka mu maampa .
Mu bo , kuri Imenayo na Alekandere , ba nyiri nyayekele kuri Satana , mpisi baba baseembu na bahele kubweese kwesaana Nzaambi .
Me nyilusyaamisa tekesele myominso , mu kusa ndoombulu , nsaambulu , nyingukulu , na mvutukulu matoondo mu baatu bobanso ,
mu bambyaasi , na mu bobanso bari na lutumu , mpisi tubeeneenu na kidziingu kya mpolo na kidzuunu , kunsa kinzaambi kyokinso na lukiinsu lwolunso .
Mamo mari mamabwete na ma kiminu ha busu bwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu ,
nde tiiri ti baatu bobanso babvuuka na biisa kunyaabulu ya ngwanwa .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi mosi kitsu yiri , na munkabu-kati se mosi kitsu wuri , ha kakati dya Nzaambi na baatu , munkabu-kati wunde muutu kari , ngo Kiristo Yesu .
Nde waheeri kikori ngo nyutu yaandi , mu kukuula baatu bobanso , kikyo ngo kimbaangi mu ntaangu yayelemene .
Mu kimbaangi kikyo me bari bansuusa mu kuba dingisi na ntumu , mu kweyikisa makaanda mu nzila ya kanyi na ya ngwanwa ; me ngwanwa nyiri mu kuleele , nyahele kufuta mpya .
Ngo me ntiiri ti babakala besaambila mu mpisi kibeendu , kuri banaanguna myooko myatsyeemeke , kwahele nkesi na nkalikisi .
Me ntiiri se ti bakyeetu baba na ndwaatulu yayelemene , ya kibvumi na ya soongolo . Yaa babweeye mu mimpandi , mu bitotolo bya woolo bunu pe misaanga , na binkuta bya ntalu yalaka ko ,
kasi byayelemene kuri bakyeetu basalilaa kibvumi kya Nzaambi , ngo mu kubweeye mu biyiriki byabibwete .
Wa mukyeetu kanama nyikusulu kuri wawura , mu kutumuma kwokunso .
Me nyahele kuha miswa kuri wa mukyeetu mu kuyikisa , ti mu kutuma wa mubakala , ngo kaba wawura .
Mukwongo , watete wu bayirikiri Adami , tumi Eva .
Kari Adami watambukiri mawunu ko , ngo kasi wa mukyeetu watambukiri mawunu na kusinina mangisi .
Ngo nde sa kaba wabvuuka mu ntoono mbutulu , mbuti namitini kuba mu kanyi , mu ntiilu , na mu bungisi , kunsa nkulukulu .
Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi . Mbuti muutu wuri na nzala kusala kisalu kya bukuutu bwa dibuundu , lo kisalu kyakibwete katiiri .
Mukuutu dibuundu yelemini kuba wahele na di bamuseembele , mulumi wuri na mukasi mosi , wuri na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , wasoongolo , wakiinsuma , mutaamburi-banzeense , wakuka mu kuyikisa ;
yaa kaba yaa-kinwi ko , yaa kaba se ngaa-bikiindu ko , ngo kasi kaba wadzuuna , wahele kweyumusa baatu , na wahele na ntiki-mboongo .
Nde yelemini se kutwaalisaa nzo ya nde-meene kwa kubwete , wusuusaa baala kunsa lutumu na kunsa kibvumi kyokinso .
Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wahele kuyaaba kutwaalisa nzo ya nde-meene , lo buri katsiitsa kutwaalisila dibuundu dya Nzaambi ?
Yaa kaba se wamoono mu dibuundu ko ; mpisi heki masiiku mahele kumudzusa miisu , na kahele kubwa mu mutsuundu wu batsuundisila dyabulu .
Yelemini kuba se na kimbaangi kyakibwete kimuteelile bari ku mbasi , mpisi kahele kufwa nsoni na kubwa mu siinga dya dyabulu .
Bisari se bwobumosi , bayelemini kuba bakiinsuma , bahele na ndima dzoolo , bahele na nwiinunu malu ya makwa , na bahele kwebakila mboongo mu bumbabu .
Bayelemini kukebe mpaanu dza kanyi mu mutima wa mutsiina .
Bayelemini kutekesele kubafyoongokono ; tumi basala kisalu kya dibuundu , mbuti bahele na mi babaseembele .
Bakyeetu se bwobumosi , bayelemene kuba bakiinsuma , bahele na makele , bari na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , bakwiikama mu myominso .
Bisari biyelemini kuba , balumi bari mukasi mosi , batwaalisa baala na manzo ma bo-meene kwa kubwete .
Mukwongo , babo basala kisalu kya dibuundu kwa kubwete , bataambulaana lukiinsu lwalubwete bo-meene , na nsiitu dzadzinene kunsa kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu .
Me nyikutinina misamu mimami , bu nyiri na nsiitu mu kwiisa kuri ye mu mawasu ;
mpisi heki , ti hayuku me nziingiri mu kwiisa , lo ye yaaba bunu bwa kudyaatila mu nzo ya Nzaambi , yiri dibuundu dya Nzaambi yamwooyo , kuunsi na kitsuku kya ngwanwa .
Diri dyayabakana ti , mpaanu dza kinzaambi dziri dzadzinene : Kiristo , wamonikini mu muswinyi , Mpeeve wasoongiri kuri ti nde wasuunguma , bambasi bamumono , bamuyabikisa kuri makaanda , bamusiila kanyi mu nsi , bamunata ku yulu mu nkeembu .
Mpeeve wuyirika luleele ti : mu mantaangu ma nsukulu , babamosi sa bayekele kanyi , mu kukaangama mu mampeeve ma mawunu , na mu nyikusulu dza mampeeve mamabi ,
mu bumpitu-bumpyoongo bwa bangaa-mpya , bayeki na bidiimbu byasa mu kiseengu kya mbaawu , mu mitima mya bo-meene ,
bakwekabikisa nkweelulu , na bakweha mangisi mu byandya biri Nzaambi wayirika , mu kuri ti baatu bakwiikama na bamwayaaba ngwanwa , badya mu mvutukulu matoondo .
Mukwongo , mpisi kiyiriki kya Nzaambi kyakibwete , kuri kya kulooso ko mbuti bakihoriri mu mvutukulu matoondo ;
bukuri byobinso bibakaa bungisi mu maampu ma Nzaambi na mu lusaambulu .
Wubaangulaana misamu mimyo kuri bampaangi , lo ye sa ba kisari kyakibwete kya Kiristo Yesu , kyadiisulu mu maampu ma kanyi , na mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete , dzi wuri mu kunama kwa kubwete .
Ngo looso mankuma ma bungooyi na ma bakyeetu ba binuni . Yende wetsitsikila bwa kubeele na kinzaambi ye-meene .
Mukwongo , kutsitsikila kwa nyutu , kuri mufunu mu myantele ; ngo kasi kuba na kinzaambi kuri mufunu mu myominso , kuri na lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya lumalu , na kya ku mankula .
Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi , na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso .
Mukwongo , mbuti turi mu kwebama na kwenwaana , lo bukuri twasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi yamwooyo , yiri mubvuukisi baatu bobanso , mbiki ti bari na kanyi .
Ye yelemini kutuma na yikisa misamu mimyo .
Muutu yaa kasaana butuuti bwa ye ko , ngo soongo kifwaani kuri bangaa-kanyi , mu nzoonsulu , mu ndyaatulu , mu ntiilu , mu kanyi , na mu bungisi .
Natee ku nyikwiisa me , sa mutima mu ntaangulu , mu nsyamusunu , na mu nyikusulu .
Yaa nyaafuna kikabu kya bweese kiri mu ye ko , ki bari bakuha mu mbikululu , mu ntetukulu myooko mya kintwaari kya bakulu ba babakala .
Salila mamo , heele mutima mpisi bobanso bamono ti kisalu kya ye kiri mu kubuuka .
Sa madyeele ye-meene , na mu nyikusulu . Namitina kusalila bubwo ; bukuri wusalilaana bubwo , lo ye sa wabvuuka ye-meene , na sa wabvuukisa babo bakuywiila .
Yaa seembe wa kinuni mu kibakala ko , ngo musyaamisa bunu ti taayi , hololo minkuula bunu bampaangi ,
bakyeetu babuuka , bahololo bunu banguri , bantuumba bunu bibusi , kunsa bungisi bwobunso .
Kiinsa bafwiilila balumi , bari bafwiiri bangwanwa .
Mbuti mufwiiri wuri na baala bunu pe bateekulu , lo batekesele kuyika bwa kusalila kinzaambi mu nzo ya bo-meene , na mamo ma bayelemini kuyirika kuri bataayi na banguri , bukuri mimyo myabweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
Wunde wuri mufwiiri wangwanwa , lo wunde wayeki wasaala nde mukaka , wasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi , na wunamitinaana mu ndoombulu na mu nsaambulu , butsuku na mwiini .
Ngo kasi , mufwiiri wuri na kidziingu kya minkeembu , lo wafwa ti hayuku wuri mwooyo .
Mimyo ye yelemini kubatuma , mpisi bahele kuba na mi babaseembele .
Mbuti muutu wahele kwebuungula ba nde-meene , mbiki ti ba mu nzo yaandi , lo nde tunini kanyi dyaandi na bvuriri mutima-bubi ti na mungooyi .
Mufwiiri mu kuba watinu nkuumbu mu mukaanda , yelemini kuba na mibvu myaluta makuumi masaamunu , na waba mukasi wa bakala dimosi ,
wayabakana mu biyiriki byabibwete , wayeki wabuukisa baala , wataambula banzeense , waswaaka miilu mya bangisi , wabakisa bari mu ngebe , na wasa mutima mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete .
Ngo kasi , bwafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba , lo ye kusa kubawuungula , bukuri mbuti bo batelimisi kitaatu na Kiristo mu ntoono manzala maaku , lo beki na nzala kukweele ,
na bari kunsa mutsuundu , bukuri bamwaayekele kanyi dyatete .
Ha yulu haho se , bilyeebe bari , bo misamu kweyaabila mu kweyende kyaatu-kyaatu mu manzo ma baatu ; ngo kari bini bilyeebe bari ko , kasi bangaa-lusuku na bangaa-kintori se , bakweleele myahele kuyelemene .
Ngo me ntiiri ti bafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba bakweele , babuta baala , batwaalisa manzo maaku , na yaa baha mpwaani ti mosi ko kuri mutaatu mu kudzoonso mamabi .
Mukwongo , bafwiiri babamosi beki bawumuka mu kwenama Satana .
Mbuti kuri mukyeetu ngaa-kanyi wuri na bafwiiri mu kaanda , lo kababakisa , na yaa kayekele kisalu kuri dibuundu ko , mpisi heki dibuundu kabakisa babo bari bafwiiri bangwanwa .
Bakulu ba babakala bari mu kwetwaalisa kwa kubwete , bayelemini kutaambula lukiinsu lwa biteesu byoolo , mbiki ti bakwemono mpasi mu maampu na mu nyikusulu .
Mukwongo , Matinu maleele ti : « Ngoombo mbuti yiri mu kudzabata mankono , lo kumukaanga pe munwa . » Na ti : « Kisari kiyelemini kubaka mufutu waandi . »
Yaa taambula ko ti bafuunda mukulu-bakala kuri ye , mbuti ka ha busu bwa bambaangi boolo bunu pe batatu ko .
Babwiiri mu masumu , lo baseembe ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , mpisi baatu bakaka se baba na boomo .
Me nyi kuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , na ha busu bwa bambasi ba Nzaambi ba bari basoolo ti , salila momanso mamo kwahele munsoori na kwahele bubayi .
Yaa tetekele muutu myooko mu mawasu-mawasu ko , na yaa ba kintwaari mu masumu ma ŋani ko ; kebe nyutu yaaku kunsa bungisi .
Yaa bweese kunwa mani maampa kitsu ko , ngo yende wenwa se mwaa-malu , mu ntoono bubeeru bwa kifunda , na mpololo-bito ya kinsosi-kinsosi .
Masumu ma baatu babamosi , mari mayabakana tekesele bateleme ku mutsuundu ; ngo kasi kuri bakaka , mo kuyabakana ha mambisa .
Bwobumosi se , biyiriki byabibwete biri byayabakana ; ngo byakaka byahele kuyabakana se , ka bitsiitsa kuba byasweeme ko .
Bobanso bari mu kihaangu kya bunkutu , bahololo bamfumu baaku mu lukiinsu lwolunso , mpisi heki nkuumbu Nzaambi na nyikusulu bihele kuba byasaanu .
Babo bari bamfumu baaku basiilaa kanyi , yaa babanyaafuna ko bukuri ti bampaangi , ngo kasi babasalila kubvuriri bubwete , bukuri mamabwe mabayirika mamo , kuri bampaangi ba mutima , bangaa-kanyi bari mu kuyirika . Mamo ye yelemini kuyikisa na kutuma .
Mbuti muutu wuri na nyikusulu dzikimi , na wahele kukaangama mu maampu mamabwete ma Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , na mu nyikusulu dzayelemene na kinzaambi ,
lo nde masiiku ma mudzusa miisu , na kayaa kitotolo ko . Nde wuri na bubeeru bwa nkalikisi na mayumu mu misamu . Kukwo kukoofuminaa musoki , nkalikisi , bitari , nsimunu mamabi ,
mayumu mahele kuwa ma baatu ba biwulu , bari madyeele mamabi , na bahele na ngwanwa , bakwetsima ti kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu .
Mukwongo , kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu , mbuti ye kiminu kwemono munu mu biwuri na byo .
Bukuri twasii twaala kitotolo mu nsi yi ko , mu didyo se katutsiitsa kunata kitotolo ko .
Habaanaa turi na byandya na binkuta , lo twemono kiminu mu bini bibyo .
Ngo babo bari na nzala busina , bakoobwaanaa mu nsindukulu , mu myeete , na mu mburi nyiimunu dza buwulu na dzadzibi , dzikotisaana baatu kunsa mfukusulu na nzimbusulu .
Mukwongo , ntiilu ya mboongo ngo mwaansi wa momanso mamabi ; babamosi bakaangama mu yo , bayeki badziimbisa kanyi , na bakomono manyutu maaku mu mburi manyoongi .
Ngo ye muutu Nzaambi , bata misamu mimyo . Yende wesaka nsungumunu , kinzaambi , kanyi , ntiilu , nkindusulu-mutima , bundeembu .
Nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete ya kanyi , kwaata kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso ki bari bakuteelele mbila , na ki wuri wateele kimbaangi kyakibwete ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka .
Me nyikuloombiri ha busu bwa Nzaambi , nde wuhaanaa kidziingu kuri bitotolo byobinso , na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , wateeri kimbaangi kyakibweete ha busu bwa Pontyo Pilato :
kebe lutumu kwahele kuba mviindu , na kwahele kuba mi bakuseembele , natee ha kwiisa kumonokono Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
Nde mbasi-tsuku , wunde wuri mu lwambwe , wuri mutumi mosi kitsu , mbyaasi ya bambyaasi na Mfumu ya bamfumu , kasoongo mu mantaangu mayelemene .
Kuri wunde wuri , wunu nde kitsu wuri kafwaana ko , wadzakala kunsa buungi buri bwa kukokosolo pe , wuri muutu ti mosi kamumwii ko , na katsiitsa kumumono ko , kuba lukiinsu na mpinu dzahele manunu . Amene .
Leele kuri bisina bya ntaangu yimayi , yaa baba na masiiku ko , na yaa basiila nsiitu mu busina bwa mwaa-ntaangu mosi ko , ngo basiila nsiitu mu Nzaambi , nde kootuhaanaa byobinso mu busina mpisi tumono kiminu mu byo .
Baleele bayirika mamabwete , baba bisina mu biyiriki byabibwete , bangaa-kikabu , baatu bayirima mu kukabula ,
bari mu kwekutikisa busina ha lufulu lwalubwete mu bo-meene , mpisi heki mu ntaangu yikwiisa , babaka kidziingu kyangwanwa .
Ye Timoteho , kebe maampu ma bari bakuha , yende webata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dza mukangala , na nkalikisi dza madyeele mampya ,
mari babamosi munsa kwemasalila , bayeki basasika mu kanyi . Bweese buba na beenu !
Me Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , bunu buri lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya mu Kiristo Yesu ,
kuri Timoteho , mwaana wa mutima : bweese , ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaana kuri Taata Nzaambi , na kuri Mfumu yeetu Kiristo Yesu biba na ye .
Me nkoobvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi , yiyo yi nyisaambilaa mu mutima watsyeemeke , bunu bwaba saambilaa bakuutu . Nyisalilaa bubwo , mu ntaangu yi nyibambukilaa ye mwooyo , mu nsaambulu dzaami butsuku na mwiini kwahele kuhoto .
Bu nyibaambuka mwooyo mu mansangasa maaku , nyibaana na musoongo walaka wa kumono ye , mpisi mba nyaluula mu kiminu .
Me nyibaambuka mwooyo mu kanyi dyangwanwa diri mu ye , kanyi didyo dyatekisiri kuba mu Lowisi , mwankaaka yaaku ya mukyeetu , na mu nguri yaaku Enike , me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti diri mu ye se .
Mu didyo , me nyikubaambula mwooyo ti : bweese kulula mbaawu mu kikabu kya Nzaambi kiri mu ye , ki wuri wataambula mu ntetukulu myooko mya me .
Mukwongo , Nzaambi kasii kutuha mpeeve ya boomo ko , ngo ya mpinu , ya ntiilu na ya bundeembu .
Yaa ba na nsoni ko mu kuta kimbaangi mu Mfumu yeetu , bunu pe mu me nyiri mu bikonyi mu ntoono nde . Kasi mono mpasi ha kimosi na me mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , bunu buri mpinu dza Nzaambi .
Nde watubvuukisa , na watuteele mbila yangisi , kari mu ntoono biyiriki byeetu ko , ngo kasi bunu buri bitaasi bya nde-meene na bweese bu kari katuha mu Kiristo Yesu , tekesele mantaangu mahela kuwa .
Bweese bubwo bwayabakana mu lumalu , mu monokunu Mubvuukisi weetu Kiristo Yesu , wunde wasukisa lufwa , na wasa kuri ti mu Musamu Wamubwete bumwooyo buseme na mbolulu yihele kubweese kuba .
Mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wunde , me bayeki bansa mubikisi , ntumu na muyikisi .
Mu ntoono yiyo se , me nyiri mu kumono mpasi dzimadzi , ngo nyahele na nsoni , bukuri me nyaari mu nani me nyiri nyasa kanyi , na nyabakula ti , nde wakuka mu kukebe maampu ma kari kampa , natee mu kiluumbu kikyo .
Holo kifwaani mu maampu mangwanwa ma wuri wayuka kuri me , mu kanyi na ntiilu bya mu Kiristo Yesu .
Kebe maampu mamabwete mawuunguku mu ye , kuri Mpeeve Yangisi yidzakalaa mu beetuneenu .
Ye yaari dimadi ti bobanso bari ku Asya banyekele ; mu bo kuri Fingelo na Eremongene .
Hemese Mfumu kasa mpemisi mu nzo Onesiforo , bukuri nde wasyaamisini me mu mantaangu momanso , na kasii ba na nsoni ko mu bikonyi bya me ,
ngo nde katubukaana ku Loma , nde wasaka me mu kuheme , na wanzuukila .
Hemese Mfumu kamuha miswa mya kutaambula mpemisi kuri Mfumu , mu kiluumbu kikyo . Na kisalu kyokinso ki kari kasala nde ku Efeso , ye-meene bvuriri kuyaaba .
Hango mwaana waami , bakila makwa mu bweese buri mu Kiristo Yesu .
Myominso mi wuri wayuka kuri me , ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka , yaabisa myo kuri baatu bakwiikama , bakuka mu kuyikisa myo se kuri bakaka .
Ye se taambula mpasi bunu muyongolo wamubwete wa Kiristo Yesu .
Kuri muutu ko wuri kakotaana mu buyongolo , bweesiri kakaangama mu misamu mya kidziingu , mbuti tiiri kubweeye kuri wunde wa muholo mu kisalu .
Bakoolwiikaana mudzumuni-ntiinu mpu ya ndulukulu ko , mbuti wahele kubvumina mangisi ma ntiinu .
Muhati-manseke wukoomonaa mpasi , nde yelemini kutekesele kutaambula kikuuku kya bimbutu .
Bakula mamo ma nyileele . Mukwongo , Mfumu sa kakuha madyeele mu myominso .
Baambuka mwooyo mu Yesu Kiristo , wabutukila mu kaanda dimadi dya Davidi , nde wafuluka mu bafwa , bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete ,
mu ntoono musamu wunde , me nyiri mu kumono mpasi mu bikonyi , buni muyiriki-mamabi ; ngo kasi maampu ma Nzaambi mahele mu bikonyi .
Hango-nkuumbu , me nyiri mu kwekiindisa mutima mu myominso , mu ntoono basoolu , mpisi heki bo se babaka mvuukulu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu , na nkeembu ya mantaangu momanso .
Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi : « Mbuti tufwiiri kintwaari na nde , lo sa twaba mwooyo kintwaari na nde se ;
mbuti tukuundiri mpasi kintwaari na nde , lo sa twatuma kintwaari na nde se ; mbuti tumutunini , lo nde se sa katutuna ;
mbuti twahele kukwiikama , nde wuri wakwiikama , bukuri nde lo kabangusina kutuna nyutu ya nde-meene ko . »
Babaambula mwooyo mu mamama , wubayingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , yaa beyumuna mu bitoolo ko . Mimyo myahele mufunu , mbuti ka wa kudziimbisa baatu bayuka myo ko .
Sa makwa ye-meene , mu kumonokono ha busu bwa Nzaambi , bunu muutu wu bamwaatsiitsa , bunu kisari kihele kufwa nsoni , kikweyikisa maampu mangwanwa mu nyikusulu dzasuunguma .
Bata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dzamukangala , bukuri bari na nzoonsulu dza bubwo , sa bahamisa kukoto kunsa bungooyi ;
nzoonsulu dza bo dziri bunu mputa yibolosa muswinyi , yikweyalamika . Mu bo kuri Imenayo na Fileto ,
bo bayeki batatuka na ngwanwa , bu bakweleele ti mfulukulu yayeki yayirima , bakwebwiisa kanyi dya bamosi .
Diri dyangwanwa ti lufulu lwa sa Nzaambi lwa makwa lwateleme , luri na kinyemu kyatina ti : « Mfumu yaari baatu baandi , na wunde wutaangunaa nkuumbu Mfumu , yelemini kutatuka na mamabi . »
Munsa nzo yayinene , kari dzini nkoombo dza woolo na dza palata dzikoobaanaa ko , ngo kubaanaa se dza miti , na dza tubuumbu . Dzamosi badzisalilaa mu lukiinsu , ngo dzakaka badzisalilaa kwahele lukiinsu .
Ngo mbuti muutu tsyeemisini nyutu yaandi mu mamabi mamo , lo nde sa kaba lukoombo lwa lukiinsu , lwawuunguku , luri mufunu kuri Mfumu , mu kulusalila mu mpisi ma bayirikaa mamabwete .
Yitika mantiilu ma butuuti , saka nsungumunu , kanyi , ntiilu , na kiyeengi mu kintwaari na babo bayingukilaa Mfumu mu mutima watsyeemeke .
Looso nzoonsulu dza buwulu na dza budzeeke , bu yaari kuri ti dzitwaalaa bikiindu .
Kisari kya Mfumu wahele kuyelemene kunwaana , ngo yelemini kuba na musoongo mu baatu bobanso , wakuka mu kuyikisa , na wukuunda mamabi .
Nde yelemini kuyikisa bari na muhaawu , mu bundeembu kuri ti kampe Nzaambi wubaheeri nyiingulu madyeele , mu kuyaaba ngwanwa ,
na babvutukila bitsimi byabibwete , na bapala mu siinga dya dyabulu , mu kari kabakaanga , mu kuri ti bayirika ma katii nde .
Yaaba dyo ti : mu biluumbu bya nsukulu , mantaangu ma mpasi sa miisa .
Mukwongo , baatu sa baba na kifu , batiiri mboongo , bangaa-nzala-kubila , bangaa-masiiku , bangaa-saana , bari na nko kuri bataayi na banguri , bari batoonda ko , bahele kubvumina bya Nzaambi ,
bahele na ntiilu , bahele na kyaari , bangaa-makele , bahele na mangisi , bangaa-bumfuna , bataatu ba mamabwete ,
bakweyarika bambaasi , bangaa-kituunsi kya nkesi , bangaa-masiiku mabuunu , babvuriri kutya minkeembu ti na Nzaambi ;
bamonokono ti bangaa-kinzaambi , kasi bakwetuna mpinu dza kinzaambi . Tekele ba bubwo mbisa .
Bamosi mu bo bakwekoto mu manzo , na mu masiinga ma bo , bakwebangusina bakyeetu bahele kukiinsuma , bari na kilemu kya masumu , na bakwenama mantiilu ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ;
mpisi ntaangu bakweyika , ngo kasi bahele kubangisina kutubuka ku nyaabulu yangwanwa .
Bunu Yanese bo na Yamberese babanwaanisa Moose , bunubwo se baatu bamaba bakwenwaanisa ngwanwa , madyeele ma bo mabiiya , na bo babwa mu mitariri kanyi .
Ngo bo bari nyeendekele la ko , bukuri budzeeke bwa bo , sa bwamonokono ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , bunu bwaba monokono budzeeke bwa Yanese bo na Yamberese .
Ngo ye wanemi kwakubwete nyikusulu dzaami , ndyaatulu yaami , bitaasi byaami , kanyi dyaami , nkindusulu-mutima yaami , ntiilu yaami , kifiki kyaami ,
nkwamusunu na mpasi dzi nyamono me ku Antyoke , ku Ikonyo , ku Listara . Nkya nkwamusunu me nyahele kumono ! Ngo mu dzodzinso Mfumu wankuula .
Ngo bobanso batiiri kunata kidziingu kunsa kinzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu , sa baba bakwaamusu .
Ngo baatu bababi na bangaa-bumpitu-bumpyoongo , sa bahamisa kudyaatila kunsa mabvuriri bubi , mu kwewumuna baatu , bu bari bawumuka bo-meene .
Ngo ye wasiila kanyi mu ma wuri wayika , na ma wuri wabakula ti mangwanwa , bu yaari kuri na , wuri wamayikila .
Kuholosono bulesi bwaaku , Matinu Mangisi ye wumayaari , mo makuka mu kuha ye madyeele , mu kubaka mvuukulu mu kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu .
Momanso matinu , mu ntwalusulu ya Mpeeve ya Nzaambi bari bamatinina , na mari mufunu mu kuyikisa , mu kuseembe , mu kusuungika , mu kutwaalisa mu nsungumunu ,
mpisi heki muutu Nzaambi kaba wayirima , na kabaka biri mufunu mu nyirikulu momanso mamabwete .
Me nyikuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , nde wukwiisa kutsuundisa bamwooyo na bafwa , na mu monokunu yaandi na mu kimfumu kyaandi ,
yikisa Maampu , landukina mu ntaangu yayelemene na yahele kuyelemene , seembe , ŋaŋina , syaamisa , mu nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso kunsa nyikusulu .
Mukwongo , sa kwaba ntaangu yiri , baatu babweese kukuunda kuyuka nyikusulu dzangwanwa ko , ngo bunu buri mantiilu maaku , bo sa basaka kuba na bayikisi balaka babaleele mi batiiri kuyuka .
Bo sa babisa kuyuka ngwanwa , na sa basyeeteke mu kweyuka mankuma .
Ngo ye , ba wasoongolo mu myominso , kuunda mpasi , sa kisalu kya budingisi , kukisa kisalu kyaaku .
Mukwongo , makila ma me meki matsaamuna ha yulu kikabu , na ntaangu ya mweendu waami yimwaatubuka .
Me nyanweeni kikiindu kyakibwete , me mwaamana kudzumuna ntiinu , na nyakebe kanyi .
Mu lumalu , ba mwaampungukila mpu ya nsungumunu , mbasi-tsuku yi nyakisa Mfumu , mutsuundisi wasuunguma , mu kiluumbu kikyo ; kari kunu kuri me ko , ngo kuri bobanso se batiiri monokunu yaandi .
Ba na malwangukila mu kwiisa kuri me mu mawasu .
Mukwongo , Dema wanyekele , mu lumalu nde weki kutya kwaandi misamu mya ntaangu yimayi , na wayensi ku Tesalonika ; Kereseke ngo wuri wayensi ku Ngalatya , na Tito ku Dalamatya .
Wuni Luka kitsu wuri na me . Holo Malako , mpisi lwiisa beenu boolo , mutwaala , bukuri nde wuri mufunu kuri me , mu ntoono kisalu .
Me nyaheekiri Tikiko ku Efeso .
Mu ntaangu yi wukwiisa , ntwaalikila kiyuungu ki nyasisiri ku Torowasi ku nzo Karpo , na mikaanda , mbiki ti myayiriku mu mikaanda mya bibulu .
Alekandere , mutsuri-biseengu , wamonisini me mpasi dzalaka . Mfumu sa kamubvutukila mamo mayelemene na biyiriki byaandi .
Ngo ye se , sa madyeele mu nde , bukuri nde wanwaanisini maampu meetu mu kiteesu kyamakwa .
Ha nyaba nwaanikina me buungu dyaami mu lwatete , kuri muutu ti mosi ko wambakisiri , ngo bobanso banyekiri . Ngo yaa babaka mafuumbu mu mimyo ko .
Mfumu wambakisiri na wampeeri makwa , mpisi heki mu munwa me , maampu maba mayaabusu mu kiteesu kyakuka , na maba mayukukuna kuri makaanda momanso . Me bankuuriri mu munwa nkosi .
Mfumu sa kankuula mu momanso mamabi ma banyirikila , na sa kamvuukisa mu kunkotoso mu kimfumu kyaandi kya mayulu . Nkeembu yiba kuri nde mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene .
Ha mboto kuri Piriska , kuri Akila , na ku nzo ya Onesiforo .
Erasto wasii saala ku Korinto . Torofimo me nyamusisiri wabeele ku Mileto .
Sa makwa mu kwiisa , tekesele ntaangu ya kyoosi yitubuka . Ebulo , Pude , Lino , Kolodya , na bampaangi bobanso bakuheekiri mboto .
Hemese Mfumu kaba na kiluunsi kya ye ! Bweese buba na beenu !
Me Pawulo , nkutu Nzaambi , ntumu Yesu Kiristo mu mitariri kanyi dya basoolu ba Nzaambi , na mu mitariri nyaabulu ngwanwa bunu buri kinzaambi ,
mu nsiitu dza kidziingu kya bibvu ngo bibvu kiri Nzaambi , nde wahele kuba ngaa-mpya , wasa nsiilulu tekesele mantaangu ma bibvu ngo bibvu .
Nde wamonokoso maampu maandi , mu ntaangu yikatsimini nde-meene , mu nyaabusulu yibari batiisila me , bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi , mubvuukisi weetu .
Hemese bweese na kiyeengi , bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Kiristo Yesu Mubvuukisi weetu , biba kuri ye Tito , mwaana waami wangwanwa mu kanyi dya ntwaari .
Me nyasiisiri ye ku Kerete mu ntoono yiri ti , ye saa mana kubweeyese misiiri , na kusuusa mu mpisi bvula bakulu ba babakala , bunu bu nyakutumini me ;
mbuti kubakimini muutu wahele na ntoono yi bamuseembele , wuri na mukasi mosi , wuri na baala bari na kanyi , bahele na kibila mu ndyaatulu , bunu pe bahele na nko .
Mukwongo , mukuutu dibuundu wukebaa bya Nzaambi , kayelemini kuba na ntoono yi bamuseembele ko , wahele na masiiku , kari ngaa-mankesi ko , kari yaa-kinwi ko , kari ngaa-bikiindu ko , na kari wukwebakilaa mu bumbabu ko .
Ngo nde yelemini kuba mutaamburi-banzeense , nduku mamabwe , wasoongolo , wasuunguma , wangisi , yaa kukebe nyutu yaandi .
Nde yelemini kuba se wakaangama mu maampu ma bayelemene kusiila kanyi , mpisi kaba wakuka mu kusyaamisa baatu mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete , na mu kutungukila se babo bari na muhaawu .
Mukwongo , bangaa-nko , bangaa-nzoonsolo dzahele mufunu , na bangaa-mawunu balaka bari , mbiki ti ha kakati dya bateende bubakala .
Ba bubwo bayelemene kubakaangisa minwa , bukuri bari mu kwekotoso kisaangila munsa makaanda mansiina . Bakweyikisa myahele kuyelemene , mu kubaka mufutu wa bumbabu .
Mosi mu bo , wuri mubikiri wa bo-meene waleele ti : " Bari Kerese , mpisi ntaangu bangaa-mpya , bibulu byabibi , bilyeebe biri kisalu kunu kudya . "
Kimbaangi kimaki kiri kyangwanwa . Mu dyaambu didyo , ye yelemini kubaseembe mu makwa , mpisi baba bakuma mu kanyi ,
bahele kwekaangama mu mankuma ma Bayudayo , na mu ntumunu dza baatu babisa kusalila ngwanwa .
Kuri babo batsyeemeke , lo byobinso byatsyeemeke ; kuri babo bayeki babviimfuka na bahele na kanyi , lo kuri ti kimosi kyatsyeemeke ko ; ngo madyeele ma bo na nsimunu bo byayeki byasumuka .
Bo bakweleele ti bayaari Nzaambi , ngo mu biyiriki bo bakwemutuna . Bo bayeki nkeensu na bangaa-tungu , bakoono kuyirika ntoono ti yimosi yayibwete .
Ye ngo wuri leele , myayelemene na nyikusulu dzadzibwete .
Babakala ba binuni baba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , baba bakiinsuma , basoongolo , bakuma mu kanyi , mu ntiilu , na mu kifiki .
Bakyeetu ba binuni se bwobumosi , mu kidziingu kya bo basoongo nzelu yayelemene mu bangisi . Yaa baba na makele ko , yaa baba bankutu ba nwiinu malu ya mawaamba ko , ngo baba bayikisi ba mamabwe ,
mpisi heki bayikisa bantuumba , bwakutiila balumi na baala ,
baba basokomo , bakiinsa manyutu maaku , bakwesa bisalu mu nzo , babweeye mutima , bakwetumuma kuri balumi baaku , mpisi heki maampu ma Nzaambi mahele kuba masaanu .
Syaamisa minkuula se bwobumosi , baba basokomo
mu myominso . Ye-meene se , soongo kifwaani mu biyiriki byabibwete , nsyemukunu na lukiinsu kunsa nyikisulu .
Maampu ma ye hemese maba matsyeemeke , mahele na bwa kumanwaanisina , mpisi heki bataatu bafwa nsoni , bahele kubaka ntoono yayibi yi batuseembele .
Bankutu baba batumuma kuri bamfumu ba bo-meene mu myominso , baba na mbweeyulu , yaa baba na muhaawu ko ,
yaa beyiba ko , ngo bamonokoso mu myominso kanyi dyadibwete , mpisi babweeyese mu myominso , nyikusulu dza Mubvuukisi weetu Nzaambi .
Mukwongo , bweese bwa Nzaambi Mubvuukisi , bwamonokono kuri baatu bobanso .
Bwo buri mu kwetuyikisa , mpisi heki bu tubisiri bungooyi na nyiimunu dza nsi , twenata kidziingu kya ntaangu ya lumalu , mu kusokomo , mu nsungumunu na mu kinzaambi ,
mu kwekiingila nsiitu yayibwete , na monokunu nkeembu ya Nzaambi wadzaangama , na ya Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo .
